Extensive evaluations conducted on three real-world datasets and various neural network architectures demonstrate that SecureFL outperforms prior art up to two orders of magnitude in efficiency with state-of-the-art byzantine robustness.
papers.abstract_zh: 联邦学习(FL)已经在各种任务关键的大规模场景中展示了巨大的成功。然而，这种有前途的分布式学习模式仍然容易受到隐私推理和拜占庭攻击。前者旨在推断参与训练的目标参与者的隐私，后者侧重于破坏构建模型的完整性。为了减轻上述两个问题，最近一些工作通过利用通用的安全计算技术和通用的拜占庭健壮聚合规则来探索统一的解决方案，但是存在两个主要的限制:1)它们由于效率瓶颈而不切实际，以及2)它们仍然容易受到各种类型的攻击，因为模型不可理解。为了解决上述问题，本文提出了一个高效的、私有的、拜占庭健壮的FL框架SecureFL。SecureFL遵循最先进的拜占庭健壮FL方法(FLTrust NDSS'21)，该方法通过标准化更新的幅度和测量方向相似性来执行全面的拜占庭防御，使其适应隐私保护上下文。更重要的是，我们精心定制了一系列密码组件。首先，我们设计了一个密码友好的有效性检查协议，在功能上取代了FLTrust中的规范化操作，并在此基础上进一步设计了定制的密码协议。受益于上述优化，通信和计算成本减少了一半，而没有牺牲鲁棒性和隐私保护。第二，我们开发了一种新颖的预处理技术，用于代价高昂的矩阵乘法。利用这种技术，可以安全地评估方向相似性度量，而计算开销可以忽略不计，通信成本为零。在三个真实世界数据集和各种神经网络架构上进行的广泛评估表明，SecureFL在效率上优于现有技术达两个数量级，并具有最先进的拜占庭鲁棒性。
papers.title_zh: 高效，私人和强大的联合学习

papers.title: Morphence: Moving Target Defense Against Adversarial Examples
papers.authors: Abderrahmen Amich, Birhanu Eshete
papers.abstract: Robustness to adversarial examples of machine learning models remains an open topic of research. Attacks often succeed by repeatedly probing a fixed target model with adversarial examples purposely crafted to fool it. In this paper, we introduce Morphence, an approach that shifts the defense landscape by making a model a moving target against adversarial examples. By regularly moving the decision function of a model, Morphence makes it significantly challenging for repeated or correlated attacks to succeed. Morphence deploys a pool of models generated from a base model in a manner that introduces sufficient randomness when it responds to prediction queries. To ensure repeated or correlated attacks fail, the deployed pool of models automatically expires after a query budget is reached and the model pool is seamlessly replaced by a new model pool generated in advance. We evaluate Morphence on two benchmark image classification datasets (MNIST and CIFAR10) against five reference attacks (2 white-box and 3 black-box). In all cases, Morphence consistently outperforms the thus-far effective defense, adversarial training, even in the face of strong white-box attacks, while preserving accuracy on clean data and reducing attack transferability.
papers.abstract_zh: 对机器学习模型的对立例子的鲁棒性仍然是一个开放的研究课题。攻击通常通过反复探测一个固定的目标模型来成功，方法是故意制造一些对抗性的例子来欺骗它。在本文中，我们介绍Morphence，一种通过使模型成为对抗敌对例子的移动目标来改变防御格局的方法。通过定期移动模型的决策函数，Morphence使重复或相关攻击很难成功。Morphence部署从基础模型生成的模型池，在响应预测查询时引入足够的随机性。为了确保重复或相关的攻击失败，在达到查询预算后，部署的模型池会自动过期，并且模型池会被预先生成的新模型池无缝替换。我们在两个基准图像分类数据集(MNIST和CIFAR10)上针对五种参考攻击(2种白盒攻击和3种黑盒攻击)评估Morphence。在所有情况下，Morphence始终优于迄今为止有效的防御和对抗训练，即使面对强大的白盒攻击，同时保持干净数据的准确性并降低攻击的可转移性。
papers.title_zh: 形态：针对对抗性例子的目标防御

papers.title: Heterogeneous-PAKE: Bridging the Gap between PAKE Protocols and Their Real-World Deployment
papers.authors: Rong Wei, Fangyu Zheng, Lili Gao, Jiankuo Dong, Guang Fan, Lipeng Wan, Jingqiang Lin, Yuewu Wang
papers.abstract: Two entities, who only share a password and communicate over an insecure channel, authenticate each other and agree on a large session key for protecting their subsequent communication. This is called the password-authenticated key exchange (PAKE) protocol. PAKE protocol has been considered a suitable substitute for the prevailing hash-based authentication which is vulnerable to various attacks. However, vendors are discouraged by both its prohibitively computational overheads as well as integrating costs, leading to its limited use since being proposed. After carefully analyzing the general workflow of PAKE protocols, we present Heterogeneous-PAKE, an entire PAKE stack with high-performance and compatibility for both client-side and server-side for Web systems. Using SRP and SPAKE2+ as case studies, we conduct a series of comprehensive experiments, especially comparing with the conventional hash-based solutions to evaluate the Heterogeneous-PAKE. The implementation harvests high throughput on the server-side with over 240k, 70k, 30k, and 1,650k operations per second for SRP-1024, SRP-1536, SRP-2048, and SPAKE2+ respectively. Meanwhile, on most testing platforms, the latency is well controlled within user-acceptable bounds, especially the SPAKE2+ whose delay is less than 3x that of a traditional authentication approach based on Bcrypt. The empirical results demonstrate that the Heterogeneous-PAKE is a very economical (with only a GPU-ready server) and convenient (with an easy-to-integrate software stack without user participation or database rebuilding) solution for upgrading existing systems with high-performance PAKE services.
papers.abstract_zh: 两个实体仅共享一个密码并通过不安全的信道进行通信，它们相互进行身份验证并商定一个大的会话密钥来保护它们随后的通信。这被称为密码认证密钥交换(PAKE)协议。PAKE协议被认为是目前流行的基于哈希的认证的一个合适的替代品，但基于哈希的认证容易受到各种攻击。然而，由于其惊人的计算开销和集成成本，供应商们望而却步，导致其自提出以来使用受限。在仔细分析PAKE协议的一般工作流程后，我们提出了Heterogeneous-PAKE，这是一个完整的PAKE栈，具有高性能和兼容性，适用于Web系统的客户端和服务器端。以SRP和SPAKE2+为例，我们进行了一系列的综合实验，特别是与传统的基于hash的方法进行了比较。该实施在服务器端获得了高吞吐量，对于SRP-1024、SRP-1536、SRP-2048和SPAKE2+分别为每秒24万、7万、3万和1，650万次操作。同时，在大多数测试平台上，延迟被很好地控制在用户可接受的范围内，尤其是SPAKE2+的延迟不到传统的基于Bcrypt的认证方法的3倍。实证结果表明，对于使用高性能PAKE服务升级现有系统而言，Heterogeneous-PAKE是一种非常经济(仅具有GPU就绪型服务器)和方便(具有易于集成的软件堆栈，无需用户参与或数据库重建)的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 异构击形：弥合Pake协议与其实际部署之间的差距

papers.title: A formal analysis of IKEv2's post-quantum extension
papers.authors: Stefan-Lukas Gazdag, Sophia Grundner-Culemann, Tobias Guggemos, Tobias Heider, Daniel Loebenberger
papers.abstract: Many security protocols used for daily Internet traffic have been used for decades and standardization bodies like the IETF often provide extensions for legacy protocols to deal with new requirements. Even though the security aspects for extensions are carefully discussed, automated reasoning has proven to be a valuable tool to uncover security holes that would otherwise have gone unnoticed. Therefore, Automated Theorem Proving (ATP) is already a customary procedure for the development of some new protocols, e.g., TLS 1.3 and MLS. IKEv2, the key exchange for the IPsec protocol suite, is expected to undergo significant changes to facilitate the integration of Post-Quantum Cryptography. We present the first formal security model for the IKEv2-handshake in a quantum setting together with an automated proof using the Tamarin Prover. Our model focuses on the core state machine, is therefore easily extendable, and aims to promote the use of ATP in IPsec-standardization. The security model captures gaps in the protocol, but treats the specific implementation (like fragmentation mechanisms, for example) as a black box. With IKE_INTERMEDIATE we showcase this approach on a recently proposed extension that significantly changes the protocol’s state machine.
papers.abstract_zh: 许多用于日常互联网流量的安全协议已经使用了几十年，像IETF这样的标准化组织经常为传统协议提供扩展以应对新的需求。尽管对扩展的安全方面进行了仔细的讨论，但是自动推理已经被证明是发现安全漏洞的一个有价值的工具，否则这些安全漏洞将会被忽视。因此，自动定理证明(ATP)已经是开发一些新协议(例如TLS 1.3和MLS)的惯用过程。IKEv2是IPsec协议簇的密钥交换，预计将经历重大变化，以促进后量子密码术的集成。我们提出了量子环境下IKEv2握手的第一个正式安全模型，以及使用Tamarin证明者的自动证明。我们的模型专注于核心状态机，因此易于扩展，旨在促进ATP在IPsec标准化中的使用。安全模型捕捉协议中的漏洞，但是将特定的实现(例如，像分段机制)视为黑盒。通过IKE_INTERMEDIATE，我们在最近提出的扩展上展示了这种方法，该扩展极大地改变了协议的状态机。
papers.title_zh: 对IKEV2的量子后扩展的正式分析

papers.title: Optimized Paillier's Cryptosystem with Fast Encryption and Decryption
papers.authors: Huanyu Ma, Shuai Han, Hao Lei
papers.abstract: In this paper, we propose a new optimization for the Paillier’s additively homomorphic encryption scheme (Eurocrypt’99). At the heart of our optimization is a well-chosen subgroup of the underlying , which is used as the randomness space for masking messages during encryption. The size of the subgroup is significantly smaller than that of , leading to faster encryption and decryption algorithms of our optimization. We establish the one-wayness and semantic security of our optimized Paillier scheme upon those of an optimization (i.e., “Scheme 3”) made by Paillier in Eurocrypt’99. Thus, our optimized scheme is one-way under the partial discrete logarithm (PDL) assumption, and is semantically secure under the decisional PDL (DPDL) assumption. On the other hand, we present a detailed analysis on the concrete security of our optimized scheme under several known methods. To provide 112-bit security, our analysis suggests that a 2048-bit modulus N and a well-chosen subgroup of size 448-bit would suffice. We compare our optimization with existing optimized Paillier schemes, including the Jurik’s optimization proposed by Jurik in his Ph.D. thesis and the Paillier’s optimization in Eurocrypt’99. Our experiments show that, – the encryption of our optimization is about 2.7 times faster than that of the Jurik’s optimization and is about 7.5 times faster than that of the Paillier’s optimization; – the decryption of our optimization is about 4.1 times faster than that of the Jurik’s optimization and has a similar performance with that of the Paillier’s optimization.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们对Paillier的加性同态加密方案(Eurocrypt'99)提出了一种新的优化方案。我们优化的核心是一个精心选择的底层子组，它被用作加密期间屏蔽消息的随机性空间。子组的大小明显小于，这使得我们优化的加密和解密算法更快。我们在Paillier在Eurocrypt'99中提出的优化方案(即“方案3”)的基础上建立了我们优化的Paillier方案的单向性和语义安全性。因此，我们的优化方案在部分离散对数(PDL)假设下是单向的，并且在判定PDL (DPDL)假设下是语义安全的。另一方面，在几种已知方法下，我们对优化方案的具体安全性进行了详细的分析。为了提供112位安全性，我们的分析表明，2048位模数N和大小为448位的精心选择的子组就足够了。我们将我们的优化与现有的优化Paillier方案进行了比较，包括Jurik在其博士论文中提出的Jurik优化和Eurocrypt'99中的Paillier优化。我们的实验表明，我们的优化算法的加密速度比Jurik的优化算法快2.7倍，比Paillier的优化算法快7.5倍；–我们优化的解密速度比Jurik优化快4.1倍，性能与Paillier优化相似。
papers.title_zh: 通过快速加密和解密优化了Paillier的密码系统

papers.title: Towards Practical Post-quantum Signatures for Resource-Limited Internet of Things
papers.authors: Rouzbeh Behnia, Attila Altay Yavuz
papers.abstract: A digital signature is an essential cryptographic tool to offer authentication with public verifiability, non-repudiation, and scalability. However, digital signatures often rely on expensive operations that can be highly costly for low-end devices, typically seen in the Internet of Things and Systems (IoTs). These efficiency concerns especially deepen when post-quantum secure digital signatures are considered. Hence, it is of vital importance to devise post-quantum secure digital signatures that are designed with the needs of such constraint IoT systems in mind. In this work, we propose a novel lightweight post-quantum digital signature that respects the processing, memory, and bandwidth limitations of resource-limited IoTs. Our new scheme, called , efficiently transforms a one-time signature to a (polynomially-bounded) many-time signature via a distributed public key computation method. This new approach enables a resource-limited signer to compute signatures without any costly lattice operations (e.g., rejection samplings, matrix multiplications, etc.), and only with a low-memory footprint and compact signature sizes. We also developed a variant for with forward-security, which is an extremely costly property to attain via the state-of-the-art post-quantum signatures.
papers.abstract_zh: 数字签名是一种重要的加密工具，可以提供具有公共可验证性、不可否认性和可伸缩性的身份验证。然而，数字签名通常依赖于昂贵的操作，对于低端设备来说成本可能非常高，通常见于物联网和系统(IOT)。当考虑后量子安全数字签名时，这些效率问题尤其严重。因此，考虑到这种受限物联网系统的需求，设计后量子安全数字签名是至关重要的。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种新颖的轻量级后量子数字签名，它考虑了资源有限的物联网的处理、存储和带宽限制。我们的新方案称为，通过分布式公钥计算方法有效地将一次签名转换为(多项式有界的)多次签名。这种新方法使得资源受限的签名者能够计算签名，而无需任何昂贵的格运算(例如，拒绝采样、矩阵乘法等)。)，并且只有低内存占用和紧凑的签名大小。我们还开发了一个具有前向安全性的变体，这是一个通过最先进的后量子签名获得的极其昂贵的属性。
papers.title_zh: 建立实用的量子后签名，以供资源有限的物联网

papers.title: VASA: Vector AES Instructions for Security Applications
papers.authors: Jean-Pierre Münch, Thomas Schneider, Hossein Yalame
papers.abstract: Due to standardization, AES is today’s most widely used block cipher. Its security is well-studied and hardware acceleration is available on a variety of platforms. Following the success of the Intel AES New Instructions (AES-NI), support for Vectorized AES (VAES) has been added in 2018 and already shown to be useful to accelerate many implementations of AES-based algorithms where the order of AES evaluations is fixed a priori. In our work, we focus on using VAES to accelerate the computation in secure multi-party computation protocols and applications. For some MPC building blocks, such as OT extension, the AES operations are independent and known a priori and hence can be easily parallelized, similar to the original paper on VAES by Drucker et al. (ITNG’19). We evaluate the performance impact of using VAES in the AES-CTR implementations used in Microsoft CrypTFlow2, and the EMP-OT library which we accelerate by up to 24%. The more complex case that we study for the first time in our paper are dependent AES calls that are not fixed yet in advance and hence cannot be parallelized manually. This is the case for garbling schemes. To get optimal efficiency from the hardware, enough independent calls need to be combined for each batch of AES executions. We identify such batches using a deferred execution technique paired with early execution to reduce non-locality issues and more static techniques using circuit depth and explicit gate independence. We present a performance and a modularity-focused technique to compute the AES operations efficiently while also immediately using the results and preparing the inputs. Using these techniques, we achieve a performance improvement via VAES of up to 244% for the ABY framework and of up to 28% for the EMP-AGMPC framework. By implementing several garbling schemes from the literature using VAES acceleration, we obtain a 171% better performance for ABY.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于标准化，AES是当今使用最广泛的分组密码。它的安全性得到了充分的研究，硬件加速可在各种平台上使用。随着英特尔AES新指令(AES-NI)的成功，2018年增加了对矢量化AES (VAES)的支持，并已证明有助于加速许多基于AES的算法的实施，其中AES评估的顺序是事先固定的。在我们的工作中，我们致力于在安全多方计算协议和应用中使用VAES来加速计算。对于一些MPC构建模块，如OT扩展，AES运算是独立的，并且是先验已知的，因此可以很容易地并行化，类似于德鲁克等人(ITNG'19)关于VAES的原始论文。我们评估了在微软CrypTFlow2中使用的AES-CTR实现中使用VAES的性能影响，以及我们加速了24%的EMP-OT库。我们在本文中首次研究的更复杂的情况是依赖AES调用，它们事先尚未固定，因此无法手动并行化。乱码方案就是这种情况。为了从硬件获得最佳效率，需要为每批AES执行组合足够多的独立调用。我们使用延迟执行技术结合早期执行来减少非局部性问题，以及使用电路深度和显式门独立性的更静态的技术来识别这样的批处理。我们提出了一种以性能和模块性为中心的技术来有效地计算AES运算，同时也立即使用结果和准备输入。使用这些技术，我们通过VAES实现了ABY框架高达244%的性能提升和EMP-AGMPC框架高达28%的性能提升。通过使用VAES加速实现文献中的几个乱码方案，我们为ABY获得了171%的更好性能。
papers.title_zh: VASA：安全应用程序的向量AES指令

papers.title: Program Obfuscation via ABI Debiasing
papers.authors: David Demicco, Rukayat Erinfolami, Aravind Prakash
papers.abstract: The Itanium ABI is the most popular C++ ABI that defines data structures essential to implement underlying object-oriented concepts in C++. Specifically, name mangling rules, object and VTable layouts, alignment, etc. are all mandated by the ABI. Adherence to the ABI comes with undesirable side effects. While it allows interoperability, past research efforts have shown that it provides robust inference points that an attacker can leverage to reveal sensitive design information through binary reverse engineering. In this work, we aim to reduce the ability of an attacker to successfully reverse engineer a binary. We do this via removal of what we call ABI Bias, i.e., the reverse engineering bias that manifests due to a compiler’s adherence to the ABI. Specifically, we identify two types of ABI biases that are central to past reverse engineering works on C++ binaries: VTable ordering bias and Function Pointer bias. We present compiler-based techniques that can correctly and efficiently debias a given binary from the aforementioned biases. We evaluate our proof-of-concept implementation on a corpus of real world programs for binary size, correctness and performance. We report an average increase of 1.42% in binary size compared to the baseline, very low performance overhead and lastly, correct execution of evaluation programs in comparison to the baseline. Finally, we demonstrate efficacy of our approach by hindering DeClassifier, a state-of-the-art C++ reverse engineering framework.
papers.abstract_zh: 安腾ABI是最流行的C++ ABI，它定义了在C++中实现底层面向对象概念所必需的数据结构。具体来说，命名管理规则、对象和表布局、对齐等。都是ABI授权的。坚持ABI会带来不良的副作用。虽然它允许互操作性，但过去的研究表明，它提供了强大的推断点，攻击者可以利用这些推断点通过二进制逆向工程来泄露敏感的设计信息。在这项工作中，我们的目标是降低攻击者成功逆向工程二进制文件的能力。我们通过消除我们所谓的ABI偏差来做到这一点，即由于编译器坚持ABI而表现出来的逆向工程偏差。具体来说，我们确定了两种类型的ABI偏差，它们是过去对C++二进制文件进行逆向工程工作的核心:VTable排序偏差和函数指针偏差。我们提出了基于编译器的技术，可以正确有效地消除给定二进制代码的上述偏差。我们在真实世界程序的语料库上评估了我们的概念验证实现的二进制大小、正确性和性能。我们报告说，与基线相比，二进制大小平均增加了1.42%，性能开销非常低，最后，与基线相比，评估程序的执行正确。最后，我们通过阻碍解密程序，一个最先进的C++逆向工程框架，证明了我们的方法的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 通过ABI DECIASINING进行混淆的程序

papers.title: A Look Back on a Function Identification Problem
papers.authors: Hyungjoon Koo, Soyeon Park, Taesoo Kim
papers.abstract: A function recognition problem serves as a basis for further binary analysis and many applications. Although common challenges for function detection are well known, prior works have repeatedly claimed a noticeable result with a high precision and recall. In this paper, we aim to fill the void of what has been overlooked or misinterpreted by closely looking into the previous datasets, metrics, and evaluations with varying case studies. Our major findings are that i) a common corpus like GNU utilities is insufficient to represent the effectiveness of function identification, ii) it is difficult to claim, at least in the current form, that an ML-oriented approach is scientifically superior to deterministic ones like IDA or Ghidra, iii) the current metrics may not be reasonable enough to measure varying function detection cases, and iv) the capability of recognizing functions depends on each tool’s strategic or peculiar choice. We perform re-evaluation of existing approaches on our own dataset, demonstrating that not a single state-of-the-art tool dominates all the others. In conclusion, a function detection problem has not yet been fully addressed, and we need a better methodology and metric to make advances in the field of function identification.
papers.abstract_zh: 函数识别问题是进一步二进制分析和许多应用的基础。虽然功能检测的常见挑战是众所周知的，但先前的工作已经反复声称具有高精度和召回率的显著结果。在本文中，我们旨在通过仔细研究以前的数据集、指标和不同案例研究的评估，填补被忽略或误解的空白。我们的主要发现是:I)像GNU utilities这样的公共语料库不足以表示函数识别的有效性，ii)很难声称，至少在当前形式下，面向ML的方法在科学上优于IDA或Ghidra这样的确定性方法，iii)当前的度量可能不足以合理地测量不同的函数检测情况，以及iv)识别函数的能力取决于每个工具的策略或特殊选择。我们在自己的数据集上对现有方法进行了重新评估，证明了没有一个最先进的工具能够主宰所有其他工具。总之，功能检测问题还没有完全解决，我们需要更好的方法和度量来在功能识别领域取得进展。
papers.title_zh: 回顾功能识别问题

papers.title: SoftMark: Software Watermarking via a Binary Function Relocation
papers.authors: Honggoo Kang, Yonghwi Kwon, Sangjin Lee, Hyungjoon Koo
papers.abstract: The ease of reproducibility of digital artifacts raises a growing concern in copyright infringement; in particular, for a software product. Software watermarking is one of the promising techniques to verify the owner of licensed software by embedding a digital fingerprint. Developing an ideal software watermark scheme is challenging because i) unlike digital media watermarking, software watermarking must preserve the original code semantics after inserting software watermark, and ii) it requires well-balanced properties of credibility, resiliency, capacity, imperceptibility, and efficiency. We present SoftMark, a software watermarking system that leverages a function relocation where the order of functions implicitly encodes a hidden identifier. By design, SoftMark does not introduce additional structures (i.e., codes, blocks, or subroutines), being robust in unauthorized detection, while maintaining a negligible performance overhead and reasonable capacity. With various strategies against viable attacks (i.e., static binary re-instrumentation), we tackle the limitations of previous reordering-based approaches. Our empirical results demonstrate the practicality and effectiveness by successful embedding and extraction of various watermark values.
papers.abstract_zh: 数字制品的易复制性引起了对版权侵权的日益关注；特别是对于软件产品。软件水印是通过嵌入数字指纹来验证授权软件所有者的一种有前途的技术。开发一个理想的软件水印方案是具有挑战性的，因为I)与数字媒体水印不同，软件水印必须在插入软件水印后保持原始代码语义，以及ii)它需要可信度、弹性、容量、不可感知性和效率的良好平衡的属性。我们提出了SoftMark，一个软件水印系统，它利用了函数重定位，其中函数的顺序隐含地编码了一个隐藏的标识符。通过设计，SoftMark不引入额外的结构(即代码、块或子例程)，在未授权检测中是鲁棒的，同时保持可忽略的性能开销和合理的容量。通过针对可行攻击的各种策略(即，静态二进制重插)，我们解决了先前基于重新排序的方法的局限性。我们的实验结果通过成功嵌入和提取各种水印值证明了实用性和有效性。
papers.title_zh: 软标志：通过二进制功能搬迁的软件水印

papers.title: Dynamic Taint Analysis versus Obfuscated Self-Checking
papers.authors: Sebastian Banescu, Samuel Valenzuela, Marius Guggenmos, Mohsen Ahmadvand, Alexander Pretschner
papers.abstract: Software protection in practice addresses the yearly loss of tens of billion USD for software manufacturers, a result of malicious end-users tampering with the software (”software cracking”). Software protection is prevalent in the gaming and license checking industries, and also relevant in the embedded and other industries. State of the art research in the area of software tamper protection against man-at-the-end (MATE) attackers focuses on the localization of integrity checks. The goal of this paper is a general assessment of the resilience of software self-checking, protected themselves by obfuscations against (1) (automated) detection and (2) (automated) bypass, without deobfuscating the code. Using dynamic taint analysis on a benchmark set of programs, we study how easy it is to detect and bypass combinations of self-checking and various obfuscation transformations. We aim at generalizing these findings across different programs rather than focusing on one particular program instance. To this end, we perform a set of controlled experiments using a data set of real-world programs, the MiBench suite and open-source games, and show that all of these can be broken by dynamic taint analysis attacks. To counter such attacks, we propose and implement improvements to an existing obfuscation implementation. We evaluate the implemented improvement and discuss the security-performance trade-offs.
papers.abstract_zh: 软件保护在实践中解决了软件制造商每年数百亿美元的损失，这是恶意最终用户篡改软件(“软件破解”)的结果。软件保护在游戏和许可证检查行业中很普遍，在嵌入式和其他行业中也很重要。针对终端人(MATE)攻击者的软件篡改保护领域的最新研究集中于完整性检查的本地化。本文的目标是对软件自检的弹性进行总体评估，在不破坏代码的情况下，通过混淆来防止(1)(自动)检测和(2)(自动)绕过。通过在一组基准程序上使用动态污点分析，我们研究了检测和绕过自检和各种混淆转换的组合有多容易。我们的目标是将这些发现推广到不同的程序，而不是集中在一个特定的程序实例上。为此，我们使用真实世界程序、MiBench套件和开源游戏的数据集执行了一组受控实验，并表明所有这些都可以被动态污点分析攻击所破坏。为了对抗这种攻击，我们提出并实现了对现有混淆实现的改进。我们评估实现的改进，并讨论安全性-性能的权衡。
papers.title_zh: 动态污染分析与混淆的自我检查

papers.title: Dicos: Discovering Insecure Code Snippets from Stack Overflow Posts by Leveraging User Discussions
papers.authors: Hyunji Hong, Seunghoon Woo, Heejo Lee
papers.abstract: Online Q&A fora such as Stack Overflow assist developers to solve their faced coding problems. Despite the advantages, Stack Overflow has the potential to provide insecure code snippets that, if reused, can compromise the security of the entire software. We present Dicos, an accurate approach by examining the change history of Stack Overflow posts for discovering insecure code snippets. When a security issue was detected in a post, the insecure code is fixed to be safe through user discussions, leaving a change history. Inspired by this process, Dicos first extracts the change history from the Stack Overflow post, and then analyzes the history whether it contains security patches, by utilizing pre-selected features that can effectively identify security patches. Finally, when such changes are detected, Dicos determines that the code snippet before applying the security patch is insecure. To evaluate Dicos, we collected 1,958,283 Stack Overflow posts tagged with C, C++, and Android. When we applied Dicos on the collected posts, Dicos discovered 12,458 insecure posts (i.e., 14,719 insecure code snippets) from the collected posts with 91% precision and 93% recall. We further confirmed that the latest versions of 151 out of 2,000 popular C/C++ open-source software contain at least one insecure code snippet taken from Stack Overflow, being discovered by Dicos. Our proposed approach, Dicos, can contribute to preventing further propagation of insecure codes and thus creating a safe code reuse environment.
papers.abstract_zh: 在线问答论坛，如堆栈溢出，帮助开发人员解决他们面临的编码问题。尽管有这些优点，堆栈溢出也有可能提供不安全的代码片段，如果重复使用，会危及整个软件的安全性。我们提出了Dicos，一种通过检查栈溢出的变化历史来发现不安全代码片段的精确方法。当在帖子中检测到安全问题时，不安全的代码会通过用户讨论被修复为安全的，并留下更改历史。受此过程的启发，Dicos首先从堆栈溢出post中提取更改历史，然后利用预先选择的可以有效识别安全补丁的特征，分析该历史是否包含安全补丁。最后，当检测到这种变化时，Dicos确定应用安全补丁之前的代码片段是不安全的。为了评估Dicos，我们收集了1，958，283个标记为C、C++和Android的堆栈溢出帖子。当我们对收集的帖子应用Dicos时，Dicos从收集的帖子中发现了12，458个不安全的帖子(即14，719个不安全的代码片段)，准确率为91%，召回率为93%。我们进一步证实，在2000个流行的C/C++开源软件中，有151个软件的最新版本包含至少一个取自Stack Overflow的不安全代码片段，这些代码片段是由Dicos发现的。我们提出的方法Dicos有助于防止不安全代码的进一步传播，从而创建一个安全的代码重用环境。
papers.title_zh: DICO：通过利用用户讨论来从堆栈溢出帖子中发现不安全的代码段

papers.title: ARID: Anonymous Remote IDentification of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles
papers.authors: Pietro Tedeschi, Savio Sciancalepore, Roberto Di Pietro
papers.abstract: To enable enhanced accountability of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs) operations, the US-based Federal Avionics Administration (FAA) recently published a new dedicated regulation, namely RemoteID, requiring UAV operators to broadcast messages reporting their identity and location. The enforcement of such a rule, mandatory by 2022, generated significant concerns on UAV operators, primarily because of privacy issues derived by the indiscriminate broadcast of the plain-text identity of the UAV on the wireless channel. In this paper, we propose ARID, a solution enabling RemoteID-compliant Anonymous Remote Identification of UAVs. The adoption of ARID allows UAVs to broadcast RemoteID-compliant messages using ephemeral pseudonyms that only a Trusted Authority, such as the FAA, can link to the long-term identifier of the UAV and its operator. Moreover, ARID also enforces UAV message authenticity, to protect UAVs against impersonation and spoofed reporting, while requiring an overall minimal toll on the battery budget. Furthermore, ARID generates negligible overhead on the Trusted Authority, not requiring the secure maintenance of any private database. While the security properties of ARID are thoroughly discussed and formally verified with ProVerif, we also implemented a prototype of ARID on a real UAV, i.e., the 3DR-Solo drone, integrating our solution within the popular Poky Operating System, on top of the widespread MAVLink protocol. Our experimental performance evaluation shows that the most demanding configuration of ARID takes only ≈ 11.23 ms to generate a message and requires a mere 4.72 mJ of energy. Finally, we also released the source code of ARID to foster further investigations and development by Academia, Industry, and practitioners.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了加强无人机(UAV)操作的问责制，总部位于美国的联邦航空电子管理局(FAA)最近发布了一项新的专门法规，即RemoteID，要求无人机操作员广播报告其身份和位置的消息。到2022年，强制执行这一规则，对无人机运营商产生了严重的关注，主要是因为在无线信道上不加选择地广播无人机的纯文本身份所产生的隐私问题。在这篇论文中，我们提出了一个解决方案ARID，它能够实现符合RemoteID的无人机匿名远程识别。ARID的采用允许无人机使用短暂的假名广播RemoteID兼容的消息，只有可信的权威机构，如FAA，才能链接到无人机及其操作员的长期标识符。此外，ARID还加强了UAV消息的真实性，以保护UAV免受假冒和欺骗报告，同时要求电池预算的总体最小费用。此外，ARID对可信机构产生的开销可以忽略不计，不需要任何私有数据库的安全维护。虽然ARID的安全属性已经过彻底讨论，并通过ProVerif进行了正式验证，但我们还在一架真实的无人机上实现了一个ARID原型，即3DR-Solo无人机，在广泛使用的MAVLink协议之上，将我们的解决方案集成到流行的Poky操作系统中。我们的实验性能评估表明，ARID最苛刻的配置生成一条消息只需要大约11.23 ms，并且只需要4.72 mJ的能量。最后，我们还发布了ARID的源代码，以促进学术界、工业界和从业者的进一步研究和开发。
papers.title_zh: 干旱：无人驾驶汽车的匿名远程识别

papers.title: Sipster: Settling IOU Privately and Quickly with Smart Meters
papers.authors: Sherman S. M. Chow, Ming Li, Yongjun Zhao, Wenqiang Jin
papers.abstract: Cyber-physical systems revolutionize how we interact with physical systems. Smart grid is a prominent example. With new features such as fine-grained billing, user privacy is at a greater risk than before. For instance, a utility company () can infer users’ (fine-grained) usage patterns from their payment. The literature only focuses on hiding individual meter readings in bill calculation. It is unclear how to preserve amount privacy when the needs to assert that each user has settled the amount as calculated in the bill. We advocate a new paradigm of cash payment settlement enabling payment privacy. Users pay their bills in unit amount so that they can hide in the crowd. Meanwhile, can obtain payments earlier in the pay-as-you-go model, leading to a win-win situation. A highlight of our proposed system, Sipster, is that the receipts for the payments can be combined into a O(1)-size receipt certifying the smart meter’s certification. Without such aggregation, techniques such as zero-knowledge proof would fail since it typically cannot hide the size of the witness. Seemingly helpful tools, e.g., aggregate signatures or fully homomorphic signatures, also fail. The novelty of Sipster lies in fulfilling our five goals simultaneously: 1) privacy-preserving: the cannot infer a user’s payment amount; 2) prover-efficient: no zero-knowledge proof is ever needed; 3) verifier-efficient: it takes O(1) time to verify a combined receipt; 4) double-claiming-free: users cannot present the same receipt twice; and 5) minimalistic smart meter: it has the capability to report signed readings (needed even in a non-private setting).
papers.abstract_zh: 信息物理系统彻底改变了我们与物理系统的互动方式。智能电网就是一个突出的例子。有了精细计费等新功能，用户隐私面临的风险比以前更大。例如，一家公用事业公司()可以从用户的付费中推断出用户(细粒度的)使用模式。文献仅关注在账单计算中隐藏单个仪表读数。当需要断言每个用户已经结算了账单中计算的金额时，不清楚如何保护金额隐私。我们倡导一种支持支付隐私的现金支付结算新模式。用户以单位金额支付账单，这样就可以隐藏在人群中。同时，可以在现收现付模式中提前获得付款，从而实现双赢。我们提出的系统Sipster的一个亮点是，付款收据可以合并成一个O(1)大小的收据，以证明智能电表的认证。没有这样的聚集，诸如零知识证明的技术将失败，因为它通常不能隐藏见证的大小。看似有用的工具，例如聚合签名或完全同态签名，也会失败。Sipster的新颖之处在于同时实现了我们的五个目标:1)隐私保护:不能推断用户的支付金额；2)证明者有效:不需要零知识证明；3)验证者高效:验证组合收据花费O(1)时间；4)免重复申领:用户不能两次出示同一张收据；以及5)极简智能仪表:它具有报告签名读数的能力(即使在非私人设置中也需要)。
papers.title_zh: sipster：私下，迅速与智能电表定居

papers.title: TEEKAP: Self-Expiring Data Capsule using Trusted Execution Environment
papers.authors: Mingyuan Gao, Hung Dang, Ee-Chien Chang
papers.abstract: Safeguarding privacy in data sharing is challenging, especially when data owners lose control over their data once it is passed to another party. Our work aims to build a data-sharing platform that enables data owners to regain control over their shared data. Specifically, sensitive data is first encapsulated into a data capsule. The platform regulates functional access to the data capsule, i.e., the receiver can compute a predefined function on the data with its input and learns nothing else. The platform also enforces self-expiry of the data capsule. In addition, the data capsule features a notion of “send-and-forget” wherein data owners can go offline after releasing their data capsules. As a result, data capsules can be freely circulated. Each data capsule is associated with an access policy and a usage transcript. The former specifies which functions are eligible to access the protected data and its expiry conditions, whereas the latter is used to determine if the expiry conditions have been met. To regulate functional access, one efficient solution is to employ a Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) with attested execution. Nonetheless, we observe that the use of TEE alone is not sufficient to accomplish self-expiry, for TEEs are vulnerable to rollback attacks via which an adversary could “unwind” the usage transcript of an expired data capsule or double-consume the protected data. Moreover, a straightforward implementation would need a single master key to be resided in the TEE, leading to single-point-of-failure. Our solution, TEEKAP, addresses the challenges by embracing decentralization, employing a committee of independent and mutually distrusting nodes to uphold the integrity of usage transcripts and the confidentiality of encryption keys. TEEKAP integrates TEE, consensus protocol, and threshold secret sharing in a novel way. Experiments conducted in realistic deployment settings on Microsoft Azure show that TEEKAP can process access requests at scale.
papers.abstract_zh: 保护数据共享中的隐私是一项挑战，尤其是当数据所有者在数据被传递给另一方后失去对其数据的控制时。我们的工作旨在建立一个数据共享平台，使数据所有者能够重新控制他们共享的数据。具体来说，敏感数据首先被封装到数据胶囊中。该平台调节对数据胶囊的功能性访问，即，接收器可以利用其输入对数据计算预定义的函数，并且不学习其他任何东西。该平台还强制实施数据胶囊的自到期。此外，数据胶囊具有“发送并忘记”的概念，其中数据所有者可以在释放他们的数据胶囊后离线。因此，数据胶囊可以自由流通。每个数据胶囊都与一个访问策略和一个使用记录相关联。前者指定哪些功能有资格访问受保护的数据及其到期条件，而后者用于确定是否满足到期条件。为了规范功能访问，一个有效的解决方案是采用具有证明执行的可信执行环境(TEE)。然而，我们观察到，单独使用TEE不足以实现自过期，因为TEE容易受到回滚攻击，通过回滚攻击，对手可以“解开”过期数据胶囊的使用记录或重复使用受保护的数据。此外，一个简单的实现需要在TEE中存放一个主密钥，这会导致单点故障。我们的解决方案TEEKAP通过采用去中心化来应对这些挑战，它采用了一个由独立且互不信任的节点组成的委员会来维护使用记录的完整性和加密密钥的机密性。TEEKAP以一种新颖的方式集成了TEE、共识协议和门限秘密共享。在微软Azure上的真实部署环境中进行的实验表明，TEEKAP可以大规模处理访问请求。
papers.title_zh: TEEKAP：使用受信任的执行环境进行自我试验的数据胶囊

papers.title: BAPM: Block Attention Profiling Model for Multi-tab Website Fingerprinting Attacks on Tor
papers.authors: Zhong Guan, Gang Xiong, Gaopeng Gou, Zhen Li, Mingxin Cui, Chang Liu
papers.abstract: Website fingerprinting attacks on Tor pose an security issue in anonymity privacy, in which attackers can identify websites visited by victims through passively capturing and analyzing encrypted packet traces. Although related works have been studied over a long period, most of them focus on single-tab packet traces which only contain one page tab’s data. However, users often open multiple page tabs successively when browsing the web, and multi-tab packet traces generated will corrupt common single-tab attacks. Existing multi-tab attacks still depend on an elaborate feature engineering, besides, they fail to exploit the overlapping area which contains the mixed data of two adjacent page tabs, thus suffering from the information lost or confusion. In this paper, we propose a Block Attention Profiling Model named BAPM as a new multi-tab attacking model. Specifically, BAPM fully utilizes the whole multi-tab packet trace including the overlapping area to avoid information lost. It generates a tab-aware representation from direction sequences and performs the block division to separate mixed page tabs as clearly as possible, thus relieving the information confusion. Then the attention-based profiling is used to group blocks belonging to the same page tab and finally multiple websites are simultaneously identified under a global view. We compare BAPM with state of the art multi-tab attacks, and BAPM outperforms comparison methods even with larger overlapping area. The effectiveness of model design is also validated through ablation, sensitivity and generalization analysis.
papers.abstract_zh: Tor上的网站指纹攻击带来了匿名隐私的安全问题，攻击者可以通过被动捕获和分析加密的数据包痕迹来识别受害者访问的网站。虽然相关的工作已经被研究了很长一段时间，但大多数都集中在只包含一页标签数据的单标签包跟踪上。然而，用户在浏览网页时经常会连续打开多个页面标签，产生的多标签数据包痕迹会破坏常见的单标签攻击。现有的多标签攻击仍然依赖于精细的特征工程，此外，它们没有利用包含两个相邻页面标签的混合数据的重叠区域，因此遭受信息丢失或混淆。本文提出了一种新的多标签攻击模型——BAPM模型。具体来说，BAPM充分利用包括重叠区域在内的整个多标签包跟踪来避免信息丢失。它从方向序列生成标签感知表示，并执行块分割以尽可能清晰地分离混合页面标签，从而缓解信息混乱。然后，使用基于注意力的简档对属于同一页面标签的块进行分组，最后在全局视图下同时识别多个网站。我们将BAPM与最先进的多标签攻击进行比较，BAPM甚至在较大的重叠区域也优于比较方法。模型设计的有效性也通过烧蚀、灵敏度和泛化分析得到了验证。
papers.title_zh: BAPM：阻止多TAB网站指纹攻击的注意力图谱模型

papers.title: Try before You Buy: Privacy-preserving Data Evaluation on Cloud-based Machine Learning Data Marketplace
papers.authors: Qiyang Song, Jiahao Cao, Kun Sun, Qi Li, Ke Xu
papers.abstract: A cloud-based data marketplace provides a service to match data shoppers with appropriate data sellers, so that data shoppers can augment their internal data sets with external data to improve their machine learning (ML) models. Since data may contain diverse values, it is critical for a shopper to evaluate the most valuable data before making the final trade. However, evaluating ML data typically requires the cloud to access a shopper’s ML model and sellers’ data, which are both sensitive. None of the existing cloud-based data marketplaces enable ML data evaluation while preserving both model privacy and data privacy. In this paper, we develop a privacy-preserving ML data evaluation framework on a cloud-based data marketplace to protect shoppers’ ML models and sellers’ data. First, we provide a privacy-preserving framework that allows shoppers and sellers to encrypt their models and data, respectively, while preserving data functionality and model functionality in the cloud. We then develop a privacy-preserving data selection protocol that enables the cloud to help shoppers select the most valuable ML data. Also, we develop a privacy-preserving data validation protocol that allows shoppers to further check the quality of the selected data. Compared to random data selection, the experimental results show that our solution can reduce 60% prediction errors.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于云的数据市场提供了一种将数据购买者与适当的数据销售者相匹配的服务，因此数据购买者可以用外部数据增加他们的内部数据集，以改进他们的机器学习(ML)模型。由于数据可能包含不同的值，因此购物者在进行最终交易之前评估最有价值的数据至关重要。然而，评估ML数据通常需要云访问购物者的ML模型和卖家的数据，这两者都是敏感的。现有的基于云的数据市场没有一个能够在保持模型隐私和数据隐私的同时实现ML数据评估。在本文中，我们在基于云的数据市场上开发了一个隐私保护的ML数据评估框架，以保护购物者的ML模型和卖家的数据。首先，我们提供了一个隐私保护框架，允许购物者和销售者分别加密他们的模型和数据，同时在云中保留数据功能和模型功能。然后，我们开发了一个保护隐私的数据选择协议，使云能够帮助购物者选择最有价值的ML数据。此外，我们开发了一个保护隐私的数据验证协议，允许购物者进一步检查所选数据的质量。实验结果表明，与随机数据选择相比，我们的方法可以减少60%的预测误差。
papers.title_zh: 购买前尝试：对基于云的机器学习数据市场进行隐私数据评估

papers.title: VIA: Analyzing Device Interfaces of Protected Virtual Machines
papers.authors: Felicitas Hetzelt, Martin Radev, Robert Buhren, Mathias Morbitzer, Jean-Pierre Seifert
papers.abstract: Both AMD and Intel have presented technologies for confidential computing in cloud environments. The proposed solutions — AMD SEV (-ES, -SNP) and Intel TDX — protect VMs (VMs) against attacks from higher privileged layers through memory encryption and integrity protection. This model of computation draws a new trust boundary between virtual devices and the VM, which in so far lacks thorough examination. In this paper, we therefore present an analysis of the virtual device interface and discuss several attack vectors against a protected VM. Further, we develop and evaluate VIA, an automated analysis tool to detect cases of improper sanitization of input recieved via the virtual device interface. VIA improves upon existing approaches for the automated analysis of device interfaces in the following aspects: (i) support for virtualization relevant buses, (ii) efficient Direct Memory Access (DMA) support and (iii) performance. VIA builds upon the Linux Kernel Library and clang’s libfuzzer to fuzz the communication between the driver and the device via MMIO, PIO, and DMA. An evaluation of VIA shows that it performs 570 executions per second on average and improves performance compared to existing approaches by an average factor of 2706. Using VIA, we analyzed 22 drivers in Linux 5.10.0-rc6, thereby uncovering 50 bugs and initiating multiple patches to the virtual device driver interface of Linux. To prove our findings’ criticality under the threat model of AMD SEV and Intel TDX, we showcase three exemplary attacks based on the bugs found. The attacks enable a malicious hypervisor to corrupt the memory and gain code execution in protected VMs with SEV-ES and are theoretically applicable to SEV-SNP and TDX.
papers.abstract_zh: AMD和英特尔都展示了在云环境中进行保密计算的技术。AMD SEV (-ES，-SNP)和英特尔TDX提出的解决方案通过内存加密和完整性保护来保护虚拟机(VM)免受来自更高特权层的攻击。这种计算模型在虚拟设备和虚拟机之间画出了一个新的信任边界，到目前为止还缺乏彻底的检查。因此，在本文中，我们对虚拟设备接口进行了分析，并讨论了针对受保护虚拟机的几种攻击手段。此外，我们还开发和评估了VIA，这是一款自动分析工具，用于检测通过虚拟设备接口接收的输入处理不当的情况。VIA在以下方面改进了现有的设备接口自动分析方法:(I)对虚拟化相关总线的支持，(ii)高效的直接存储器访问(DMA)支持，以及(iii)性能。VIA构建于Linux内核库和clang的libfuzzer之上，通过MMIO、PIO和DMA来模糊驱动程序和设备之间的通信。对VIA的评估表明，它平均每秒执行570次，与现有方法相比，性能平均提高了2706倍。使用VIA，我们分析了Linux 5.10.0-rc6中的22个驱动程序，从而发现了50个错误，并启动了对Linux的虚拟设备驱动程序接口的多个补丁。为了证明我们的发现在AMD SEV和英特尔TDX的威胁模型下的重要性，我们展示了基于所发现的漏洞的三个示例性攻击。这些攻击使恶意虚拟机管理程序能够破坏内存，并在带有服务的受保护虚拟机中执行代码，理论上适用于服务单端口和TDX。
papers.title_zh: 通过：分析受保护虚拟机的设备界面

papers.title: Rocky: Replicating Block Devices for Tamper and Failure Resistant Edge-based Virtualized Desktop Infrastructure
papers.authors: Beom Heyn Kim, Hyoungshick Kim
papers.abstract: Recently, edge-based virtual desktop infrastructure (EdgeVDI), which brings the power of virtualized desktop infrastructure to cloudlets closer to users, has been considered as an attractive solution for WAN mobility. However, ransomware and wiper malware are becoming more and more prevalent, which can impose serious cybersecurity threats to EdgeVDI users. Existing tamper-resistant solutions cannot deal with cloudlet failures. In this paper, we propose Rocky, the first distributed replicated block device for EdgeVDI that can recover from tampering attacks and failures. The key enabler is replicating to store a consistent write sequence across cloudlets as an append-only immutable mutation history. In addition, Rocky uses a replication broker to allow heterogenous cloudlets to control replication rates at their pace and reduces both disk space and network bandwidth consumption by coalescing writes for both uplink and downlink. To show the feasibility of Rocky, we implemented Rocky in Java. The experimental results show that Rocky’s write and read throughputs are similar to those of a baseline device with 8.4% and 11.9% additional overheads, respectively. In addition, we could reduce repeated writes by 88.5% and 100% for editing presentation slides and a photo, respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，基于边缘的虚拟桌面基础设施(EdgeVDI)将虚拟桌面基础设施的功能带到了离用户更近的cloudlets，被认为是WAN移动性的一个有吸引力的解决方案。然而，勒索软件和wiper恶意软件正变得越来越普遍，这可以对EdgeVDI用户造成严重的网络安全威胁。现有的防篡改解决方案不能处理小云故障。在本文中，我们提出了Rocky，它是第一个用于EdgeVDI的分布式复制块设备，可以从篡改攻击和故障中恢复。关键的促成因素是复制，以跨cloudlets存储一致的写序列，作为只附加不可变的变化历史。此外，Rocky使用复制代理允许异构cloudlets按照自己的速度控制复制速率，并通过合并上行链路和下行链路的写入来减少磁盘空间和网络带宽消耗。为了展示Rocky的可行性，我们用Java实现了Rocky。实验结果表明，Rocky的写入和读取吞吐量与基准设备类似，分别增加了8.4%和11.9%的开销。此外，对于编辑演示幻灯片和照片，我们可以分别减少88.5%和100%的重复写入。
papers.title_zh: Rocky：复制篡改和抗故障边缘的虚拟桌面基础架构的设备

papers.title: On Detecting Growing-Up Behaviors of Malicious Accounts in Privacy-Centric Mobile Social Networks
papers.authors: Zijie Yang, Binghui Wang, Haoran Li, Dong Yuan, Zhuotao Liu, Neil Zhenqiang Gong, Chang Liu, Qi Li, Xiao Liang, Shaofeng Hu
papers.abstract: Privacy-centric mobile social network (PC-MSN), which allows users to build intimate and private social circles, is an increasingly popular type of online social networks (OSNs). Because of strict usage policy enforced by PC-MSNs (such as restricted account and content access), malicious accounts (or users) have to act like normal accounts to accumulate credentials before committing malicious activities. Therefore, analysis merely relying on static account profile information or social graphs is ineffective to detect such growing-up accounts. Besides, existing behavior-based malicious account detection methods fail to effectively detect growing-up accounts who pretend to be benign and have similar behaviors to benign users during the growing-up stage. In this paper, we present the first comprehensive study of growing-up behaviors of malicious accounts in WeChat, one of the major PC-MSNs with billions of daily active users across the globe. Our analysis reveals that the behavior patterns of growing-up accounts are very similar to that of benign users, and yet quite different from typical malicious accounts. Based on this observation, we design Muses, a detection system that can automatically identify subtle yet effective behaviors (features) to distinguish growing-up accounts before they engage in obvious malicious campaigns. Muses is unsupervised so that it can adapt to new malicious campaigns even if the behavior patterns of malicious accounts are unknown a priori. In particular, Muses addresses the limitations of the previous supervised techniques, i.e., requiring manually labeled training sets, which is time-consuming and costly. We evaluate Muses on a large-scale anonymized dataset from WeChat with roughly 440k accounts. The experimental results show that Muses achieves 2x recall, with similar precision, compared with the previous methods. Specifically, Muses detects over 82% growing-up accounts with a precision of 90% and achieves an AUC of 0.95. Notably, Muses can also effectively detect growing-up accounts even if malicious users applied various evasion strategies.
papers.abstract_zh: 以隐私为中心的移动社交网络(PC-MSN)允许用户建立亲密和私人的社交圈子，是一种越来越受欢迎的在线社交网络类型。由于PC-MSN执行严格的使用策略(如限制帐户和内容访问)，恶意帐户(或用户)必须像正常帐户一样在实施恶意活动之前积累凭证。因此，仅仅依靠静态账户档案信息或社交图的分析对于检测这种成长账户是无效的。此外，现有的基于行为的恶意账户检测方法不能有效地检测在成长阶段伪装成良性并具有与良性用户相似行为的成长账户。在本文中，我们首次全面研究了微信中恶意账户的增长行为，微信是全球日活跃用户数十亿的主要PC-MSN之一。我们的分析显示，成长帐户的行为模式与良性用户非常相似，但与典型的恶意帐户截然不同。基于这一观察，我们设计了Muses，一个可以自动识别微妙而有效的行为(特征)的检测系统，以在成长中的帐户参与明显的恶意活动之前区分它们。Muses是无人监管的，因此它可以适应新的恶意活动，即使恶意帐户的行为模式事先未知。特别是，Muses解决了以前监督技术的局限性，即需要手动标记训练集，这既耗时又昂贵。我们在来自微信的大规模匿名数据集上评估了Muses，该数据集包含大约44万个账户。实验结果表明，与以前的方法相比，Muses的召回率提高了2倍，且准确率相近。具体来说，Muses以90%的精度检测超过82%的成长账户，并实现了0.95的AUC。值得注意的是，Muses还可以有效地检测成长账户，即使恶意用户采用了各种规避策略。
papers.title_zh: 在以隐私为中心的移动社交网络中检测恶意帐户的成长行为

papers.title: ReCFA: Resilient Control-Flow Attestation
papers.authors: Yumei Zhang, Xinzhi Liu, Cong Sun, Dongrui Zeng, Gang Tan, Xiao Kan, Siqi Ma
papers.abstract: Recent IoT applications gradually adapt more complicated end systems with commodity software. Ensuring the runtime integrity of these software is a challenging task for the remote controller or cloud services. Popular enforcement is the runtime remote attestation which requires the end system (prover) to generate evidence for its runtime behavior and a remote trusted verifier to attest the evidence. Control-flow attestation is a kind of runtime attestation that provides diagnoses towards the remote control-flow hijacking at the prover. Most of these attestation approaches focus on small or embedded software. The recent advance to attesting complicated software depends on the source code and CFG traversing to measure the checkpoint-separated subpaths, which may be unavailable for commodity software and cause possible context missing between consecutive subpaths in the measurements. In this work, we propose a resilient control-flow attestation (ReCFA), which does not need the offline measurement of all legitimate control-flow paths, thus scalable to be used on complicated commodity software. Our main contribution is a multi-phase approach to condensing the runtime control-flow events; as a result, the vast amount of control-flow events are abstracted into a deliverable size. The condensing approach consists of filtering skippable call sites, folding program-structure related control-flow events, and a greedy compression. Our approach is implemented with binary-level static analysis and instrumentation. We employ a shadow stack mechanism at the verifier to enforce context-sensitive control-flow integrity and diagnose the compromised control-flow events violating the security policy. The experimental results on real-world benchmarks show both the efficiency of the control-flow condensing and the effectiveness of security enforcement.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的物联网应用逐渐采用商用软件来适应更复杂的终端系统。对于远程控制器或云服务来说，确保这些软件的运行时完整性是一项具有挑战性的任务。流行的实施是运行时远程证明，它要求终端系统(证明者)为其运行时行为生成证据，并要求远程可信验证者证明该证据。控制流证明是一种运行时证明，它在证明者处提供对远程控制流劫持的诊断。这些证明方法大多集中在小型或嵌入式软件上。证明复杂软件的最新进展依赖于源代码和CFG遍历来测量检查点分隔的子路径，这对于商用软件可能是不可用的，并且导致测量中连续子路径之间可能的上下文丢失。在本文中，我们提出了一种弹性控制流证明(ReCFA ),它不需要对所有合法的控制流路径进行离线测量，因此可以扩展到复杂的商业软件中。我们的主要贡献是压缩运行时控制流事件的多阶段方法；结果，大量的控制流事件被抽象成一个可交付的大小。压缩方法包括过滤可跳过的调用点、折叠程序结构相关的控制流事件和贪婪压缩。我们的方法是用二进制级静态分析和工具实现的。我们在验证者处使用影子栈机制来加强上下文敏感的控制流完整性，并诊断违反安全策略的受损控制流事件。在真实基准上的实验结果表明了控制流压缩的效率和安全实施的有效性。
papers.title_zh: RECFA：弹性控制流证明

papers.title: Practical Attestation for Edge Devices Running Compute Heavy Machine Learning Applications
papers.authors: Ismi Abidi, Vireshwar Kumar, Rijurekha Sen
papers.abstract: Machine Learning (EdgeML) algorithms on edge devices facilitate safety-critical applications like building security management and smart city interventions. However, their wired/wireless connections with the Internet make such platforms vulnerable to attacks compromising the embedded software. We find that in the prior works, the issue of regular runtime integrity assessment of the deployed software with negligible EdgeML performance degradation is still unresolved. In this paper, we present PracAttest, a practical runtime attestation framework for embedded devices running compute-heavy EdgeML applications. Unlike the conventional remote attestation schemes that check the entire software in each attestation event, PracAttest segments the software and randomizes the integrity check of these segments over short random attestation intervals. The segmentation coupled with the randomization leads to a novel performance-vs-security trade-off that can be tuned per the EdgeML application’s performance requirements. Additionally, we implement three realistic EdgeML benchmarks for pollution measurement, traffic intersection control, and face identification, using state-of-the-art neural network and computer vision algorithms. We specify and verify security properties for these benchmarks and evaluate the efficacy of PracAttest in attesting the verified software. PracAttest provides 50x-80x speedup over the state-of-the-art baseline in terms of mean attestation time, with negligible impact on application performance. We believe that the novel performance-vs-security trade-off facilitated by PracAttest will expedite the adoption of runtime attestation on edge platforms.
papers.abstract_zh: 边缘设备上的机器学习(EdgeML)算法有助于安全关键型应用，如建筑安全管理和智能城市干预。然而，它们与互联网的有线/无线连接使得这些平台容易受到损害嵌入式软件的攻击。我们发现，在以前的工作中，在EdgeML性能下降可以忽略的情况下，对部署的软件进行定期运行时完整性评估的问题仍然没有解决。在本文中，我们介绍了PracAttest，这是一个实用的运行时证明框架，适用于运行计算密集型EdgeML应用程序的嵌入式设备。与在每个证明事件中检查整个软件的传统远程证明方案不同，PracAttest将软件分段，并在短的随机证明间隔内随机检查这些分段的完整性。分段与随机化相结合导致了一种新的性能与安全性的权衡，可以根据EdgeML应用程序的性能要求进行调整。此外，我们使用最先进的神经网络和计算机视觉算法，实现了污染测量、交通路口控制和人脸识别三个现实的EdgeML基准。我们指定并验证这些基准的安全属性，并评估PracAttest在验证软件方面的有效性。就平均证明时间而言，PracAttest提供了50-80倍的速度提升，对应用程序性能的影响可以忽略不计。我们相信，PracAttest促成的新的性能与安全权衡将加速运行时证明在edge平台上的采用。
papers.title_zh: 用于运行重型机器学习应用程序的边缘设备的实际证明

papers.title: Is Visualization Enough? Evaluating the Efficacy of MUD-Visualizer in Enabling Ease of Deployment for Manufacturer Usage Description (MUD)
papers.authors: Vafa Andalibi, Jayati Dev, DongInn Kim, Eliot Lear, L. Jean Camp
papers.abstract: The IETF Manufacturer Usage Description (MUD) standard was designed to protect IoT devices through network micro-segmentation. In practice, this is implemented using per-device access control that is defined by the manufacturer. This access control is embedded in a “MUD-File”, which is transferred to the user’s network during the onboarding process, and may contain from one to hundreds of rules. Validating these rules for each device can be a challenge, particularly when devices are interacting. In response, MUD-Visualizer was designed to simplify the validation of individual and interacting MUD-Files through straightforward visualizations. In this work, we report on an evaluation of the usability and efficacy of MUD-Visualizer. The results illustrate that not only it is more usable compared to manual analysis, but the participants that used MUD-Visualizer also had more accurate results in less time.
papers.abstract_zh: IETF制造商使用描述(MUD)标准旨在通过网络微分段来保护物联网设备。实际上，这是使用制造商定义的每个设备的访问控制来实现的。这种访问控制嵌入在“MUD文件”中，该文件在入职过程中传输到用户的网络，可能包含一到数百条规则。为每个设备验证这些规则可能是一个挑战，尤其是在设备交互时。作为回应，MUD-Visualizer被设计成通过直观的可视化来简化单个和交互MUD文件的验证。在这项工作中，我们报告了泥浆可视化工具的可用性和有效性的评估。结果表明，与手动分析相比，它不仅更有用，而且使用MUD-Visualizer的参与者也在更短的时间内获得了更准确的结果。
papers.title_zh: 可视化足够吗？ 评估泥浆访问者在使制造商用法描述（泥）方面的效力

papers.title: A Cross-role and Bi-national Analysis on Security Efforts and Constraints of Software Development Projects
papers.authors: Fumihiro Kanei, Ayako Akiyama Hasegawa, Eitaro Shioji, Mitsuaki Akiyama
papers.abstract: Software security, which is often regarded as a non-functional requirement, tends to be less prioritized than other explicit requirements in development projects. For designing security measures that can be used in software development, we must understand the obstacles that prevent the adoption of secure software development practices. In this study, we quantitatively analyzed security efforts and constraints of software development projects through an online survey of software development professionals in the US and Japan (N=664). We revealed how certain characteristics of a development project, such as the project’s contractual relationships or the software’s target users, influence security efforts and constraints. In addition, by comparing the survey results of two groups (developers and managers), we revealed how the gap in their security efforts and constraints influences software security. We believe the results provide insights toward designing usable measures to assist security-related decision-making in software development and conducting appropriate surveys targeting software development professionals.
papers.abstract_zh: 软件安全性通常被视为非功能性需求，在开发项目中，它的优先级往往低于其他明确的需求。为了设计可以在软件开发中使用的安全措施，我们必须了解阻止采用安全软件开发实践的障碍。在这项研究中，我们通过对美国和日本的软件开发专业人员(N=664)进行在线调查，定量分析了软件开发项目的安全工作和限制。我们揭示了开发项目的某些特征，例如项目的契约关系或软件的目标用户，是如何影响安全工作和约束的。此外，通过比较两组(开发人员和管理人员)的调查结果，我们揭示了他们在安全工作和约束方面的差距是如何影响软件安全性的。我们相信，这些结果为设计有用的措施来帮助软件开发中与安全相关的决策以及针对软件开发专业人员进行适当的调查提供了见解。
papers.title_zh: 对软件开发项目的安全工作和限制的跨力和双国分析

papers.title: An Efficient Man-Machine Recognition Method Based On Mouse Trajectory Feature De-redundancy
papers.authors: Xiaofeng Lu, Zhenhan Feng, Jupeng Xia
papers.abstract: Behavioral authentication codes are widely used to resist abnor- mal network traffic. Mouse sliding behavior as an authentication method has the characteristics of less private information and easy data sampling. This paper analyses the attack mode of the machine sliding track data, extracts the physical quantity characteristics of the sliding path. Features importance scores are used to select the candidate features, and further Pearson correlation co- efficient is used to filter out the features with high correlation. This paper use XGBoost model as a classifier. In addition, an efficient evasion attack detection method is proposed to deal with complex human behavior evasion attacks. The experiment was carried out on two mouse sliding datasets. The experimental results show that the proposed method achieves 99.09% accuracy and 99.88% recall rate, and can complete the man-machine identification in 2ms.
papers.abstract_zh: 行为认证码被广泛用于抵御异常网络流量。鼠标滑动行为作为一种认证方式，具有隐私信息少、数据采样容易的特点。分析了机器滑动轨迹数据的攻击方式，提取了滑动轨迹的物理量特征。使用特征重要性分数来选择候选特征，并且进一步使用皮尔逊相关系数来过滤掉具有高相关性的特征。本文使用XGBoost模型作为分类器。此外，针对复杂的人类行为规避攻击，提出了一种有效的规避攻击检测方法。实验在两个鼠标滑动数据集上进行。实验结果表明，该方法达到了99.09%的准确率和99.88%的召回率，能够在2ms内完成人机识别。
papers.title_zh: 一种基于鼠标轨迹特征去降差的高效人机识别方法

papers.title: OPay: an Orientation-based Contactless Payment Solution Against Passive Attacks
papers.authors: Mahshid Mehr Nezhad, Feng Hao
papers.abstract: The usage of contactless payment has surged in recent years, especially during the Covid19 pandemic. A Passive relay (PR) attack against a contactless card is a well-known threat, which has been extensively studied in the past with many solutions available. However, with the mass deployment of mobile point-of-sale (mPoS) devices, there emerges a new threat, which we call mPoS-based passive (MP) attacks. In an MP attack, the various components required in a PR attack, including an NFC reader, a wireless link, a remote card emulator, and a remote payment terminal, are conveniently combined into one compact device, hence the attack becomes much easier. Since the attacker and the victim are in the same location, the previous distance bounding or ambient sensor-based solutions are no longer effective. In this paper, we propose a new orientation-based payment solution called OPay. OPay builds on the observation that when a user makes a legitimate contactless payment, the card and the terminal surface are naturally aligned, but in an attack scenario, this situation is less likely to occur. This allows us to distinguish the legitimate payments from passive attacks based on measuring the alignment of orientations. We build a concrete prototype using two Arduino boards embedded with NFC and motion sensors to act as a card and a payment terminal respectively. To evaluate the feasibility, we recruited twenty volunteers in a user study. Participants generally find OPay easy to use, fast and reliable. Experiments show that OPay can substantially reduce the attack success rate by 85-99% with little inconvenience to real users. To our best knowledge, OPay is the first solution that can prevent both the PR and MP attacks, while preserving the existing usage model in contactless payment.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，非接触式支付的使用激增，尤其是在Covid19疫情期间。针对非接触式卡的被动中继(PR)攻击是一种众所周知的威胁，过去已经通过许多可用的解决方案对此进行了广泛的研究。然而，随着移动销售点(mPoS)设备的大规模部署，出现了一种新的威胁，我们称之为基于mPoS的被动(MP)攻击。在MP攻击中，PR攻击所需的各种组件，包括NFC读卡器、无线链路、远程卡仿真器和远程支付终端，被方便地组合到一个紧凑的设备中，因此攻击变得容易得多。由于攻击者和受害者在同一位置，以前的距离限制或基于环境传感器的解决方案不再有效。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的基于方向的支付解决方案，称为OPay。OPay基于以下观察:当用户进行合法的非接触式支付时，卡和终端表面自然对齐，但在攻击场景中，这种情况不太可能发生。这使我们能够根据测量方向的一致性来区分合法支付和被动攻击。我们使用嵌入NFC和运动传感器的两块Arduino板构建了一个具体的原型，分别作为卡和支付终端。为了评估可行性，我们在一项用户研究中招募了20名志愿者。参与者普遍认为OPay易于使用、快速可靠。实验表明，OPay可以在不增加真实用户不便的情况下，将攻击成功率降低85-99%。据我们所知，OPay是第一个可以防止PR和MP攻击的解决方案，同时保留了非接触式支付的现有使用模式。
papers.title_zh: OPAY：基于方向的非接触式支付解决方案针对被动攻击

papers.title: What's in a Cyber Threat Intelligence sharing platform?: A mixed-methods user experience investigation of MISP
papers.authors: Borce Stojkovski, Gabriele Lenzini, Vincent Koenig, Salvador Rivas
papers.abstract: The ever-increasing scale and complexity of cyber attacks and cyber-criminal activities necessitate secure and effective sharing of cyber threat intelligence (CTI) among a diverse set of stakeholders and communities. CTI sharing platforms are becoming indispensable tools for cooperative and collaborative cybersecurity. Nevertheless, despite the growing research in this area, the emphasis is often placed on the technical aspects, incentives, or implications associated with CTI sharing, as opposed to investigating challenges encountered by users of such platforms. To date, user experience (UX) aspects remain largely unexplored. This paper offers a unique contribution towards understanding the constraining and enabling factors of security information sharing within one of the leading platforms. MISP is an open source CTI sharing platform used by more than 6,000 organizations worldwide. As a technically-advanced CTI sharing platform it aims to cater for a diverse set of security information workers with distinct needs and objectives. In this respect, MISP has to pay an equal amount of attention to the UX in order to maximize and optimize the quantity and quality of threat information that is contributed and consumed. Using mixed methods we shed light on the strengths and weaknesses of MISP from an end-users’ perspective and discuss the role UX could play in effective CTI sharing. We conclude with an outline of future work and open challenges worth further exploring in this nascent, yet highly important socio-technical context.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络攻击和网络犯罪活动的规模和复杂性不断增加，这使得在不同的利益相关方和社区之间安全有效地共享网络威胁情报(CTI)成为必要。CTI共享平台正在成为合作和协作网络安全不可或缺的工具。然而，尽管这一领域的研究不断增加，但重点往往放在与CTI共享相关的技术方面、激励或影响上，而不是调查此类平台的用户所遇到的挑战。迄今为止，用户体验(UX)在很大程度上仍未被探索。本文为理解在一个领先的平台中安全信息共享的限制和促进因素做出了独特的贡献。MISP是一个开源的CTI共享平台，被全球6000多家组织使用。作为一个技术先进的CTI共享平台，它旨在满足具有不同需求和目标的安全信息工作者的不同需求。在这方面，MISP必须对UX给予同等重视，以便最大限度地提高和优化所提供和消费的威胁信息的数量和质量。使用混合方法，我们从最终用户的角度揭示了MISP的优势和劣势，并讨论了UX在有效的CTI共享中可以发挥的作用。最后，我们概述了未来的工作和开放的挑战，值得在这个新生的，但非常重要的社会技术背景下进一步探讨。
papers.title_zh: 网络威胁情报共享平台有什么？：混合方法用户体验MISP调查

papers.title: They See Me Rollin': Inherent Vulnerability of the Rolling Shutter in CMOS Image Sensors
papers.authors: Sebastian Köhler, Giulio Lovisotto, Simon Birnbach, Richard Baker, Ivan Martinovic
papers.abstract: In this paper, we describe how the electronic rolling shutter in CMOS image sensors can be exploited using a bright, modulated light source (e.g., an inexpensive, off-the-shelf laser), to inject fine-grained image disruptions. We demonstrate the attack on seven different CMOS cameras, ranging from cheap IoT to semi-professional surveillance cameras, to highlight the wide applicability of the rolling shutter attack. We model the fundamental factors affecting a rolling shutter attack in an uncontrolled setting. We then perform an exhaustive evaluation of the attack’s effect on the task of object detection, investigating the effect of attack parameters. We validate our model against empirical data collected on two separate cameras, showing that by simply using information from the camera’s datasheet the adversary can accurately predict the injected distortion size and optimize their attack accordingly. We find that an adversary can hide up to 75% of objects perceived by state-of-the-art detectors by selecting appropriate attack parameters. We also investigate the stealthiness of the attack in comparison to a naïve camera blinding attack, showing that common image distortion metrics can not detect the attack presence. Therefore, we present a new, accurate and lightweight enhancement to the backbone network of an object detector to recognize rolling shutter attacks. Overall, our results indicate that rolling shutter attacks can substantially reduce the performance and reliability of vision-based intelligent systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们描述了如何利用明亮的调制光源(例如廉价的现成激光器)开发CMOS图像传感器中的电子卷帘快门，以注入精细的图像中断。我们展示了对七种不同的CMOS摄像机的攻击，从廉价的物联网到半专业的监控摄像机，以突出卷帘式快门攻击的广泛适用性。我们模拟了在不受控制的环境中影响卷帘式快门攻击的基本因素。然后，我们对攻击对目标检测任务的影响进行详尽的评估，调查攻击参数的影响。我们根据在两台独立摄像机上收集的经验数据来验证我们的模型，结果表明，只需使用摄像机数据手册中的信息，对手就可以准确预测注入的失真大小，并相应地优化他们的攻击。我们发现，通过选择适当的攻击参数，对手可以隐藏高达75%的由最先进的探测器感知的对象。我们还研究了攻击的隐蔽性，并与单纯的相机致盲攻击进行了比较，表明普通的图像失真度量不能检测攻击的存在。因此，我们提出了一种新的，准确的和轻量级的增强对象检测器的骨干网络，以识别卷帘式快门攻击。总的来说，我们的结果表明，卷帘式快门攻击可以大大降低基于视觉的智能系统的性能和可靠性。
papers.title_zh: 他们看到我滚动：CMOS图像传感器中滚动快门的固有脆弱性

papers.title: Evaluating the Effectiveness of Protection Jamming Devices in Mitigating Smart Speaker Eavesdropping Attacks Using Gaussian White Noise
papers.authors: Payton Walker, Nitesh Saxena
papers.abstract: Protection Jamming Devices (PJD) are specialized tools designed to sit on top of virtual assistant (VA) smart speakers and hinder them from “hearing” nearby user speech. PJDs aim to protect you from eavesdropping attacks by injecting a jamming signal directly into the microphones of the smart speaker. However, current signal processing routines can be used to reduce noise and enhance speech contained in noisy audio samples. Therefore, we identify a potential vulnerability for speech eavesdropping via smart speaker recordings, even when a PJD is being used. If an attacker can gain access to or facilitate smart speaker recordings they may be able to compromise a user’s speech with successful noise cancellation. Specifically, we are interested in the potential for Gaussian white noise (GWN) to be an effective jamming signal for a PJD. To our knowledge, the effectiveness of white noise and PJDs to protect against eavesdropping attacks has yet to receive a systematic evaluation that includes physical experiments with an actual PJD implementation. In this work we construct our own PJD, specialized for consistent experimentation, to simulate an attack scenario where recordings from a smart speaker, in the presence of normal speech and the PJDs jamming signal, are recovered. We perform substantial data collection under different settings to build a repository of 1500 recovered audio samples. We applied post-processing on our dataset and conducted an extensive signal/speech quality analysis including both time and frequency domain inspection, and evaluation of metrics including cross-correlation, SNR, and PESQ. Lastly, we performed feature extraction (MFCC) and built machine learning classifiers for tasks including speech (digit) recognition, speaker identification, and gender recognition. We also attempted song recognition using the Shazam app. For all speech recognition tasks that we attempted, we were able to achieve classification accuracies above that of random guessing (46% for digit recognition, 51% for speaker identification, 80% for gender identification), as well as demonstrate successful song recognition. These results highlight the real potential for attackers to compromise user speech, to some extent, using smart speaker recordings; even if the smart speaker is protected by a PJD.
papers.abstract_zh: 保护干扰设备(PJD)是一种专门的工具，旨在位于虚拟助理(VA)智能扬声器的顶部，阻止它们“听到”附近的用户语音。pjd旨在通过将干扰信号直接注入智能扬声器的麦克风来保护您免受窃听攻击。然而，当前的信号处理例程可以用来降低噪声并增强包含在噪声音频样本中的语音。因此，我们发现了通过智能扬声器录音进行语音窃听的潜在漏洞，即使在使用PJD时也是如此。如果攻击者能够访问或协助智能扬声器录音，他们就有可能成功消除噪音，从而破坏用户的语音。具体来说，我们对高斯白噪声(GWN)成为PJD有效干扰信号的潜力感兴趣。据我们所知，白噪声和PJD防止窃听攻击的有效性还没有得到系统的评估，包括实际PJD实现的物理实验。在这项工作中，我们构建了我们自己的PJD，专门用于一致的实验，以模拟一个攻击场景，其中在正常语音和PJDs干扰信号存在的情况下，来自智能扬声器的记录被恢复。我们在不同的设置下执行大量的数据收集，以建立1500个恢复的音频样本的存储库。我们对数据集进行了后处理，并进行了广泛的信号/语音质量分析，包括时域和频域检查，以及包括互相关、SNR和PESQ在内的指标评估。最后，我们执行特征提取(MFCC)并为包括语音(数字)识别、说话人识别和性别识别在内的任务构建机器学习分类器。我们还尝试使用Shazam应用程序进行歌曲识别。对于我们尝试的所有语音识别任务，我们能够实现高于随机猜测的分类准确度(数字识别为46%，说话人识别为51%，性别识别为80%)，并展示了成功的歌曲识别。这些结果强调了攻击者使用智能扬声器录音在某种程度上危害用户语音的真实潜力；即使智能音箱有PJD保护。
papers.title_zh: 使用高斯白噪声评估保护设备在减轻智能扬声器窃听攻击方面的有效性

papers.title: S2-CAN: Sufficiently Secure Controller Area Network
papers.authors: Mert D. Pesé, Jay W. Schauer, Junhui Li, Kang G. Shin
papers.abstract: As automotive security concerns are rising, the Controller Area Network (CAN) — the de facto standard of in-vehicle communication protocol — has come under scrutiny due to its lack of encryption and authentication. Several vulnerabilities, such as eavesdropping, spoofing, and replay attacks, have shown that the current implementation needs to be extended. Both academic and commercial solutions for a Secure CAN (S-CAN) have been proposed, but OEMs have not yet integrated them into their products. The main reasons for this lack of adoption are their heavy use of limited computational resources in the vehicle, increased latency that can lead to missed deadlines for safety-critical messages, as well as insufficient space available in a CAN frame to include a Message Authentication Code (MAC). By making a trade-off between security and performance, we develop S2-CAN, which overcomes the aforementioned problems of S-CAN. We leverage protocol-specific properties of CAN instead of using cryptographic primitives and design a “sufficiently secure” alternative CAN with minimal overhead on resources and latency. We evaluate the security of S2-CAN in four real-world vehicles by an automated vehicular attack tool. We finally show that CAN security can be guaranteed by the correct choice of a design parameter while achieving acceptable performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着汽车安全问题的增加，控制器局域网(CAN)——车载通信协议的事实标准——因其缺乏加密和认证而受到审查。一些漏洞，如窃听、欺骗和重放攻击，表明当前的实现需要扩展。已经提出了安全罐(S-CAN)的学术和商业解决方案，但是原始设备制造商还没有将它们集成到他们的产品中。这种缺乏采用的主要原因是它们大量使用车辆中有限的计算资源，延迟增加可能导致错过安全关键消息的最后期限，以及can帧中没有足够的可用空间来包含消息认证码(MAC)。通过在安全性和性能之间进行权衡，我们开发了S2 CAN，它克服了S-CAN的上述问题。我们利用CAN的特定于协议的属性，而不是使用密码原语，并设计一个“足够安全”的替代CAN，具有最小的资源开销和延迟。我们使用自动车辆攻击工具评估了S2 CAN在四辆真实车辆中的安全性。最后，我们证明了在获得可接受的性能的同时，通过正确选择设计参数可以保证CAN安全性。
papers.title_zh: S2-can：足够安全的控制器区域网络

papers.title: Crypto-Chain: A Relay Resilience Framework for Smart Vehicles
papers.authors: Abubakar Sadiq Sani, Dong Yuan, Elisa Bertino, Zhao Yang Dong
papers.abstract: Recent findings show that smart vehicles can be exposed to relay attacks resulting from weaknesses in cryptographic operations, such as authentication and key derivation, or poor implementation of these operations. Relay attacks refer to attacks in which authentication is evaded without needing to attack a smart vehicle itself. They are a recurrent problem in practice. In this paper, we formulate the necessary relay resilience settings for strengthening authentication and key derivation and achieving the secure design and efficient implementation of cryptographic protocols based on universal composability, which allows the modular design and analysis of cryptographic protocols. We introduce Crypto-Chain, a relay resilience framework that extends Kusters’s universal composition theorem on a fixed number of protocol systems to prevent bypass of cryptographic operations and avoid implementation errors. Our framework provides an ideal crypto-chain functionality that supports several cryptographic primitives. Furthermore, we provide an ideal functionality for mutual authentication and key derivation in Crypto-Chain by which cryptographic protocols can use cryptographic operations, knowledge about the computation time of the operations, and cryptographic timestamps to ensure relay resilience. As a proof of concept, we first propose and implement a mutual authentication and key derivation protocol (MKD) that confirms the efficiency and relay resilience capabilities of Crypto-Chain and then apply Crypto-Chain to fix two protocols used in smart vehicles, namely Megamos Crypto and Hitag-AES/Pro.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的发现表明，智能车辆可能会受到中继攻击，这些攻击是由加密操作(如认证和密钥推导)中的弱点或这些操作的不良实施造成的。中继攻击是指不需要攻击智能车辆本身就可以逃避认证的攻击。它们是实践中反复出现的问题。在本文中，我们制定了必要的中继弹性设置，以加强认证和密钥推导，并实现基于通用可组合性的密码协议的安全设计和高效实现，这允许密码协议的模块化设计和分析。我们引入了Crypto-Chain，这是一个中继弹性框架，它在固定数量的协议系统上扩展了Kusters的通用合成定理，以防止加密操作的旁路并避免实现错误。我们的框架提供了一个理想的密码链功能，支持几个密码原语。此外，我们为密码链中的相互认证和密钥推导提供了理想的功能，通过该功能，密码协议可以使用密码操作、关于操作的计算时间的知识以及密码时间戳来确保中继弹性。作为概念验证，我们首先提出并实现了一个相互认证和密钥衍生协议(MKD ),该协议确认了加密链的效率和中继弹性能力，然后应用加密链来修复智能车辆中使用的两个协议，即Megamos加密和Hitag-AES/Pro。
papers.title_zh: 加密链：智能车辆的继电器弹性框架

papers.title: Advanced System Resiliency Based on Virtualization Techniques for IoT Devices
papers.authors: Jonas Röckl, Mykolai Protsenko, Monika Huber, Tilo Müller, Felix C. Freiling
papers.abstract: An increasing number of powerful devices are equipped with network connectivity and are connected to the Internet of Things (IoT). Influenced by the steady growth of computing power of the devices, the paradigm of IoT-based service deployment is expected to change, following the example of cloud-based infrastructure: An embedded platform can be provided as-a-service to several independent application service suppliers. This fosters additional challenges concerning security and isolation. At the same time, recently revealed critical vulnerabilities like Ripple20 and Amnesia:33 show that embedded devices are not spared from wide-spread attacks. In this paper, we define new trusted computing concepts, focusing on privilege separation among several entities sharing one physical device. The concepts guarantee remote recovery capabilities within a bounded amount of time, even if notable portions of the software stack have been compromised. We derive a resilient system architecture suitable for the secure operation of multiple isolated services on one embedded device. We integrate an interface for detecting intrusions and anomalies to enable the automatic recovery of compromised devices and prototype our system on a Nitrogen8M development board. Our evaluation shows that the overhead in terms of network throughput and CPU performance is low so that we believe that our concept is a meaningful step towards more resilient future IoT devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 越来越多的强大设备配备了网络连接，并连接到物联网(IoT)。受设备计算能力稳定增长的影响，基于物联网的服务部署模式有望改变，效仿基于云的基础设施的例子:嵌入式平台可以作为服务提供给几家独立的应用服务供应商。这增加了安全性和隔离方面的额外挑战。与此同时，最近披露的Ripple20和健忘症:33等关键漏洞表明，嵌入式设备也无法幸免于大范围的攻击。在本文中，我们定义了新的可信计算概念，重点关注共享一个物理设备的多个实体之间的权限分离。这些概念保证了有限时间内的远程恢复能力，即使软件堆栈的重要部分已经受损。我们推导出一种弹性系统架构，适用于在一个嵌入式设备上安全运行多个隔离服务。我们集成了一个用于检测入侵和异常的接口，以实现受损设备的自动恢复，并在Nitrogen8M开发板上构建了我们的系统原型。我们的评估显示，网络吞吐量和CPU性能方面的开销很低，因此我们相信我们的概念是朝着更具弹性的未来物联网设备迈出的有意义的一步。
papers.title_zh: 基于物联网设备虚拟化技术的高级系统弹性

papers.title: Global Feature Analysis and Comparative Evaluation of Freestyle In-Air-Handwriting Passcode for User Authentication
papers.authors: Duo Lu, Yuli Deng, Dijiang Huang
papers.abstract: Freestyle in-air-handwriting passcode-based user authentication methods address the needs for Virtual Reality (VR) / Augmented Reality (AR) headsets, wearable devices, and game consoles where a physical keyboard cannot be provided for typing a password, but a gesture input interface is readily available. Such an authentication system can capture the hand movement of writing a passcode string in the air and verify the user identity using both the writing content (like a password) and the writing style (like a behavior biometric trait). However, distinguishing handwriting signals from different users is challenging in signal processing, feature extraction, and matching. In this paper, we provide a detailed analysis of the global features of in-air-handwriting signals and a comparative evaluation of such a user authentication framework. Also, we build a prototype system with two different types of hand motion capture devices, collect two datasets, and conduct an extensive evaluation.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于自由风格空中手写密码的用户认证方法解决了虚拟现实(VR) /增强现实(AR)耳机、可穿戴设备和游戏控制台的需求，在这些设备中，无法提供物理键盘来键入密码，但手势输入界面随时可用。这种认证系统可以捕捉在空中书写密码串的手部运动，并使用书写内容(如密码)和书写风格(如行为生物特征)来验证用户身份。然而，区分来自不同用户的手写信号在信号处理、特征提取和匹配方面具有挑战性。在本文中，我们提供了空中手写信号的全局特征的详细分析和这样一个用户认证框架的比较评估。此外，我们使用两种不同类型的手部动作捕捉设备构建了一个原型系统，收集了两个数据集，并进行了广泛的评估。
papers.title_zh: 全球功能分析和对用户身份验证的自由度内手写密码的比较评估

papers.title: 2D-2FA: A New Dimension in Two-Factor Authentication
papers.authors: Maliheh Shirvanian, Shashank Agrawal
papers.abstract: We propose a two-factor authentication (2FA) mechanism called 2D-2FA to address security and usability issues in existing methods. 2D-2FA has three distinguishing features: First, after a user enters a username and password on a login terminal, a unique identifier is displayed to her. She inputs the same identifier on her registered 2FA device, which ensures appropriate engagement in the authentication process. Second, a one-time PIN is computed on the device and automatically transferred to the server. Thus, the PIN can have very high entropy, making guessing attacks infeasible. Third, the identifier is also incorporated into the PIN computation, which renders concurrent attacks ineffective. Third-party services such as push-notification providers and 2FA service providers, do not need to be trusted for the security of the system. The choice of identifiers depends on the device form factor and the context. Users could choose to draw patterns, capture QR codes, etc. We provide a proof of concept implementation, and evaluate performance, accuracy, and usability of the system. We show that the system offers a lower error rate (about half) and better efficiency (2-3 times faster) compared to the commonly used PIN-2FA. Our study indicates a high level of usability with a SUS of 75, and a high perception of efficiency, security, accuracy, and adoptability.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种称为2D-2FA的双因素认证(2FA)机制来解决现有方法中的安全性和可用性问题。2D-2FA有三个显著的特点:首先，当用户在登录终端上输入用户名和密码后，会向她显示一个唯一的标识符。她在她注册的2FA设备上输入相同的标识符，这确保了在认证过程中的适当参与。第二，在设备上计算一次性PIN，并自动传输到服务器。因此，PIN可以具有非常高的熵，使得猜测攻击不可行。第三，标识符也被合并到PIN计算中，这使得并发攻击无效。为了系统的安全，不需要信任诸如推送通知提供商和2FA服务提供商之类的第三方服务。标识符的选择取决于设备的外形和上下文。用户可以选择绘制图案、捕捉二维码等。我们提供概念实现的证明，并评估系统的性能、准确性和可用性。我们表明，与常用的PIN-2FA相比，该系统提供了更低的错误率(大约一半)和更好的效率(快2-3倍)。我们的研究表明，可用性水平很高，SUS为75，并且对效率、安全性、准确性和可采用性有很高的认知。
papers.title_zh: 2D-2FA：两因素身份验证中的新维度

papers.title: Group Time-based One-time Passwords and its Application to Efficient Privacy-Preserving Proof of Location
papers.authors: Zheng Yang, Chenglu Jin, Jianting Ning, Zengpeng Li, Anh Dinh, Jianying Zhou
papers.abstract: Time-based One-Time Password (TOTP) provides a strong second factor for user authentication. In TOTP, a prover authenticates to a verifier by using the current time and a secret key to generate an authentication token (or password) which is valid for a short time period. Our goal is to extend TOTP to the group setting, and to provide both authentication and privacy. To this end, we introduce a new authentication scheme, called Group TOTP (GTOTP), that allows the prover to prove that it is a member of an authenticated group without revealing its identity. We propose a novel construction that transforms any asymmetric TOTP scheme into a GTOTP scheme. Our approach combines Merkle tree and Bloom filter to reduce the verifier’s states to constant sizes. As a promising application of GTOTP, we show that GTOTP can be used to construct an efficient privacy-preserving Proof of Location (PoL) scheme. We utilize a commitment protocol, a privacy-preserving location proximity scheme, and our GTOTP scheme to build the PoL scheme, in which GTOTP is used not only for user authentication but also as a tool to glue up other building blocks. In the PoL scheme, with the help of some witnesses, a user can prove its location to a verifier, while ensuring the identity and location privacy of both the prover and witnesses. Our PoL scheme outperforms the alternatives based on group digital signatures. We evaluate our schemes on Raspberry Pi hardware, and demonstrate that they achieve practical performance. In particular, the password generation and verification time are in the order of microseconds and milliseconds, respectively, while the computation time of proof generation is less than 1 second.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于时间的一次性密码(TOTP)是用户身份验证的第二个重要因素。在TOTP，示证者通过使用当前时间和密钥来生成在短时间内有效的认证令牌(或密码)来向验证者进行认证。我们的目标是将TOTP扩展到组设置，并提供身份验证和隐私保护。为此，我们引入了一种新的认证方案，称为群TOTP (GTOTP ),它允许证明者证明自己是被认证群的成员，而不暴露自己的身份。我们提出了一种新颖的构造，可以将任何非对称TOTP方案转化为GTOTP方案。我们的方法结合了Merkle树和Bloom filter来减少验证者的状态大小。作为GTOTP的一个有前途的应用，我们证明了GTOTP可以用来构造一个有效的保护隐私的位置证明方案。我们利用一个承诺协议、一个隐私保护的位置邻近方案和我们的GTOTP方案来构建PoL方案，其中GTOTP不仅用于用户认证，还作为一个工具来粘合其他构建块。在PoL方案中，在一些证人的帮助下，用户可以向验证者证明其位置，同时确保证明者和证人的身份和位置隐私。我们的PoL方案优于其他基于群数字签名的方案。我们在Raspberry Pi硬件上评估了我们的方案，并证明了它们达到了实用的性能。特别地，密码生成和验证时间分别为微秒和毫秒量级，而证明生成的计算时间小于1秒。
papers.title_zh: 基于小组的一次性密码及其在有效保护隐私的位置证明的应用

papers.title: Digit Semantics based Optimization for Practical Password Cracking Tools
papers.authors: Haodong Zhang, Chuanwang Wang, Wenqiang Ruan, Junjie Zhang, Ming Xu, Weili Han
papers.abstract: Users usually create their passwords with meaningful digits, i.e. digit semantics, which can be partially exploited by probabilistic password guessing models with a data-driven methodology for better efficiency. However, these semantics are largely ignored by current practical password cracking tools, like John the Ripper (JtR) and Hashcat. In this paper, we are motivated to study the digit semantics in passwords and exploit them to improve the guessing efficiency of practical password cracking tools. We first design a practical extraction tool of digit semantics in passwords. Then we conduct a comprehensive empirical analysis of the digit semantics in four large-scale password sets leaked from the real world. Based on the analysis results, we further propose two new operations (the basic unit to construct mangling rules), then generate 1,974 digit semantics rules constructed from them. Moreover, in order to enforce semantics rules in JtR and Hashcat, we optimize their rule engines and running logic with the compatibility of the original built-in operations. The evaluation on the real password sets shows the significant advantage of digit semantics rules to extend current typical rule sets when we crack both Chinese and English (two of the largest user groups) passwords with digit strings.
papers.abstract_zh: 用户通常使用有意义的数字(即数字语义)来创建他们的密码，这可以部分地被具有数据驱动方法的概率密码猜测模型利用，以提高效率。然而，这些语义在很大程度上被当前实用的密码破解工具所忽略，比如John the Ripper (JtR)和Hashcat。本文旨在研究密码中的数字语义，并利用它们来提高实用密码破解工具的猜测效率。我们首先设计了一个实用的密码数字语义提取工具。然后我们对从现实世界泄露的四个大规模密码集中的数字语义进行了全面的实证分析。基于分析结果，我们进一步提出了两种新的操作(构建mangling规则的基本单位)，并由此生成了1，974条数字语义规则。此外，为了在JtR和Hashcat中实施语义规则，我们优化了它们的规则引擎和运行逻辑，使之与原来的内置操作兼容。对真实密码集的评估表明，当我们用数字串破解中文和英文(两个最大的用户群)密码时，数字语义规则在扩展当前典型规则集方面具有显著优势。
papers.title_zh: 基于数字语义的实用密码破解工具的优化

papers.title: Systematization of Password ManagerUse Cases and Design Paradigms
papers.authors: James Simmons, Oumar Diallo, Sean Oesch, Scott Ruoti
papers.abstract: Despite efforts to replace them, passwords remain the primary form of authentication on the web. Password managers seek to address many of the problems with passwords by helping users generate, store, and fill strong and unique passwords. Even though experts frequently recommend password managers, there is limited information regarding their usability. To aid in designing such usability studies, we systematize password manager use cases, identifying ten essential use cases, three recommended use cases, and four extended use cases. We also systematize the system designs employed to satisfy these use cases, designs that should be examined in usability studies to understand their relative strengths and weaknesses. Finally, we describe observations from 136 cognitive walkthroughs exploring the identified essential use cases in eight popular managers. Ultimately, we expect that this work will serve as the foundation for an explosion of new research into the usability of password managers.
