Taking Practical Byzantine Fault Tolerance (PBFT), the best-known and de-facto standard of BFT consensus protocol, as an example, it requires at least three phases to commit a request. Although some works attempt to shorten the number of phases by proposing a fast-path commitment rule, they either sacrifice resilience or subvert security. In this paper, we propose Trebiz, which also absorbs the fast-path commitment rule to reduce the number of phases from three to two, but maintains optimal resilience and strong security. This is achieved based on a re-understanding of the fault model in the blockchain era. Due to the financial benefits in the blockchain system, a replica may strive to keep the system running if it is impossible to tamper with a committed request. Therefore, we divide Byzantine replicas into two categories: Byzantine General (BG) and Byzantine Merchant (BM). BG replicas will strive to break both safety and liveness as traditional Byzantine ones, while BM replicas will only break safety but maintain liveness. Furthermore, we divide BM replicas into two sub-categories: active (ABM) and passive (PBM), according to whether they will forge and send unreceived data to maintain liveness. Given a system consisting of n= replicas, Trebiz enables a request to be committed with prepare messages in the second phase, where na and np represent the numbers of ABM and PBM replicas. During the view-change process, the leader can expect to receive view-change messages, which guarantees safety and liveness. Since up to f Byzantine replicas can be tolerated, Trebiz still achieves the optimal resilience of ⌈n/3⌉-1. Extensive experiments are conducted to demonstrate Trebiz’s feasibility and efficiency.
papers.abstract_zh: 区块链技术的流行重新激起了人们对拜占庭容错(BFT)一致协议的兴趣。然而，现有协议遭受高延迟，尤其是当系统以全球方式部署时。以BFT共识协议的最著名和事实上的标准，实用拜占庭容错(PBFT)为例，它需要至少三个阶段来提交请求。虽然一些作品试图通过提出快速路径提交规则来缩短阶段的数量，但它们要么牺牲了弹性，要么破坏了安全性。在本文中，我们提出了Trebiz，它也吸收了快速路径承诺规则，将阶段数从三个减少到两个，但保持了最佳的弹性和强安全性。这是基于对区块链时代断层模型的重新理解而实现的。由于区块链系统的经济效益，如果不可能篡改提交的请求，复制品可以努力保持系统运行。所以我们把拜占庭副本分为两类:拜占庭将军(BG)和拜占庭商人(BM)。BG副本会像传统拜占庭一样努力同时打破安全性和活性，而BM副本只会打破安全性但保持活性。此外，根据BM副本是否会伪造和发送未收到的数据来保持活性，我们将BM副本分为主动副本(ABM)和被动副本(PBM)两类。给定一个由n=个副本组成的系统，Trebiz允许在第二阶段使用准备消息提交请求，其中n a和np代表ABM和PBM副本的数量。在视图改变过程中，领导者可以期望收到视图改变消息，这保证了安全性和活性。因为最多可以容忍f个拜占庭副本，所以Trebiz仍然可以实现⌈n/3⌉-1.的最佳恢复能力大量实验证明了Trebiz的可行性和有效性。
papers.title_zh: TREBIZ：拜占庭式拜占庭商人的容错

papers.title: ArchiveSafe LT: Secure Long-term Archiving System
papers.authors: Moe Sabry, Reza Samavi
papers.abstract: Every year the amount of digitally stored sensitive information increases significantly. Information such as governmental and legal documents, health, and tax records are required to be securely archived for decades to comply with various laws and regulations. Since cryptographic schemes based on single computational assumptions are not guaranteed to stay secure for such long periods, current state-of-the-art systems providing long-term confidentiality and integrity rely on information-theoretic techniques, such as multi-server secret sharing and commitments. These systems achieve the desired results; however, establishing private channels for secret sharing is costly and requires a complex setup. In this paper, we present ArchiveSafe LT, a framework for archiving systems aiming to provide long-term confidentiality and integrity. The framework relies on multiple computationally-secure schemes using robust combiners, with a design that plans for agility and evolution of cryptographic schemes. ArchiveSafe LT is efficient and suitable for practical adoption as it eliminates the need for private channels compared to its counterparts. We present the ArchiveSafe LT framework structure and its security analysis using an automatic prover. We specify two ArchiveSafe LT-based system designs, which handle different adversarial storage providers. We experimentally evaluate a prototype built based on one of the designs to show the system’s efficiency compared to information-theoretic systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 每年，以数字方式存储的敏感信息的数量都在显著增加。政府和法律文档、健康和税务记录等信息需要安全地存档几十年，以遵守各种法律法规。由于基于单个计算假设的密码方案不能保证在如此长的时间内保持安全，所以当前提供长期机密性和完整性的最新系统依赖于信息论技术，例如多服务器秘密共享和承诺。这些系统达到了预期的效果；然而，建立秘密共享的专用信道是昂贵的，并且需要复杂的设置。在本文中，我们介绍了ArchiveSafe LT，这是一个旨在提供长期机密性和完整性的归档系统框架。该框架依赖于使用鲁棒组合器的多个计算安全方案，其设计针对加密方案的灵活性和演进进行规划。ArchiveSafe LT非常高效，适合实际应用，因为与同类产品相比，它不需要专用通道。我们提出了ArchiveSafe LT框架结构及其使用自动证明器的安全性分析。我们指定了两种ArchiveSafe基于LT的系统设计，它们处理不同的对立存储提供商。我们实验性地评估了基于其中一个设计构建的原型，以显示该系统与信息论系统相比的效率。
papers.title_zh: ArchiveSafe LT：安全长期归档系统

papers.title: Heimdallr: Fingerprinting SD-WAN Control-Plane Architecture via Encrypted Control Traffic
papers.authors: Minjae Seo, Jaehan Kim, Eduard Marin, Myoungsung You, Taejune Park, Seungsoo Lee, Seungwon Shin, Jinwoo Kim
papers.abstract: Software-defined wide area network (SD-WAN) has emerged as a new paradigm for steering a large-scale network flexibly by adopting distributed software-defined network (SDN) controllers. The key to building a logically centralized but physically distributed control-plane is running diverse cluster management protocols to achieve consistency through an exchange of control traffic. Meanwhile, we observe that the control traffic exposes unique time-series patterns and directional relationships due to the operational structure even though the traffic is encrypted, and this pattern can disclose confidential information such as control-plane topology and protocol dependencies, which can be exploited for severe attacks. With this insight, we propose a new SD-WAN fingerprinting system, called Heimdallr. It analyzes periodical and operational patterns of SD-WAN cluster management protocols and the context of flow directions from the collected control traffic utilizing a deep learning-based approach, so that it can classify the cluster management protocols automatically from miscellaneous control traffic datasets. Our evaluation, which is performed in a realistic SD-WAN environment consisting of geographically distant three campus networks and one enterprise network shows that Heimdallr can classify SD-WAN control traffic with ≥ 93%, identify individual protocols with ≥ 80% macro F-1 scores, and finally can infer control-plane topology with ≥ 70% similarity.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过采用分布式软件定义网络(SDN)控制器，软件定义广域网(SD-WAN)已成为一种灵活控制大规模网络的新模式。构建逻辑上集中但物理上分散的控制平面的关键是运行不同的集群管理协议，以通过交换控制流量来实现一致性。同时，我们观察到，由于操作结构的原因，即使流量被加密，控制流量也会暴露出独特的时间序列模式和方向关系，并且这种模式会泄露机密信息，如控制平面拓扑和协议依赖关系，这些信息可被用于严重的攻击。基于这种认识，我们提出了一种新的SD-WAN指纹识别系统，称为海姆达尔。它利用基于深度学习的方法分析SD-WAN集群管理协议的周期性和操作模式，以及来自收集的控制流量的流向上下文，以便它可以从各种控制流量数据集中自动分类集群管理协议。我们的评估是在一个真实的SD-WAN环境中进行的，该环境由地理上相距遥远的三个园区网络和一个企业网络组成，评估结果显示，海姆达尔可以对SD-WAN控制流量进行≥ 93%的分类，识别宏观F-1分数≥ 80%的单个协议，并最终可以推断相似度≥ 70%的控制平面拓扑。
papers.title_zh: Heimdallr：通过加密控制流量的指纹SD-WAN控制平面架构

papers.title: iService: Detecting and Evaluating the Impact of Confused Deputy Problem in AppleOS
papers.authors: Yizhuo Wang, Yikun Hu, Xuangan Xiao, Dawu Gu
papers.abstract: Confused deputy problem is a specific type of privilege escalation. It happens when a program tricks another more privileged one into misusing its authority. On AppleOS, system services are adopted to perform privileged operations when receiving inter-process communication (IPC) request from a user process. The confused deputy vulnerabilities may result if system services overlook the checking of IPC input. Unfortunately, it is tough to identify such vulnerabilities, which requires to understand the closed-source system services and private frameworks of the complex AppleOS by unraveling the dependencies in binaries. To this end, we propose iService, a systematic method to automatically detect and evaluate the impact of confused deputies in AppleOS system services. Instead of looking for insecure IPC clients, it focuses on sensitive operations performed by system services, which might compromise the system if abused, ensuring whether the IPC input is properly checked before the invocation of those operations. Moreover, iService evaluates the impact of each confused deputy based on iService is applied to four versions of MacOS (10.14.3, 10.15.7, 11.4, and 12.4) separately. It successfully discovers 11 confused deputies, five of which are zero-day bugs and all of them have been fixed, with three considered high risk. Furthermore, the five zero-day bugs have been confirmed by Apple and assigned with CVE numbers to date.
papers.abstract_zh: 困惑的代理问题是特权升级的一种特殊类型。当一个程序欺骗另一个更有特权的程序滥用它的权限时，就会发生这种情况。在AppleOS上，当接收到来自用户进程的进程间通信(IPC)请求时，系统服务被用来执行特权操作。如果系统服务忽略对IPC输入的检查，可能会导致混淆的代理漏洞。不幸的是，识别这样的漏洞是很困难的，这需要通过解开二进制文件中的依赖关系来理解复杂AppleOS的闭源系统服务和私有框架。为此，我们提出了iService，一种自动检测和评估AppleOS系统服务中混淆副手影响的系统化方法。它不是寻找不安全的IPC客户端，而是关注由系统服务执行的敏感操作，如果滥用这些操作可能会危及系统，从而确保在调用这些操作之前是否正确检查了IPC输入。而且，iService根据iService分别应用于MacOS的四个版本(10.14.3、10.15.7、11.4、12.4)来评估每个混淆的副手的影响。它成功地发现了11个困惑的代理，其中五个是零日错误，所有这些都已修复，其中三个被认为是高风险的。此外，这五个零日错误已经得到苹果公司的确认，并被分配了迄今为止的CVE编号。
papers.title_zh: Iservice：检测和评估混乱的代表问题在Appleos中的影响

papers.title: MoLE: Mitigation of Side-channel Attacks against SGX via Dynamic Data Location Escape
papers.authors: Fan Lang, Wei Wang, Lingjia Meng, Jingqiang Lin, Qiongxiao Wang, Linli Lu
papers.abstract: Numerous works have experimentally shown that Intel Software Guard eXtensions (SGX) is vulnerable to side-channel attacks (SCAs) and related threats, including transient execution attacks. These threats compromise the security of SGX-protected apps. Obfuscating data access patterns is a realistic way to guard against these threats. However, existing defenses impose either too much performance overhead or additional usage restrictions (such as multi-threading). Furthermore, these obfuscation schemes may no longer work if the attacker has the capacity to single-step the target application. In this paper, we propose MoLE, a dynamic data location randomization scheme to defend against SCAs and transient execution attacks that target sensitive data within enclaves. By continuously obfuscating the location of sensitive data at runtime, MoLE prevents the adversary from directly obtaining or disclosing data based on data access patterns. MoLE makes use of Transactional Synchronization Extensions (TSX), an Intel CPU feature intended for efficiency in concurrent scenarios, to prevent the adversary from tracking sensitive data by single-stepping enclaved execution. MoLE can also be applied in multi-threaded scenarios under the protection of TSX. We implement MoLE as a semi-automatic compiler-based tool. Evaluation results show that MoLE is practical, offering a tunable trade-off between security and performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 大量工作已经通过实验证明，英特尔软件防护扩展(SGX)容易受到侧信道攻击(SCA)和相关威胁，包括瞬时执行攻击。这些威胁损害了受SGX保护的应用程序的安全性。混淆数据访问模式是防范这些威胁的现实方法。然而，现有的防御措施要么带来过多的性能开销，要么带来额外的使用限制(比如多线程)。此外，如果攻击者能够单步执行目标应用程序，这些混淆方案可能不再有效。在本文中，我们提出了MoLE，一种动态数据位置随机化方案，用于防御针对飞地中敏感数据的SCA和瞬时执行攻击。通过在运行时不断混淆敏感数据的位置，MoLE可以防止对手根据数据访问模式直接获取或泄露数据。MoLE利用事务同步扩展(TSX ),这是一项旨在提高并发场景效率的英特尔CPU特性，可防止对手通过单步包围执行来跟踪敏感数据。在TSX的保护下，MoLE还可以应用于多线程场景。我们将MoLE实现为一个半自动的基于编译器的工具。评估结果表明，MoLE是实用的，在安全性和性能之间提供了可调的折衷。
papers.title_zh: 痣：通过动态数据位置逃脱对SGX的侧通道攻击

papers.title: CoCoTPM: Trusted Platform Modules for Virtual Machines in Confidential Computing Environments
papers.authors: Joana Pecholt, Sascha Wessel
papers.abstract: Cloud computing has gained popularity and is increasingly used to process sensitive and valuable data. This development necessitates the protection of data from the cloud provider and results in a trend towards confidential computing. Hardware-based technologies by AMD, Intel and Arm address this and allow the protection of virtual machines and the data processed in them. Unfortunately, these hardware-based technologies do not offer a unified interface for necessary tasks like secure key generation and usage or secure storage of integrity measurements. Moreover, these technologies are oftentimes limited in functionality especially regarding remote attestation. On the other hand, a unified interface is widely used in the area of bare-metal systems to provide these functionalities: the Trusted Platform Module (TPM). In this paper, we present a concept for an architecture providing TPM functionalities for virtual machines in confidential computing environments. We name it Confidential Computing Trusted Platform Module, short CoCoTPM. Different from common approaches for virtual machines, host and hypervisor are not trusted and excluded from the trusted computing base. Our solution is compatible with existing mechanisms and tools utilizing TPMs and thus allows the protection of virtual machines in confidential computing environments without further adaptations of these mechanisms and tools. This includes storage of integrity measurements during a measured boot and for the integrity measurement architecture, full disk encryption bound to these measurements, usage of an openssl provider for TLS connections and remote attestation. We show how our concept can be applied to different hardware-specific technologies and implemented our concept for AMD SEV and SEV-SNP.
papers.abstract_zh: 云计算越来越受欢迎，并越来越多地用于处理敏感和有价值的数据。这种发展需要保护来自云提供商的数据，并导致保密计算的趋势。AMD、Intel和Arm基于硬件的技术解决了这一问题，并允许保护虚拟机和其中处理的数据。不幸的是，这些基于硬件的技术没有为诸如安全密钥生成和使用或完整性测量的安全存储之类的必要任务提供统一的接口。此外，这些技术通常在功能上受到限制，尤其是在远程证明方面。另一方面，在裸机系统领域广泛使用统一接口来提供这些功能:可信平台模块(TPM)。在本文中，我们提出了为机密计算环境中的虚拟机提供TPM功能的架构的概念。我们将其命名为机密计算可信平台模块，简称CoCoTPM。与虚拟机的常见方法不同，主机和虚拟机管理程序不受信任，并被排除在可信计算基础之外。我们的解决方案与利用TPM的现有机制和工具兼容，从而允许保护机密计算环境中的虚拟机，而无需进一步调整这些机制和工具。这包括在测量启动期间存储完整性测量值，以及完整性测量体系结构、绑定到这些测量值的全磁盘加密、将openssl提供程序用于TLS连接和远程证明。我们展示了如何将我们的概念应用于不同的硬件特定技术，并针对AMD SEV和SEV-SNP实现了我们的概念。
papers.title_zh: COCOTPM：机密计算环境中虚拟机的可信平台模块

papers.title: Proof of aliveness
papers.authors: Chenglu Jin, Zheng Yang, Marten van Dijk, Jianying Zhou
papers.abstract: In 2017, malware Triton was discovered in a petrol plant in Saudi Arabia, and it shut down the safety instrumented systems in the affected industrial control system without being noticed by the operators. If the malware was not discovered by a security company on time, it could leave the system running without any safety measures, and eventually lead to an explosion. To detect such attacks, one can track the running status of the devices in the field to know that they are still "alive". However, in practice, there yet does not exist an efficient and cryptographically secure mechanism/ protocol that can prove the aliveness of a device to control centers over an open network. This paper aims to tackle this practical problem by introducing a new cryptographic notion called Proof of Aliveness (PoA). We propose to use a one-way function (OWF) chain structure to build an efficient proof of aliveness, such that the prover sends every node on the OWF chain in a reverse order periodically, and it can be verified by a verifier with the possession of the tail (last node) of the OWF chain. However, the practicality of this construction is limited by the finite number of nodes on an OWF chain. We enhance our first PoA construction by linking multiple OWF chains together using a pseudo-random generator chain. By integrating one-time signature schemes into the structure, we can achieve auto-replenishment of aliveness-proofs, which implies that this PoA can be used forever without an interruption for reinitialization. To make our proposals more practical, we analyzed the security of the above PoA proposals in the standard model. Besides that, we also specifically defined a security model for the concept of PoA. Our PoA constructions are implemented and evaluated on Raspberry Pis for a demonstration of its performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 2017年，在沙特阿拉伯的一家石油工厂发现了恶意软件Triton，它在操作人员没有察觉的情况下关闭了受影响的工业控制系统中的安全仪表系统。如果恶意软件没有被安全公司及时发现，它可能会让系统在没有任何安全措施的情况下运行，并最终导致爆炸。为了检测这种攻击，人们可以跟踪现场设备的运行状态，以知道它们仍然“活着”。然而，在实践中，还不存在能够通过开放网络向控制中心证明设备的有效性的有效且密码安全的机制/协议。本文旨在通过引入一个称为活性证明(PoA)的新的加密概念来解决这个实际问题。我们建议使用单向函数(OWF)链结构来建立有效的活性证明，使得证明者周期性地以相反的顺序发送OWF链上的每个节点，并且它可以被拥有OWF链尾部(最后一个节点)的验证者验证。然而，这种构造的实用性受到OWF链上有限数量的节点的限制。我们通过使用伪随机生成器链将多个OWF链连接在一起来增强我们的第一个PoA构造。通过将一次性签名方案集成到该结构中，我们可以实现活性证明的自动补充，这意味着该PoA可以被永久使用而无需中断重新初始化。为了使我们的提议更加实用，我们在标准模型中分析了上述PoA提议的安全性。除此之外，我们还专门为PoA的概念定义了一个安全模型。我们的PoA构造在Raspberry Pis上实现和评估，以展示其性能。
papers.title_zh: 证据证明

papers.title: Co-evaluation of pattern matching algorithms on IoT devices with embedded GPUs
papers.authors: Charalampos Stylianopoulos, Simon Kindström, Magnus Almgren, Olaf Landsiedel, Marina Papatriantafilou
papers.abstract: Pattern matching is an important building block for many security applications, including Network Intrusion Detection Systems (NIDS). As NIDS grow in functionality and complexity, the time overhead and energy consumption of pattern matching become a significant consideration that limits the deployability of such systems, especially on resource-constrained devices. On the other hand, the emergence of new computing platforms, such as embedded devices with integrated, general-purpose Graphics Processing Units (GPUs), brings new, interesting challenges and opportunities for algorithm design in this setting: how to make use of new architectural features and how to evaluate their effect on algorithm performance. Up to now, work that focuses on pattern matching for such platforms has been limited to specific algorithms in isolation. In this work, we present a systematic and comprehensive benchmark that allows us to co-evaluate both existing and new pattern matching algorithms on heterogeneous devices equipped with embedded GPUs, suitable for medium- to high-level IoT deployments. We evaluate the algorithms on such a heterogeneous device, in close connection with the architectural features of the platform and provide insights on how these features affect the algorithms' behavior. We find that, in our target embedded platform, GPU-based pattern matching algorithms have competitive performance compared to the CPU and consume half as much energy as the CPU-based variants. Based on these insights, we also propose HYBRID, a new pattern matching approach that efficiently combines techniques from existing approaches and outperforms them by 1.4x, across a range of realistic and synthetic data sets. Our benchmark details the effect of various optimizations, thus providing a path forward to make existing security mechanisms such as NIDS deployable on IoT devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 模式匹配是许多安全应用的重要组成部分，包括网络入侵检测系统(NIDS)。随着NIDS在功能和复杂性方面的增长，模式匹配的时间开销和能量消耗成为限制这种系统的可部署性的重要考虑因素，尤其是在资源受限的设备上。另一方面，新计算平台的出现，如集成通用图形处理单元(GPU)的嵌入式设备，为这种环境下的算法设计带来了新的有趣挑战和机遇:如何利用新的架构特性，以及如何评估它们对算法性能的影响。到目前为止，专注于这种平台的模式匹配的工作局限于孤立的特定算法。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个系统而全面的基准，允许我们在配备嵌入式GPU的异构设备上共同评估现有和新的模式匹配算法，适用于中高级物联网部署。我们评估了这种异构设备上的算法，紧密结合平台的架构特性，并提供了这些特性如何影响算法行为的见解。我们发现，在我们的目标嵌入式平台中，基于GPU的模式匹配算法与CPU相比具有竞争力的性能，并且消耗的能量是基于CPU的变体的一半。基于这些见解，我们还提出了HYBRID，一种新的模式匹配方法，它有效地结合了现有方法的技术，并在一系列真实和合成数据集上将其性能提高了1.4倍。我们的基准测试详细说明了各种优化的效果，从而为在物联网设备上部署NIDS等现有安全机制提供了一条前进的道路。
papers.title_zh: 与嵌入式GPU的物联网设备上的图案匹配算法的共同评估

papers.title: Aegis: a context-aware security framework for smart home systems
papers.authors: Amit Kumar Sikder, Leonardo Babun, Hidayet Aksu, A. Selcuk Uluagac
papers.abstract: Our everyday lives are expanding fast with the introduction of new Smart Home Systems (SHSs). Today, a myriad of SHS devices and applications are widely available to users and have already started to re-define our modern lives. Smart home users utilize the apps to control and automate such devices. Users can develop their own apps or easily download and install them from vendor-specific app markets. App-based SHSs offer many tangible benefits to our lives, but also unfold diverse security risks. Several attacks have already been reported for SHSs. However, current security solutions consider smart home devices and apps individually to detect malicious actions rather than the context of the SHS as a whole. The existing mechanisms cannot capture user activities and sensor-device-user interactions in a holistic fashion. To address these issues, in this paper, we introduce Aegis, a novel context-aware security framework to detect malicious behavior in a SHS. Specifically, Aegis observes the states of the connected smart home entities (sensors and devices) for different user activities and usage patterns in a SHS and builds a contextual model to differentiate between malicious and benign behavior. We evaluated the efficacy and performance of Aegis in multiple smart home settings (i.e., single bedroom, double bedroom, duplex) with real-life users performing day-to-day activities and real SHS devices. We also measured the performance of Aegis against five different malicious behaviors. Our detailed evaluation shows that Aegis can detect malicious behavior in SHS with high accuracy (over 95%) and secure the SHS regardless of the smart home layout, device configuration, installed apps, and enforced user policies. Finally, Aegis achieves minimum overhead in detecting malicious behavior in SHS, ensuring easy deployability in real-life smart environments.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着新型智能家居系统(SHSs)的引入，我们的日常生活正在快速扩展。如今，用户可以广泛使用各种SHS设备和应用，并且已经开始重新定义我们的现代生活。智能家居用户利用这些应用来控制和自动化这些设备。用户可以开发自己的应用程序，或者从特定供应商的应用程序市场轻松下载并安装。基于App的SHSs为我们的生活带来了许多实实在在的好处，但也暴露出各种各样的安全风险。已经报道了几起针对SHSs的袭击事件。然而，当前的安全解决方案单独考虑智能家居设备和应用程序来检测恶意操作，而不是将SHS的上下文作为一个整体。现有机制不能以整体方式捕获用户活动和传感器-设备-用户交互。为了解决这些问题，在本文中，我们引入了Aegis，一种新的上下文感知安全框架来检测SHS中的恶意行为。具体来说，Aegis观察连接的智能家居实体(传感器和设备)在SHS中不同用户活动和使用模式的状态，并建立一个上下文模型来区分恶意和良性行为。我们评估了Aegis在多种智能家居环境(即单卧室、双卧室、复式)中的功效和性能，让现实生活中的用户执行日常活动并使用真实的SHS设备。我们还测量了Aegis针对五种不同恶意行为的性能。我们的详细评估表明，Aegis可以以高准确率(超过95%)检测SHS中的恶意行为，并保护SHS，而不管智能家居布局、设备配置、安装的应用程序和强制执行的用户策略如何。最后，Aegis实现了在SHS中检测恶意行为的最小开销，确保了在真实智能环境中的易部署性。
papers.title_zh: AEGIS：智能家庭系统的上下文感知安全框架

papers.title: Defeating hidden audio channel attacks on voice assistants via audio-induced surface vibrations
papers.authors: Chen Wang, S. Abhishek Anand, Jian Liu, Payton Walker, Yingying Chen, Nitesh Saxena
papers.abstract: Voice access technologies are widely adopted in mobile devices and voice assistant systems as a convenient way of user interaction. Recent studies have demonstrated a potentially serious vulnerability of the existing voice interfaces on these systems to "hidden voice commands". This attack uses synthetically rendered adversarial sounds embedded within a voice command to trick the speech recognition process into executing malicious commands, without being noticed by legitimate users. In this paper, we employ low-cost motion sensors, in a novel way, to detect these hidden voice commands. In particular, our proposed system extracts and examines the unique audio signatures of the issued voice commands in the vibration domain. We show that such signatures of normal commands vs. synthetic hidden voice commands are distinctive, leading to the detection of the attacks. The proposed system, which benefits from a speaker-motion sensor setup, can be easily deployed on smartphones by reusing existing on-board motion sensors or utilizing a cloud service that provides the relevant setup environment. The system is based on the premise that while the crafted audio features of the hidden voice commands may fool an authentication system in the audio domain, their unique audio-induced surface vibrations captured by the motion sensor are hard to forge. Our proposed system creates a harder challenge for the attacker as now it has to forge the acoustic features in both the audio and vibration domains, simultaneously. We extract the time and frequency domain statistical features, and the acoustic features (e.g., chroma vectors and MFCCs) from the motion sensor data and use learning-based methods for uniquely determining both normal commands and hidden voice commands. The results show that our system can detect hidden voice commands vs. normal commands with 99.9% accuracy by simply using the low-cost motion sensors that have very low sampling frequencies.
papers.abstract_zh: 作为一种方便的用户交互方式，语音接入技术在移动设备和语音助理系统中被广泛采用。最近的研究表明，这些系统上的现有语音接口对于“隐藏的语音命令”存在潜在的严重漏洞。这种攻击使用嵌入在语音命令中的合成渲染的敌对声音来欺骗语音识别过程执行恶意命令，而不会被合法用户注意到。在本文中，我们采用低成本的运动传感器，以一种新颖的方式，来检测这些隐藏的语音命令。特别地，我们提出的系统提取并检查振动域中发出的语音命令的独特音频签名。我们表明，正常命令与合成隐藏语音命令的这种签名是不同的，从而导致对攻击的检测。该拟议系统受益于扬声器运动传感器设置，可以通过重用现有的板载运动传感器或利用提供相关设置环境的云服务，轻松部署在智能手机上。该系统基于这样的前提，即虽然隐藏的语音命令的精心制作的音频特征可以欺骗音频领域中的认证系统，但是它们由运动传感器捕获的独特的音频诱发的表面振动是难以伪造的。我们提出的系统给攻击者带来了更大的挑战，因为现在它必须同时伪造音频和振动领域的声学特征。我们从运动传感器数据中提取时域和频域统计特征以及声学特征(例如，色度矢量和MFCCs ),并使用基于学习的方法来唯一地确定正常命令和隐藏语音命令。结果表明，通过简单地使用具有非常低的采样频率的低成本运动传感器，我们的系统可以以99.9%的准确度检测隐藏的语音命令与正常命令。
papers.title_zh: 通过音频引起的表面振动击败隐藏的音频通道攻击

papers.title: TF-BIV: transparent and fine-grained binary integrity verification in the cloud
papers.authors: Fangjie Jiang, Quanwei Cai, Jingqiang Lin, Bo Luo, Le Guan, Ziqiang Ma
papers.abstract: With the emergence of virtualization technologies, various services have been migrated to the cloud. Beyond the tenants' own security controls implemented in the virtual machine (VM), the binary integrity verification mechanism in the virtual machine manager (VMM) provides stronger protections against malware. Unfortunately, none of existing integrity verification mechanisms in the cloud provides complete transparency and fine-grained efficiency. Some schemes selectively check the integrity of sensitive binaries, but they require modifications to the VMs (e.g., integrating monitoring libraries) to trigger verification. Others, although need no modification to the VMs, have to enforce checking on all the binaries, because they cannot distinguish binary images for the sensitive processes from the binaries for insensitive ones, leading to significant performance overheads. In this paper, we present TF-BIV, a transparent and fine-grained binary integrity verification scheme, which does not require any modification or software/driver installation in the VM. TF-BIV identifies the sensitive processes at the creation, and checks the integrity of the binaries (including the guest OS kernel and the dependant binaries) related to these processes. The provided transparency and efficiency are achieved by leveraging existing hardware virtualization supports (i.e., Intel extended page table) and debugging features (i.e., monitor trap flag). We have implemented the TF-BIV prototype based on QEMU-KVM. To demonstrate the usability of TF-BIV, we adopted it for cloud-based cryptographic services, to achieve the strict invoking controls. In addition to the password-based authentication, TF-BIV further achieves process-level authorization to the invokers. Intensive evaluation shows that TF-BIV implements the designed binary integrity verification with only about 3.6% performance overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着虚拟化技术的出现，各种服务已经迁移到了云中。除了租户自己在虚拟机(VM)中实施的安全控制之外，虚拟机管理器(VMM)中的二进制完整性验证机制提供了更强的恶意软件防护。不幸的是，云中现有的完整性验证机制都没有提供完全的透明性和细粒度的效率。一些方案选择性地检查敏感二进制文件的完整性，但是它们需要修改虚拟机(例如，集成监控库)来触发验证。其他的，虽然不需要修改虚拟机，但是必须对所有的二进制文件进行检查，因为它们不能区分敏感进程的二进制映像和不敏感进程的二进制映像，从而导致显著的性能开销。在本文中，我们提出了TF-BIV，一种透明的细粒度二进制完整性验证方案，它不需要在虚拟机中进行任何修改或安装软件/驱动程序。TF-BIV在创建时识别敏感进程，并检查与这些进程相关的二进制文件(包括来宾操作系统内核和相关二进制文件)的完整性。所提供的透明度和效率是通过利用现有的硬件虚拟化支持(即英特尔扩展页表)和调试功能(即监控陷阱标志)来实现的。我们已经实现了基于QEMU-KVM的TF-BIV原型。为了展示TF-BIV的可用性，我们将其应用于基于云的加密服务，以实现严格的调用控制。除了基于密码的认证，TF-BIV还实现了对调用者的流程级授权。深入的评估表明，TF-BIV以大约3.6%的性能开销实现了所设计的二进制完整性验证。
papers.title_zh: TF-BIV：云中透明且细粒的二进制完整性验证

papers.title: Nibbler: debloating binary shared libraries
papers.authors: Ioannis Agadakos, Di Jin, David Williams-King, Vasileios P. Kemerlis, Georgios Portokalidis
papers.abstract: Developers today have access to an arsenal of toolkits and libraries for rapid application prototyping. However, when an application loads a library, the entirety of that library's code is mapped into the address space, even if only a single function is actually needed. The unused portion is bloat that can negatively impact software defenses by unnecessarily inflating their overhead or increasing their attack surface. Recent work has explored debloating as a way of alleviating the above problems, when source code is available. In this paper, we investigate whether debloating is possible and practical at the binary level. To this end, we present Nibbler: a system that identifies and erases unused functions within shared libraries. Nibbler works in tandem with defenses like continuous code re-randomization and control-flow integrity, enhancing them without incurring additional run-time overhead. We developed and tested a prototype of Nibbler on x86-64 Linux; Nibbler reduces the size of shared libraries and the number of available functions, for real-world binaries and the SPEC CINT2006 suite, by up to 56% and 82%, respectively. We also demonstrate that Nibbler benefits defenses by showing that: (i) it improves the deployability of a continuous re-randomization system for binaries, namely Shuffler, by increasing its efficiency by 20%, and (ii) it improves certain fast, but coarse and context-insensitive control-flow integrity schemes by reducing the number of gadgets reachable through returns and indirect calls by 75% and 49% on average.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，开发人员可以使用大量的工具包和库来快速构建应用程序原型。然而，当应用程序加载一个库时，该库的全部代码都被映射到地址空间，即使实际上只需要一个函数。未使用部分会膨胀，这会不必要地增加开销或增加攻击面，从而对软件防御产生负面影响。当源代码可用时，最近的工作已经探索了去模糊作为缓解上述问题的一种方式。在本文中，我们研究去模糊在二进制水平上是否可能和实用。为此，我们提出了尼卜乐:一个识别和删除共享库中未使用的功能的系统。尼卜乐与连续代码重随机化和控制流完整性等防御协同工作，在不产生额外运行时开销的情况下增强了它们。我们在x86-64 Linux上开发并测试了尼卜乐的原型；对于真实世界的二进制文件和SPEC CINT2006套件，尼卜乐减少了共享库的大小和可用函数的数量，分别高达56%和82%。我们还证明了尼卜乐有利于防御:(I)它通过将效率提高20%来改善二进制文件的连续重随机化系统(即Shuffler)的可部署性，以及(ii)它通过将通过返回和间接调用可到达的小工具的数量平均减少75%和49%来改善某些快速但粗糙且上下文不敏感的控制流完整性方案。
papers.title_zh: nibbler：解放二进制共享库

papers.title: Function boundary detection in stripped binaries
papers.authors: Jim Alves-Foss, Jia Song
papers.abstract: Automated cyber defense tools require the ability to analyze binary applications, detect vulnerabilities and automatically patch those vulnerabilities. The insertion of security mechanisms that operate at function boundaries (e.g, control flow mitigation, stack guards) require automated detection of those boundaries. This paper introduces a publicly available function boundary detection tool for 32 and 64-bit Intel binaries running under Linux, that is more accurate than other reported approaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 自动化网络防御工具需要能够分析二进制应用程序、检测漏洞并自动修补这些漏洞。在功能边界上运行的安全机制(例如，控制流缓解、堆栈保护)的插入需要自动检测这些边界。本文介绍了一个公开可用的函数边界检测工具，它适用于运行在Linux下的32位和64位Intel二进制文件，比其他已报道的方法更准确。
papers.title_zh: 剥离二进制的功能边界检测

papers.title: VPS: excavating high-level C++ constructs from low-level binaries to protect dynamic dispatching
papers.authors: Andre Pawlowski, Victor van der Veen, Dennis Andriesse, Erik van der Kouwe, Thorsten Holz, Cristiano Giuffrida, Herbert Bos
papers.abstract: Polymorphism and inheritance make C++ suitable for writing complex software, but significantly increase the attack surface because the implementation relies on virtual function tables (vtables). These vtables contain function pointers that attackers can potentially hijack and in practice, vtable hijacking is one of the most important attack vector for C++ binaries. In this paper, we present VTable Pointer Separation (vps), a practical binary-level defense against vtable hijacking in C++ applications. Unlike previous binary-level defenses, which rely on unsound static analyses to match classes to virtual callsites, vps achieves a more accurate protection by restricting virtual callsites to validly created objects. More specifically, vps ensures that virtual callsites can only use objects created at valid object construction sites, and only if those objects can reach the callsite. Moreover, vps explicitly prevents false positives (falsely identified virtual callsites) from breaking the binary, an issue existing work does not handle correctly or at all. We evaluate the prototype implementation of vps on a diverse set of complex, real-world applications (MongoDB, MySQL server, Node.js, SPEC CPU2017/CPU2006), showing that our approach protects on average 97.8% of all virtual callsites in SPEC CPU2006 and 97.4% in SPEC CPU2017 (all C++ benchmarks), with a moderate performance overhead of 11% and 9% geomean, respectively. Furthermore, our evaluation reveals 86 false negatives in VTV, a popular source-based defense which is part of GCC.
papers.abstract_zh: 多态性和继承性使C++适合编写复杂的软件，但由于实现依赖于虚函数表(vtables)，因此显著增加了攻击面。这些vtable包含攻击者可能劫持的函数指针，实际上，vtable劫持是C++二进制文件最重要的攻击媒介之一。在本文中，我们提出了vtable指针分离(vps ),这是一种在C++应用中防止VTable劫持的实用的二进制级防御方法。与以前的二进制级防御不同，以前的二进制级防御依赖不可靠的静态分析来将类与虚拟调用点匹配，vps通过将虚拟调用点限制为有效创建的对象来实现更准确的保护。更具体地说，vps确保虚拟调用点只能使用在有效对象构造点创建的对象，并且只有当这些对象可以到达调用点时。此外，vps明确地防止假阳性(错误识别的虚拟调用点)破坏二进制，这是现有工作没有正确处理或根本没有处理的问题。我们在一组复杂的真实应用程序(MongoDB、MySQL server、Node.js、SPEC CPU2017/CPU2006)上评估了vps的原型实现，表明我们的方法平均保护了SPEC CPU2006中97.8%的所有虚拟调用点和SPEC CPU2017中97.4%的虚拟调用点(均为C++基准)，性能开销分别为11%和9%。此外，我们的评估揭示了VTV中的86个假阴性，这是GCC的一部分，是一种流行的基于源的防御。
papers.title_zh: VPS：从低级二进制文件中发掘高级C ++构造以保护动态调度

papers.title: STRIP: a defence against trojan attacks on deep neural networks
papers.authors: Yansong Gao, Chang Xu, Derui Wang, Shiping Chen, Damith Chinthana Ranasinghe, Surya Nepal
papers.abstract: A recent trojan attack on deep neural network (DNN) models is one insidious variant of data poisoning attacks. Trojan attacks exploit an effective backdoor created in a DNN model by leveraging the difficulty in interpretability of the learned model to misclassify any inputs signed with the attacker's chosen trojan trigger. Since the trojan trigger is a secret guarded and exploited by the attacker, detecting such trojan inputs is a challenge, especially at run-time when models are in active operation. This work builds STRong Intentional Perturbation (STRIP) based run-time trojan attack detection system and focuses on vision system. We intentionally perturb the incoming input, for instance by superimposing various image patterns, and observe the randomness of predicted classes for perturbed inputs from a given deployed model---malicious or benign. A low entropy in predicted classes violates the input-dependence property of a benign model and implies the presence of a malicious input---a characteristic of a trojaned input. The high efficacy of our method is validated through case studies on three popular and contrasting datasets: MNIST, CIFAR10 and GTSRB. We achieve an overall false acceptance rate (FAR) of less than 1%, given a preset false rejection rate (FRR) of 1%, for different types of triggers. Using CIFAR10 and GTSRB, we have empirically achieved result of 0% for both FRR and FAR. We have also evaluated STRIP robustness against a number of trojan attack variants and adaptive attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近针对深度神经网络(DNN)模型的特洛伊木马攻击是数据中毒攻击的一种阴险变体。特洛伊木马攻击利用在DNN模型中创建的有效后门，通过利用学习模型的可解释性的困难来错误分类用攻击者选择的特洛伊木马触发器签名的任何输入。由于特洛伊木马触发器是由攻击者保护和利用的秘密，因此检测这种特洛伊木马输入是一项挑战，尤其是在模型处于活动操作的运行时。本文以视觉系统为研究对象，构建了基于强故意扰动(STRIP)的实时木马攻击检测系统。我们有意干扰输入，例如通过叠加各种图像模式，并观察来自给定部署模型(恶意或良性)的干扰输入的预测类别的随机性。预测类中的低熵违反了良性模型的输入依赖属性，并暗示存在恶意输入-特洛伊木马输入的特征。通过在MNIST、CIFAR10和GTSRB三个流行的对比数据集上的案例研究，验证了该方法的高效性。对于不同类型的触发器，给定1%的预设错误拒绝率(FRR ),我们实现了小于1%的总错误接受率(FAR)。使用CIFAR10和GTSRB，我们在FRR和FAR都取得了0%的实验结果。我们还评估了STRIP对大量特洛伊木马攻击变体和适应性攻击的鲁棒性。
papers.title_zh: 条纹：防御特洛伊木马对深神经网络的攻击

papers.title: How to prove your model belongs to you: a blind-watermark based framework to protect intellectual property of DNN
papers.authors: Zheng Li, Chengyu Hu, Yang Zhang, Shanqing Guo
papers.abstract: Deep learning techniques have made tremendous progress in a variety of challenging tasks, such as image recognition and machine translation, during the past decade. Training deep neural networks is computationally expensive and requires both human and intellectual resources. Therefore, it is necessary to protect the intellectual property of the model and externally verify the ownership of the model. However, previous studies either fail to defend against the evasion attack or have not explicitly dealt with fraudulent claims of ownership by adversaries. Furthermore, they can not establish a clear association between the model and the creator's identity. To fill these gaps, in this paper, we propose a novel intellectual property protection (IPP) framework based on blind-watermark for watermarking deep neural networks that meet the requirements of security and feasibility. Our framework accepts ordinary samples and the exclusive logo as inputs, outputting newly generated samples as watermarks, which are almost indistinguishable from the origin, and infuses these watermarks into DNN models by assigning specific labels, leaving the backdoor as the basis for our copyright claim. We evaluated our IPP framework on two benchmark datasets and 15 popular deep learning models. The results show that our framework successfully verifies the ownership of all the models without a noticeable impact on their primary task. Most importantly, we are the first to successfully design and implement a blind-watermark based framework, which can achieve state-of-art performances on undetectability against evasion attack and un-forgeability against fraudulent claims of ownership. Further, our framework shows remarkable robustness and establishes a clear association between the model and the author's identity.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去十年中，深度学习技术在各种具有挑战性的任务中取得了巨大的进展，如图像识别和机器翻译。训练深度神经网络在计算上是昂贵的，并且需要人力和智力资源。所以要保护模型的知识产权，对外验证模型的所有权。然而，以前的研究要么不能防御规避攻击，要么没有明确处理对手的所有权欺诈声明。此外，他们不能在模型和创造者的身份之间建立明确的联系。为了填补这些空白，本文提出了一种新的基于盲水印的知识产权保护(IPP)框架，用于对满足安全性和可行性要求的深度神经网络进行水印嵌入。我们的框架接受普通样本和专有徽标作为输入，输出新生成的样本作为水印，这些水印几乎与原始水印无法区分，并通过分配特定标签将这些水印注入DNN模型，留下后门作为我们版权主张的基础。我们在两个基准数据集和15个流行的深度学习模型上评估了我们的IPP框架。结果表明，我们的框架成功地验证了所有模型的所有权，而对它们的主要任务没有明显的影响。最重要的是，我们第一个成功地设计和实现了一个基于盲水印的框架，它可以实现最先进的性能，对逃避攻击的不可检测性和对所有权欺诈的不可伪造性。此外，我们的框架显示了显著的鲁棒性，并在模型和作者身份之间建立了明确的关联。
papers.title_zh: 如何证明您的模型属于您：一个基于盲水标记的框架来保护DNN的知识产权

papers.title: D2NN: a fine-grained dual modular redundancy framework for deep neural networks
papers.authors: Yu Li, Yannan Liu, Min Li, Ye Tian, Bo Luo, Qiang Xu
papers.abstract: Deep Neural Networks (DNNs) have attracted mainstream adoption in various application domains. Their reliability and security are therefore serious concerns in those safety-critical applications such as surveillance and medical systems. In this paper, we propose a novel dual modular redundancy framework for DNNs, namely D2NN, which is able to tradeoff the system robustness with overhead in a fine-grained manner. We evaluate D2NN framework with DNN models trained on MNIST and CIFAR10 datasets under fault injection attacks, and experimental results demonstrate the efficacy of our proposed solution.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度神经网络(DNNs)已经吸引了各种应用领域中的主流采用。因此，在监控和医疗系统等对安全要求严格的应用中，它们的可靠性和安全性是非常重要的问题。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的双模冗余DNNs框架，即D2NN，它能够以细粒度的方式在系统健壮性和开销之间进行权衡。我们使用在MNIST和CIFAR10数据集上训练的DNN模型在故障注入攻击下评估D2NN框架，实验结果证明了我们提出的解决方案的有效性。
papers.title_zh: D2NN：深神经网络的细粒度双重模块化冗余框架

papers.title: Model inversion attacks against collaborative inference
papers.authors: Zecheng He, Tianwei Zhang, Ruby B. Lee
papers.abstract: The prevalence of deep learning has drawn attention to the privacy protection of sensitive data. Various privacy threats have been presented, where an adversary can steal model owners' private data. Meanwhile, countermeasures have also been introduced to achieve privacy-preserving deep learning. However, most studies only focused on data privacy during training, and ignored privacy during inference. In this paper, we devise a new set of attacks to compromise the inference data privacy in collaborative deep learning systems. Specifically, when a deep neural network and the corresponding inference task are split and distributed to different participants, one malicious participant can accurately recover an arbitrary input fed into this system, even if he has no access to other participants' data or computations, or to prediction APIs to query this system. We evaluate our attacks under different settings, models and datasets, to show their effectiveness and generalization. We also study the characteristics of deep learning models that make them susceptible to such inference privacy threats. This provides insights and guidelines to develop more privacy-preserving collaborative systems and algorithms.
papers.abstract_zh: 深度学习的流行引起了对敏感数据隐私保护的关注。各种隐私威胁已经出现，其中对手可以窃取模型所有者的私人数据。同时，也提出了实现隐私保护深度学习的对策。然而，大多数研究只关注训练过程中的数据隐私，而忽略了推理过程中的隐私。在本文中，我们设计了一组新的攻击来破坏协作深度学习系统中的推理数据隐私。具体而言，当深度神经网络和相应的推理任务被分割并分配给不同的参与者时，一个恶意参与者可以准确地恢复输入到该系统中的任意输入，即使他无法访问其他参与者的数据或计算，或者无法访问预测API来查询该系统。我们在不同的设置、模型和数据集下评估了我们的攻击，以显示它们的有效性和通用性。我们还研究了深度学习模型的特征，这些特征使它们容易受到这种推断隐私威胁。这为开发更多保护隐私的协作系统和算法提供了见解和指南。
papers.title_zh: 对协作推理的模型反转攻击

papers.title: Systematic comparison of symbolic execution systems: intermediate representation and its generation
papers.authors: Sebastian Poeplau, Aurélien Francillon
papers.abstract: Symbolic execution has become a popular technique for software testing and vulnerability detection. Most implementations transform the program under analysis to some intermediate representation (IR), which is then used as a basis for symbolic execution. There is a multitude of available IRs, and even more approaches to transform target programs into a respective IR. When developing a symbolic execution engine, one needs to choose an IR, but it is not clear which influence the IR generation process has on the resulting system. What are the respective benefits for symbolic execution of generating IR from source code versus lifting machine code? Does the distinction even matter? What is the impact of not using an IR, executing machine code directly? We feel that there is little scientific evidence backing the answers to those questions. Therefore, we first develop a methodology for systematic comparison of different approaches to symbolic execution; we then use it to evaluate the impact of the choice of IR and IR generation. We make our comparison framework available to the community for future research.
papers.abstract_zh: 符号执行已经成为软件测试和漏洞检测的流行技术。大多数实现将被分析的程序转换成某种中间表示(IR ),然后用作符号执行的基础。有许多可用的IR，甚至有更多的方法将目标程序转换成各自的IR。当开发一个符号执行引擎时，需要选择一个IR，但是不清楚IR生成过程对最终系统有什么影响。与提升机器代码相比，从源代码生成IR对于符号执行分别有什么好处？这种区别重要吗？不使用IR，直接执行机器码会有什么影响？我们认为很少有科学证据支持这些问题的答案。因此，我们首先发展了一个系统比较符号执行的不同方法的方法论；然后，我们用它来评估选择IR和IR生成的影响。我们将我们的比较框架提供给社区用于未来的研究。
papers.title_zh: 符号执行系统的系统比较：中间表示及其生成

papers.title: How to kill symbolic deobfuscation for free (or: unleashing the potential of path-oriented protections)
papers.authors: Mathilde Ollivier, Sébastien Bardin, Richard Bonichon, Jean-Yves Marion
papers.abstract: Code obfuscation is a major tool for protecting software intellectual property from attacks such as reverse engineering or code tampering. Yet, recently proposed (automated) attacks based on Dynamic Symbolic Execution (DSE) shows very promising results, hence threatening software integrity. Current defenses are not fully satisfactory, being either not efficient against symbolic reasoning, or affecting runtime performance too much, or being too easy to spot. We present and study a new class of anti-DSE protections coined as path-oriented protections targeting the weakest spot of DSE, namely path exploration. We propose a lightweight, efficient, resistant and analytically proved class of obfuscation algorithms designed to hinder DSE-based attacks. Extensive evaluation demonstrates that these approaches critically counter symbolic deobfuscation while yielding only a very slight overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 代码混淆是保护软件知识产权免受诸如逆向工程或代码篡改等攻击的主要工具。然而，最近提出的基于动态符号执行(DSE)的(自动)攻击显示了非常有希望的结果，因此威胁到软件的完整性。当前的防御措施并不完全令人满意，要么对符号推理效率不高，要么对运行时性能影响太大，要么太容易被发现。我们提出并研究了一类新的抗DSE保护，称为面向路径的保护，针对DSE的最弱点，即路径探测。我们提出了一个轻量级的，有效的，抵抗的和分析证明的混淆算法类，旨在阻止基于DSE的攻击。广泛的评估表明，这些方法严格地对抗符号去模糊，同时仅产生非常小的开销。
papers.title_zh: 如何自由杀死象征性去滥用（或释放面向路径的保护的潜力）

papers.title: Sleak: automating address space layout derandomization
papers.authors: Christophe Hauser, Jayakrishna Menon, Yan Shoshitaishvili, Ruoyu Wang, Giovanni Vigna, Christopher Kruegel
papers.abstract: We present a novel approach to automatically recover information about the address space layout of remote processes in the presence of Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR). Our system, dubbed Sleak, performs static analysis and symbolic execution of binary executable programs, and identifies program paths and input parameters leading to partial (i.e., only a few bits) or complete (i.e., the whole address) information disclosure vulnerabilities, revealing addresses of known objects of the target service or application. Sleak takes, as input, the binary executable program, and generates a symbolic expression for each program output that leaks information about the addresses of objects, such as stack variables, heap structures, or function pointers. By comparing these expressions with the concrete output of a remote process executing the same binary program image, our system is able to recover from a few bits to whole addresses of objects of the target application or service. Discovering the address of a single object in the target application is often enough to guess the layout of entire sections of the address space, which can be leveraged by attackers to bypass ASLR.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种新的方法，在存在地址空间布局随机化(ASLR)的情况下，自动恢复关于远程进程的地址空间布局的信息。我们的系统称为Sleak，对二进制可执行程序进行静态分析和符号执行，并识别导致部分(即只有几个位)或完整(即整个地址)信息泄露漏洞的程序路径和输入参数，从而泄露目标服务或应用程序的已知对象的地址。Sleak将二进制可执行程序作为输入，并为每个泄漏对象地址信息(如堆栈变量、堆结构或函数指针)的程序输出生成一个符号表达式。通过将这些表达式与执行相同二进制程序映像的远程进程的具体输出进行比较，我们的系统能够从目标应用程序或服务的对象的几个位恢复到整个地址。发现目标应用程序中单个对象的地址通常足以猜测地址空间的整个部分的布局，攻击者可以利用这一点绕过ASLR。
papers.title_zh: 笑：自动化地址空间布局降低

papers.title: SIP shaker: software integrity protection composition
papers.authors: Mohsen Ahmadvand, Dennis Fischer, Sebastian Banescu
papers.abstract: Man-At-The-End (MATE) attackers are almighty adversaries against whom there exists no silver-bullet countermeasure. To raise the bar, a wide range of protection measures were proposed in the literature each of which adds resilience against certain attacks on certain digital assets of a program. Intuitively, composing a set of protections (rather than applying just one of them) can mitigate a wider range of attacks and hence offer a higher level of security. Despite the potential benefits, very limited research has been done on the composition of protections. Naive compositions could lead to conflicts which, in turn, limit the application of protections, raise false alarms, and worse yet, yield corrupted binaries. More importantly, inadequate compositions of such protections are not tailored for the program at hand and thus the offered security and performance are sub-optimal. In this paper, we first lay out a set of generic constraints for a conflict-free composition of protections. Then, we develop a composition framework based on a defense graph in which nodes and edges capture protections, their relations, and constraints. The conflicts problem together with optimization requirements are then translated into a set of integer constraints. We then use Integer Linear Programming (ILP) to handle conflicts while optimizing for a higher security and lower overhead. To measure the overhead, we use a set of real-world programs (MiBench dataset and open source games). Our evaluation results indicate that our composition framework reduces the overhead by ≈ 39% while maximizing the coverage. Moreover, our approach yields a 5-fold decrease in overhead compared to state-of-the-art heuristics.
papers.abstract_zh: 末端人(MATE)攻击者是全能的对手，对他们不存在银弹对策。为了提高门槛，在文献中提出了广泛的保护措施，每种措施都增加了对程序的某些数字资产的某些攻击的弹性。直觉上，组成一组保护(而不是只应用其中的一种)可以缓解更大范围的攻击，从而提供更高的安全性。尽管有潜在的好处，但对保护措施的组成进行的研究非常有限。简单的组合可能导致冲突，进而限制保护的应用，引发错误警报，更糟糕的是，产生损坏的二进制文件。更重要的是，这种保护的不充分组成不是为手边的程序定制的，因此所提供的安全性和性能是次优的。在本文中，我们首先为无冲突的保护组合设置了一组通用约束。然后，我们开发了一个基于防御图的合成框架，其中节点和边捕获保护、它们的关系和约束。然后将冲突问题和优化要求一起转化为一组整数约束。然后，我们使用整数线性规划(ILP)来处理冲突，同时优化更高的安全性和更低的开销。为了测量开销，我们使用了一组真实世界的程序(MiBench数据集和开源游戏)。我们的评估结果表明，我们的组合框架减少了大约39%的开销，同时最大化了覆盖率。此外，与最先进的启发式算法相比，我们的方法的开销减少了5倍。
papers.title_zh: SIP振动筛：软件完整性保护组成

papers.title: Detecting organized eCommerce fraud using scalable categorical clustering
papers.authors: Samuel Marchal, Sebastian Szyller
papers.abstract: Online retail, eCommerce, frequently falls victim to fraud conducted by malicious customers (fraudsters) who obtain goods or services through deception. Fraud coordinated by groups of professional fraudsters that place several fraudulent orders to maximize their gain is referred to as organized fraud. Existing approaches to fraud detection typically analyze orders in isolation and they are not effective at identifying groups of fraudulent orders linked to organized fraud. These also wrongly identify many legitimate orders as fraud, which hinders their usage for automated fraud cancellation. We introduce a novel solution to detect organized fraud by analyzing orders in bulk. Our approach is based on clustering and aims to group together fraudulent orders placed by the same group of fraudsters. It selectively uses two existing techniques, agglomerative clustering and sampling to recursively group orders into small clusters in a reasonable amount of time. We assess our clustering technique on real-world orders placed on the Zalando website, the largest online apparel retailer in Europe1. Our clustering processes 100,000s of orders in a few hours and groups 35-45% of fraudulent orders together. We propose a simple technique built on top of our clustering that detects 26.2% of fraud while raising false alarms for only 0.1% of legitimate orders.
papers.abstract_zh: 在线零售、电子商务经常成为通过欺骗获得商品或服务的恶意客户(欺诈者)实施的欺诈的受害者。由职业欺诈者组成的团伙通过发出几份欺诈订单来最大化其收益的欺诈行为被称为有组织欺诈。现有的欺诈检测方法通常孤立地分析订单，并且它们不能有效地识别与有组织的欺诈相关联的欺诈订单组。这些方法还会错误地将许多合法订单识别为欺诈订单，这阻碍了它们在自动欺诈取消中的使用。我们介绍了一种新颖的解决方案，通过分析批量订单来检测有组织的欺诈。我们的方法基于聚类，旨在将同一组欺诈者发出的欺诈订单组合在一起。它有选择地使用两种现有技术，凝聚聚类和抽样，在合理的时间内递归地将订单分组为小的聚类。我们对欧洲最大的在线服装零售商Zalando网站上的真实订单评估了我们的聚类技术1。我们的聚类在几个小时内处理100，000份订单，并将35-45%的欺诈订单归为一组。我们提出了一种建立在我们的聚类之上的简单技术，该技术检测到26.2%的欺诈，而只对0.1%的合法订单发出错误警报。
papers.title_zh: 使用可扩展的分类集群检测有组织的电子商务欺诈

papers.title: SIMPLE: single-frame based physical layer identification for intrusion detection and prevention on in-vehicle networks
papers.authors: Mahsa Foruhandeh, Yanmao Man, Ryan M. Gerdes, Ming Li, Thidapat Chantem
papers.abstract: The Controller Area Network (CAN) is a bus standard commonly used in the automotive industry for connecting Electronic Control Units (ECUs) within a vehicle. The broadcast nature of this protocol, along with the lack of authentication or strong integrity guarantees for frames, allows for arbitrary data injection/modification and impersonation of the ECUs. While mitigation strategies have been proposed to counter these attacks, high implementation costs or violation of backward compatibility hinder their deployment. In this work, we first examine the shortcomings of state-of-the-art CAN intrusion detection and identification systems that rely on multiple frames to detect misbehavior and attribute it to a particular ECU, and show that they are vulnerable to a Hill-Climbing-style attack. Then we propose SIMPLE, a real-time intrusion detection and identification system that exploits physical layer features of ECUs, which would not only allow an attack to be detected using a single frame but also be effectively nullified. SIMPLE has low computational and data acquisition costs, and its efficacy is demonstrated by both in-lab experiments with automotive-grade CAN transceivers as well as in-vehicle experiments, where average equal error rates of close to 0% and 0.8985% are achieved, respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 控制器局域网(CAN)是汽车工业中常用的总线标准，用于连接车辆内的电子控制单元(ECU)。这种协议的广播性质，以及缺乏对帧的认证或强完整性保证，允许任意数据注入/修改和对ECU的假冒。虽然已经提出了缓解策略来对抗这些攻击，但是高实现成本或违反向后兼容性阻碍了它们的部署。在这项工作中，我们首先检查了先进的CAN入侵检测和识别系统的缺点，这些系统依靠多个帧来检测不当行为并将其归因于特定的ECU，并表明它们容易受到爬山式攻击。然后，我们提出了一个简单的实时入侵检测和识别系统，该系统利用了ECU的物理层特性，不仅允许使用单个帧来检测攻击，而且还能有效地消除攻击。SIMPLE具有较低的计算和数据采集成本，汽车级CAN收发器的实验室实验和车载实验均证明了其功效，平均等误差率分别接近0%和0.8985%。
papers.title_zh: 简单：基于单帧的物理层识别，用于入侵检测和预防车载网络

papers.title: Improving intrusion detectors by crook-sourcing
papers.authors: Frederico Araujo, Gbadebo Ayoade, Khaled Al-Naami, Yang Gao, Kevin W. Hamlen, Latifur Khan
papers.abstract: Conventional cyber defenses typically respond to detected attacks by rejecting them as quickly and decisively as possible; but aborted attacks are missed learning opportunities for intrusion detection. A method of reimagining cyber attacks as free sources of live training data for machine learning-based intrusion detection systems (IDSes) is proposed and evaluated. Rather than aborting attacks against legitimate services, adversarial interactions are selectively prolonged to maximize the defender's harvest of useful threat intelligence. Enhancing web services with deceptive attack-responses in this way is shown to be a powerful and practical strategy for improved detection, addressing several perennial challenges for machine learning-based IDS in the literature, including scarcity of training data, the high labeling burden for (semi-)supervised learning, encryption opacity, and concept differences between honeypot attacks and those against genuine services. By reconceptualizing software security patches as feature extraction engines, the approach conscripts attackers as free penetration testers, and coordinates multiple levels of the software stack to achieve fast, automatic, and accurate labeling of live web data streams. Prototype implementations are showcased for two feature set models to extract security-relevant network- and system-level features from servers hosting enterprise-grade web applications. The evaluation demonstrates that the extracted data can be fed back into a network-level IDS for exceptionally accurate, yet lightweight attack detection.
papers.abstract_zh: 传统的网络防御通常通过尽可能迅速果断地拒绝检测到的攻击来做出反应；但是失败的攻击错过了入侵检测的学习机会。提出并评估了一种将网络攻击重新想象为基于机器学习的入侵检测系统(IDSes)的免费实时训练数据源的方法。不是中止对合法服务的攻击，而是有选择地延长敌对的交互，以最大限度地使防御者收获有用的威胁情报。以这种方式增强具有欺骗性攻击响应的web服务被证明是一种用于改进检测的强大而实用的策略，解决了文献中基于机器学习的IDS的几个长期挑战，包括训练数据的稀缺、(半)监督学习的高标记负担、加密不透明性以及蜜罐攻击和针对真实服务的攻击之间的概念差异。通过将软件安全补丁重新概念化为特征提取引擎，该方法将攻击者招募为自由渗透测试者，并协调软件堆栈的多个级别，以实现实时web数据流的快速、自动和准确标记。展示了两个特性集模型的原型实现，以从托管企业级web应用程序的服务器中提取安全相关的网络级和系统级特性。评估表明，提取的数据可以反馈到网络级入侵检测系统，以实现异常准确、轻量级的攻击检测。
papers.title_zh: 通过骗子来改善入侵探测器

papers.title: JStap: a static pre-filter for malicious JavaScript detection
papers.authors: Aurore Fass, Michael Backes, Ben Stock
papers.abstract: Given the success of the Web platform, attackers have abused its main programming language, namely JavaScript, to mount different types of attacks on their victims. Due to the large volume of such malicious scripts, detection systems rely on static analyses to quickly process the vast majority of samples. These static approaches are not infallible though and lead to misclassifications. Also, they lack semantic information to go beyond purely syntactic approaches. In this paper, we propose JStap, a modular static JavaScript detection system, which extends the detection capability of existing lexical and AST-based pipelines by also leveraging control and data flow information. Our detector is composed of ten modules, including five different ways of abstracting code, with differing levels of context and semantic information, and two ways of extracting features. Based on the frequency of these specific patterns, we train a random forest classifier for each module. In practice, JStap outperforms existing systems, which we reimplemented and tested on our dataset totaling over 270,000 samples. To improve the detection, we also combine the predictions of several modules. A first layer of unanimous voting classifies 93% of our dataset with an accuracy of 99.73%, while a second layer-based on an alternative modules' combination-labels another 6.5% of our initial dataset with an accuracy over 99%. This way, JStap can be used as a precise pre-filter, meaning that it would only need to forward less than 1% of samples to additional analyses. For reproducibility and direct deployability of our modules, we make our system publicly available.1
papers.abstract_zh: 鉴于网络平台的成功，攻击者滥用其主要编程语言，即JavaScript，对受害者发起不同类型的攻击。由于此类恶意脚本数量庞大，检测系统依赖静态分析来快速处理绝大多数样本。这些静态方法并不是绝对可靠的，会导致错误的分类。此外，它们缺乏语义信息，无法超越纯粹的语法方法。在本文中，我们提出了JStap，一个模块化的静态JavaScript检测系统，它通过利用控制和数据流信息，扩展了现有的基于词法和基于AST的管道的检测能力。我们的检测器由十个模块组成，包括五种不同的代码抽象方式，不同层次的上下文和语义信息，以及两种提取特征的方式。基于这些特定模式的频率，我们为每个模块训练一个随机森林分类器。在实践中，JStap优于现有系统，我们在总共超过270，000个样本的数据集上重新实现和测试了现有系统。为了改进检测，我们还结合了几个模块的预测。一致投票的第一层以99.73%的准确度对我们数据集的93%进行分类，而基于替代模块组合的第二层以超过99%的准确度对我们初始数据集的另外6.5%进行标记。通过这种方式，JStap可以用作精确的预过滤器，这意味着它只需要将不到1%的样品进行额外的分析。为了模块的可再现性和直接可部署性，我们将系统公之于众。1
papers.title_zh: JSTAP：恶意JavaScript检测的静态过滤器

papers.title: Koinonia: verifiable e-voting with long-term privacy
papers.authors: Huangyi Ge, Sze Yiu Chau, Victor E. Gonsalves, Huian Li, Tianhao Wang, Xukai Zou, Ninghui Li
papers.abstract: Despite years of research, many existing e-voting systems do not adequately protect voting privacy. In most cases, such systems only achieve "immediate privacy", that is, they only protect voting privacy against today's adversaries, but not against a future adversary, who may possess better attack technologies like new cryptanalysis algorithms and/or quantum computers. Previous attempts at providing long-term voting privacy (dubbed "everlasting privacy" in the literature) often require additional trusts in parties that do not need to be trusted for immediate privacy. In this paper, we present a framework of adversary models regarding e-voting systems, and analyze possible threats to voting privacy under each model. Based on our analysis, we argue that secret-sharing based voting protocols offer a more natural and elegant privacy-preserving solution than their encryption-based counterparts. We thus design and implement Koinonia, a voting system that provides long-term privacy against powerful adversaries and enables anyone to verify that each ballot is well-formed and the tallying is done correctly. Our experiments show that Koinonia protects voting privacy with a reasonable performance.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管经过多年的研究，许多现有的电子投票系统并没有充分保护投票隐私。在大多数情况下，这种系统只能实现“即时隐私”，也就是说，它们只能保护投票隐私免受今天的对手的攻击，而不能抵御未来的对手，后者可能拥有更好的攻击技术，如新的密码分析算法和/或量子计算机。以前提供长期投票隐私(在文献中称为“永久隐私”)的尝试通常需要对不需要信任即时隐私的各方进行额外的信任。在本文中，我们提出了一个关于电子投票系统的对手模型框架，并分析了每种模型下可能存在的对投票隐私的威胁。基于我们的分析，我们认为基于秘密共享的投票协议比基于加密的投票协议提供了更自然、更优雅的隐私保护方案。因此，我们设计并实现了Koinonia，这是一个投票系统，它提供了针对强大对手的长期隐私，并使任何人都能够验证每张选票的格式是否正确以及计票是否正确。实验表明，Koinonia以合理的性能保护了投票隐私。
papers.title_zh: Koinonia：可通过长期隐私进行可验证的电子投票

papers.title: Whisper: a unilateral defense against VoIP traffic re-identification attacks
papers.authors: Tavish Vaidya, Tim Walsh, Micah Sherr
papers.abstract: Encrypted voice-over-IP (VoIP) communication often uses variable bit rate (VBR) codecs to achieve good audio quality while minimizing bandwidth costs. Prior work has shown that encrypted VBR-based VoIP streams are vulnerable to re-identification attacks in which an attacker can infer attributes (e.g., the language being spoken, the identities of the speakers, and key phrases) about the underlying audio by analyzing the distribution of packet sizes. Existing defenses require the participation of both the sender and receiver to secure their VoIP communications. This paper presents Whisper, the first unilateral defense against re-identification attacks on encrypted VoIP streams. Whisper works by modifying the audio signal before it is encoded by the VBR codec, adding inaudible audio that either falls outside the fixed range of human hearing or is within the human audible range but is nearly imperceptible due to its low amplitude. By carefully inserting such noise, Whisper modifies the audio stream's distribution of packet sizes, significantly decreasing the accuracy of re-identification attacks. Its use is imperceptible by the (human) receiver. Whisper can be instrumented as an audio driver and requires no changes to existing (potentially closed-source) VoIP software. Since it is a unilateral defense, it can be applied at will by a user to enhance the privacy of its voice communications. We demonstrate that Whisper significantly reduces the accuracy of re-identification attacks and incurs only a small degradation in audio quality.
papers.abstract_zh: 加密的IP语音(VoIP)通信通常使用可变比特率(VBR)编解码器来实现良好的音频质量，同时最大限度地降低带宽成本。先前的工作已经表明，加密的基于VBR的VoIP流容易受到重新识别攻击，在这种攻击中，攻击者可以通过分析分组大小的分布来推断关于底层音频的属性(例如，正在说的语言、说话者的身份和关键短语)。现有的防御措施需要发送方和接收方共同参与，以保护他们的VoIP通信。本文介绍了Whisper，这是第一个针对加密VoIP流的重识别攻击的单边防御方法。Whisper的工作原理是在音频信号被VBR编解码器编码之前对其进行修改，添加听不见的音频，这些音频要么不在人类听觉的固定范围内，要么在人类听觉范围内，但由于其振幅较低，几乎察觉不到。通过仔细插入这种噪声，Whisper修改了音频流的数据包大小分布，显著降低了重新识别攻击的准确性。它的使用是(人类)接收器察觉不到的。Whisper可以作为音频驱动程序，不需要对现有的(潜在的闭源)VoIP软件进行任何更改。因为它是单方面的防御，所以用户可以随意应用它来增强其语音通信的私密性。我们证明了Whisper显著降低了重新识别攻击的准确性，并且仅导致音频质量的轻微下降。
papers.title_zh: 耳语：针对VoIP交通重新识别攻击的单方面防御

papers.title: Privacy preserving substring search protocol with polylogarithmic communication cost
papers.authors: Nicholas Mainardi, Alessandro Barenghi, Gerardo Pelosi
papers.abstract: The problem of efficiently searching into outsourced encrypted data, while providing strong privacy guarantees, is a challenging problem arising from the separation of data ownership and data management typical of cloud-based applications. Several cryptographic solutions allowing a client to look-up occurrences of a substring of choice in an outsourced document collection have been publicly presented. Nonetheless, practical application requirements in terms of privacy, security and efficiency actively push for new and improved solutions. We present a privacy-preserving substring search protocol exhibiting a sub-linear communication cost, with a limited computational effort on the server side. The proposed protocol provides search pattern and access pattern privacy, while its extension to a multi-user setting shows significant savings in terms of outsourced storage w.r.t. a baseline solution where the whole dataset is replicated. The performance figures of an optimized implementation of our protocol, searching into a remotely stored genomic dataset, validate the practicality of the approach exhibiting a data transfer of less than 200 kiB to execute a query over a document of 40 MiB, with execution times on client and server in the range of a few seconds and a few minutes, respectively.
papers.abstract_zh: 在提供强大的隐私保证的同时有效地搜索外包加密数据的问题是一个具有挑战性的问题，该问题源于基于云的应用程序中典型的数据所有权和数据管理的分离。允许客户在外包文档集合中查找选择的子串的出现的几种加密解决方案已经公开提出。然而，隐私、安全和效率方面的实际应用需求积极推动新的和改进的解决方案。我们提出了一个隐私保护的子串搜索协议，该协议展示了一个次线性的通信代价，并且在服务器端具有有限的计算量。所提出的协议提供了搜索模式和访问模式隐私，而其对多用户设置的扩展显示出在外包存储w.r.t .方面的显著节省，这是一种复制整个数据集的基线解决方案。我们的协议的优化实现的性能图，搜索到远程存储的基因组数据集，验证了该方法的实用性，该方法展示了在40 MiB的文档上执行查询的小于200 kiB的数据传输，在客户端和服务器上的执行时间分别在几秒和几分钟的范围内。
papers.title_zh: 使用Polyogarithmic Communication Escons保留底带搜索协议的隐私搜索协议

papers.title: Revisiting utility metrics for location privacy-preserving mechanisms
papers.authors: Virat Shejwalkar, Amir Houmansadr, Hossein Pishro-Nik, Dennis Goeckel
papers.abstract: The literature has extensively studied various location privacy-preserving mechanisms (LPPMs) in order to improve the location privacy of the users of location-based services (LBSes). Such privacy, however, comes at the cost of degrading the utility of the underlying LBSes. The main body of previous work has used a generic distance-only based metric to quantify the quality loss incurred while employing LPPMs. In this paper, we argue that using such generic utility metrics misleads the design and evaluation of LPPMs, since generic utility metrics do not capture the actual utility perceived by the users. We demonstrate this for ride-hailing services, a popular class of LBS with complex utility behavior. Specifically, we design a privacy-preserving ride-hailing service, called PRide, and demonstrate the significant distinction between its generic and tailored metrics. Through various experiments we show the significant implications of using generic utility metrics in the design and evaluation of LPPMs. Our work concludes that LPPM design and evaluation should use utility metrics that are tailored to the individual LBSes.
papers.abstract_zh: 文献广泛研究了各种位置隐私保护机制，以提高基于位置的服务用户的位置隐私。然而，这种隐私是以降低潜在lbs的效用为代价的。先前工作的主体已经使用了通用的仅基于距离的度量来量化在使用LPPMs时发生的质量损失。在本文中，我们认为使用这种通用效用度量会误导LPPMs的设计和评估，因为通用效用度量并不能捕捉用户感知的实际效用。我们为打车服务证明了这一点，打车服务是一种受欢迎的LBS类别，具有复杂的效用行为。具体来说，我们设计了一个保护隐私的叫车服务，名为PRide，并展示了其通用指标和定制指标之间的显著差异。通过各种实验，我们展示了在LPPMs的设计和评估中使用通用效用度量的重要意义。我们的工作得出结论，LPPM的设计和评估应该使用适合个体lbs的效用度量。
papers.title_zh: 重新访问位置保护机制的实用程序指标

papers.title: Detecting (absent) app-to-app authentication on cross-device short-distance channels
papers.authors: Stefano Cristalli, Long Lu, Danilo Bruschi, Andrea Lanzi
papers.abstract: Short-distance or near-field communication is increasingly used by mobile apps for interacting or exchanging data in a cross-device fashion. In this paper, we identify a security issue, namely cross-device app-to-app communication hijacking (or CATCH), that affect Android apps using short-distance channels (e.g., Bluetooth and Wi-Fi-Direct). This issue causes unauthenticated or malicious app-to-app interactions even when the underlying communication channels are authenticated and secured. In addition to discovering the security issue, we design an algorithm based on data-flow analysis for detecting the presence of CATCH in Android apps. Our algorithm checks if a given app contains an app-to-app authentication scheme, necessary for preventing CATCH. We perform experiments on a set of Android apps and show the CATCH problem is always present on the whole analyzed applications set. We also discuss the impact of the problem in real scenarios by presenting two real case studies. At the end of the paper we reported limitations of our model along with future improvements.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动应用越来越多地使用短距离或近场通信，以跨设备的方式进行交互或交换数据。在本文中，我们发现了一个安全问题，即跨设备应用程序到应用程序的通信劫持(或CATCH)，它会影响使用短距离通道(如蓝牙和Wi-Fi-Direct)的Android应用程序。此问题会导致未经身份验证或恶意的应用程序到应用程序的交互，即使底层通信通道已经过身份验证并受到保护。除了发现安全问题，我们还设计了一种基于数据流分析的算法，用于检测Android应用程序中CATCH的存在。我们的算法检查给定的应用程序是否包含应用程序到应用程序的认证方案，这是防止捕获所必需的。我们对一组Android应用程序进行了实验，结果显示，捕获问题总是出现在整个分析的应用程序集上。我们还通过两个真实的案例研究来讨论这个问题在真实场景中的影响。在文章的最后，我们报告了我们的模型的局限性以及未来的改进。
papers.title_zh: 在跨设备短距离通道上检测（缺乏）应用程序到应用程序身份验证

papers.title: An empirical study of SMS one-time password authentication in Android apps
papers.authors: Siqi Ma, Runhan Feng, Juanru Li, Yang Liu, Surya Nepal, Diethelm Ostry, Elisa Bertino, Robert H. Deng, Zhuo Ma, Sanjay Jha
papers.abstract: A great quantity of user passwords nowadays has been leaked through security breaches of user accounts. To enhance the security of the Password Authentication Protocol (PAP) in such circumstance, Android app developers often implement a complementary One-Time Password (OTP) authentication by utilizing the short message service (SMS). Unfortunately, SMS is not specially designed as a secure service and thus an SMS One-Time Password is vulnerable to many attacks. To check whether a wide variety of currently used SMS OTP authentication protocols in Android apps are properly implemented, this paper presents an empirical study against them. We first derive a set of rules from RFC documents as the guide to implement secure SMS OTP authentication protocol. Then we implement an automated analysis system, AUTH-EYE, to check whether a real-world OTP authentication scheme violates any of these rules. Without accessing server source code, AUTH-EYE executes Android apps to trigger the OTP-relevant functionalities and then analyzes the OTP implementations including those proprietary ones. By only analyzing SMS responses, AUTH-EYE is able to assess the conformance of those implementations to our recommended rules and identify the potentially insecure apps. In our empirical study, AUTH-EYE analyzed 3,303 popular Android apps and found that 544 of them adopt SMS OTP authentication. The further analysis of AUTH-EYE demonstrated a far-from-optimistic status: the implementations of 536 (98.5%) out of the 544 apps violate at least one of our defined rules. The results indicate that Android app developers should seriously consider our discussed security rules and violations so as to implement SMS OTP properly.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，大量的用户密码由于用户账户的安全漏洞而被泄露。为了在这种情况下增强密码认证协议(PAP)的安全性，Android应用开发者通常通过利用短消息服务(SMS)来实现补充的一次性密码(OTP)认证。不幸的是，SMS不是专门设计为安全服务的，因此SMS一次性密码容易受到许多攻击。为了检查Android应用程序中当前使用的各种SMS OTP认证协议是否正确实现，本文提出了一个针对它们的实证研究。我们首先从RFC文档中导出一组规则，作为实现安全SMS OTP认证协议的指南。然后，我们实现了一个自动化分析系统AUTH-EYE，来检查现实世界中的OTP认证方案是否违反了这些规则。在不访问服务器源代码的情况下，AUTH-EYE执行Android应用程序来触发OTP相关的功能，然后分析OTP实现，包括那些专有的实现。仅通过分析短信响应，AUTH-EYE就能够评估这些实施是否符合我们推荐的规则，并识别潜在的不安全应用。在我们的实证研究中，AUTH-EYE分析了3，303个流行的Android应用程序，发现其中544个采用短信OTP认证。对AUTH-EYE的进一步分析表明了一个远非乐观的状态:544个应用中的536个(98.5%)的实现违反了至少一个我们定义的规则。结果表明，Android应用程序开发人员应该认真考虑我们讨论的安全规则和违规行为，以便正确实施SMS OTP。
papers.title_zh: SMS一次性密码认证的实证研究Android应用程序

papers.title: Challenge-response behavioral mobile authentication: a comparative study of graphical patterns and cognitive games
papers.authors: Manar Mohamed, Prakash Shrestha, Nitesh Saxena
papers.abstract: The most researched behavioral biometrics for mobile device authentication involves the use of touch gestures as the user enters a graphical pattern password (like the one used on Android) or otherwise interacts with the device. However, due to the inherent static nature of these schemes, they are vulnerable to impersonation attacks. In this paper, we investigate challenge-response mechanisms to address this security vulnerability underlying the traditional static biometric schemes. We study the performance, security, and usability of two schemes of such challenge-response interactive biometric authentication geared for mobile devices and contrast them to static graphical pattern based biometrics. The first scheme is based on random graphical patterns. The second scheme, recently introduced for PC class of devices (not mobile), is based on a simple cognitive game involving semantic interactive random challenges. Our results show that the accuracy of user identification with these approaches is similar to static pattern based biometric scheme. Finally, we argue that utilizing interactivity and randomization significantly enhance the security against impersonation attacks. As an independent result, our work demonstrates that the use of motion sensors available on mobile device serves to improve the identification accuracy of schemes that only use touch-based gestures (static and interactive).
papers.abstract_zh: 研究最多的用于移动设备身份验证的行为生物识别技术涉及在用户输入图形模式密码(如Android上使用的密码)或以其他方式与设备交互时使用触摸手势。然而，由于这些方案固有的静态特性，它们容易受到假冒攻击。在本文中，我们研究挑战-响应机制来解决传统静态生物识别方案中的安全漏洞。我们研究了这种适合移动设备的挑战-响应交互式生物认证的两种方案的性能、安全性和可用性，并将它们与基于静态图形模式的生物认证进行了对比。第一种方案基于随机图形模式。第二个方案是最近为PC类设备(非移动设备)推出的，它基于一个简单的认知游戏，涉及语义交互式随机挑战。我们的结果表明，使用这些方法的用户识别的准确性类似于基于静态模式的生物特征识别方案。最后，我们认为，利用交互性和随机化可以显著增强抵御假冒攻击的安全性。作为一个独立的结果，我们的工作表明，使用移动设备上可用的运动传感器有助于提高仅使用基于触摸的手势(静态和交互)的方案的识别准确性。
papers.title_zh: 挑战响应行为移动身份验证：图形模式和认知游戏的比较研究

papers.title: AppVeto: mobile application self-defense through resource access veto
papers.authors: Tousif Osman, Mohammad Mannan, Urs Hengartner, Amr M. Youssef
papers.abstract: Modern mobile operating systems such as Android and Apple iOS allow apps to access various system resources, with or without explicit user permission. Running multiple concurrent apps is also commonly supported, although the OS generally maintains strict separation between apps. However, an app can still get access to another app's private information, such as the user input, through numerous side-channels, mostly enabled by having access to permissioned or permission-less (sometimes even unrelated) resources, e.g., inferring keystroke and swipe gestures from a victim app via the accelerometer or gyroscope. Current mobile OSes do not empower an app to defend itself from such implicit interference from other apps; few exceptions exist such as blocking screenshot captures in Android. We propose a general mechanism for apps to defend themselves from any unwanted implicit or explicit interference from other concurrently running apps. Our AppVeto solution enables an app to easily configure its requirements for a safe environment; a foreground app can request the OS to disallow access---i.e., to enable veto powers---to selected side-channel-prone resources to all other running apps for a certain (short) duration, e.g., no access to the accelerometer during password input. In a sense, we enable a finer-grained access control policy than the current runtime permission model, and delegate the responsibility of the resource access decision (for vetoing) from users to app developers. We implement AppVeto on Android using the Xposed framework, without changing Android APIs. Furthermore, we show that AppVeto imposes negligible overhead, while being effective against several well-known side-channel attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: Android和苹果iOS等现代移动操作系统允许应用程序访问各种系统资源，无论是否有明确的用户许可。运行多个并发应用程序也是普遍支持的，尽管操作系统通常在应用程序之间保持严格的分离。然而，一个应用程序仍然可以通过许多辅助渠道访问另一个应用程序的私人信息，如用户输入，主要是通过访问许可或无许可(有时甚至是无关的)资源来实现的，例如，通过加速度计或陀螺仪从受害者应用程序推断击键和滑动手势。当前的移动操作系统无法让一个应用程序保护自己免受其他应用程序的隐性干扰；很少有例外，比如在安卓系统中屏蔽截图。我们提出了一种通用机制，让应用程序能够保护自己免受其他同时运行的应用程序的任何不必要的隐式或显式干扰。我们的AppVeto解决方案使应用程序能够轻松配置其对安全环境的要求；前台应用可以请求OS在某个(短的)持续时间内禁止所有其他运行的应用访问-即，启用否决权-所选择的易受侧信道影响的资源，例如，在密码输入期间不能访问加速度计。在某种意义上，我们启用了比当前运行时权限模型更细粒度的访问控制策略，并将资源访问决策(用于否决)的责任从用户委托给应用程序开发人员。我们使用Xposed框架在Android上实现AppVeto，而不改变Android APIs。此外，我们表明AppVeto的开销可以忽略不计，同时可以有效地抵御一些众所周知的旁道攻击。
papers.title_zh: AppVeto：通过资源访问否决权的移动应用程序自卫

papers.title: Progressive processing of system-behavioral query
papers.authors: Jiaping Gui, Xusheng Xiao, Ding Li, Chung Hwan Kim, Haifeng Chen
papers.abstract: System monitoring has recently emerged as an effective way to analyze and counter advanced cyber attacks. The monitoring data records a series of system events and provides a global view of system behaviors in an organization. Querying such data to identify potential system risks and malicious behaviors helps security analysts detect and analyze abnormal system behaviors caused by attacks. However, since the data volume is huge, queries could easily run for a long time, making it difficult for system experts to obtain prompt and continuous feedback. To support interactive querying over system monitoring data, we propose ProbeQ, a system that progressively processes system-behavioral queries. It allows users to concisely compose queries that describe system behaviors and specify an update frequency to obtain partial results progressively. The query engine of ProbeQ is built based on a framework that partitions ProbeQ queries into sub-queries for parallel execution and retrieves partial results periodically based on the specified update frequency. We concretize the framework with three partition strategies that predict the workloads for sub-queries, where the adaptive workload partition strategy (AdWd) dynamically adjusts the predicted workloads for subsequent sub-queries based on the latest execution information. We evaluate the prototype system of ProbeQ on commonly used queries for suspicious behaviors over real-world system monitoring data, and the results show that the ProbeQ system can provide partial updates progressively (on average 9.1% deviation from the update frequencies) with only 1.2% execution overhead compared to the execution without progressive processing.
papers.abstract_zh: 系统监控最近成为分析和应对高级网络攻击的有效方法。监控数据记录一系列系统事件，并提供组织中系统行为的全局视图。查询此类数据以识别潜在的系统风险和恶意行为，有助于安全分析师检测和分析由攻击引起的异常系统行为。然而，由于数据量巨大，查询很容易运行很长时间，使得系统专家很难获得及时和连续的反馈。为了支持对系统监控数据的交互式查询，我们提出了ProbeQ，一个渐进处理系统行为查询的系统。它允许用户简洁地编写描述系统行为的查询，并指定更新频率以逐步获得部分结果。ProbeQ的查询引擎是基于一个框架构建的，该框架将ProbeQ查询划分为并行执行的子查询，并根据指定的更新频率定期检索部分结果。我们使用三种分区策略来预测子查询的工作负载，其中自适应工作负载分区策略(AdWd)根据最新的执行信息动态调整后续子查询的预测工作负载。我们对ProbeQ原型系统在真实世界系统监控数据上的可疑行为常用查询进行了评估，结果表明ProbeQ系统可以渐进地提供部分更新(与更新频率的平均偏差为9.1%)，与没有渐进处理的执行相比，执行开销仅为1.2%。
papers.title_zh: 系统行为查询的逐步处理

papers.title: SecDATAVIEW: a secure big data workflow management system for heterogeneous computing environments
papers.authors: Saeid Mofrad, Ishtiaq Ahmed, Shiyong Lu, Ping Yang, Heming Cui, Fengwei Zhang
papers.abstract: Big data workflow management systems (BDWFMSs) have recently emerged as popular platforms to perform large-scale data analytics in the cloud. However, the protection of data confidentiality and secure execution of workflow applications remains an important and challenging problem. Although a few data analytics systems were developed to address this problem, they are limited to specific structures such as Map-Reduce-style workflows and SQL queries. This paper proposes SecDATAVIEW, a BDWFMS that leverages Intel Software Guard eXtensions (SGX) and AMD Secure Encrypted Virtualization (SEV) to develop a heterogeneous trusted execution environment for workflows. SecDATAVIEW aims to (1) provide the confidentiality and integrity of code and data for workflows running on public untrusted clouds, (2) minimize the TCB size for a BDWFMS, (3) enable the trade-off between security and performance for workflows, and (4) support the execution of Java-based workflow tasks in SGX. Our experimental results show that SecDATAVIEW imposes 1.69x to 2.62x overhead on workflow execution time on SGX worker nodes, 1.04x to 1.29x overhead on SEV worker nodes, and 1.20x to 1.43x overhead on a heterogeneous setting in which both SGX and SEV worker nodes are used.
papers.abstract_zh: 大数据工作流管理系统(BDWFMSs)最近成为在云中执行大规模数据分析的流行平台。然而，保护数据机密性和工作流应用的安全执行仍然是一个重要的和具有挑战性的问题。虽然开发了一些数据分析系统来解决这个问题，但它们仅限于特定的结构，如Map-Reduce风格的工作流和SQL查询。本文提出SecDATAVIEW，这是一个BDWFMS，它利用英特尔软件防护扩展(SGX)和AMD安全加密虚拟化(SEV)来开发一个面向工作流的异构可信执行环境。SecDATAVIEW旨在(1)为在公共非可信云上运行的工作流提供代码和数据的机密性和完整性，(2)最小化BDWFMS的TCB大小，(3)实现工作流的安全性和性能之间的平衡，以及(4)支持在SGX中执行基于Java的工作流任务。我们的实验结果表明，SecDATAVIEW在SGX工作节点上的工作流执行时间开销为1.69到2.62倍，在SEV工作节点上的开销为1.04到1.29倍，在同时使用SGX和SEV工作节点的异构设置上的开销为1.20到1.43倍。
papers.title_zh: SECDATAVIEW：一个安全的大数据工作流程管理系统，用于异构计算环境

papers.title: Mining least privilege attribute based access control policies
papers.authors: Matthew W. Sanders, Chuan Yue
papers.abstract: Creating effective access control policies is a significant challenge to many organizations. Over-privilege increases security risk from compromised credentials, insider threats, and accidental misuse. Under-privilege prevents users from performing their duties. Policies must balance between these competing goals of minimizing under-privilege vs. over-privilege. The Attribute Based Access Control (ABAC) model has been gaining popularity in recent years because of its advantages in granularity, flexibility, and usability. ABAC allows administrators to create policies based on attributes of users, operations, resources, and the environment. However, in practice, it is often very difficult to create effective ABAC policies in terms of minimizing under-privilege and over-privilege especially for large and complex systems because their ABAC privilege spaces are typically gigantic. In this paper, we take a rule mining approach to mine systems' audit logs for automatically generating ABAC policies which minimize both under-privilege and over-privilege. We propose a rule mining algorithm for creating ABAC policies with rules, a policy scoring algorithm for evaluating ABAC policies from the least privilege perspective, and performance optimization methods for dealing with the challenges of large ABAC privilege spaces. Using a large dataset of 4.7 million Amazon Web Service (AWS) audit log events, we demonstrate that our automated approach can effectively generate least privilege ABAC policies, and can generate policies with less over-privilege and under-privilege than a Role Based Access Control (RBAC) approach. Overall, we hope our work can help promote a wider and faster deployment of the ABAC model, and can help unleash the advantages of ABAC to better protect large and complex computing systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 创建有效的访问控制策略对许多组织来说是一项重大挑战。过度特权增加了由泄密凭证、内部威胁和意外误用带来的安全风险。权限不足会阻止用户履行职责。策略必须在最小化特权不足和特权过度这两个相互竞争的目标之间进行平衡。基于属性的访问控制(ABAC)模型近年来越来越受欢迎，因为它在粒度、灵活性和可用性方面具有优势。ABAC允许管理员根据用户、操作、资源和环境的属性创建策略。然而，在实践中，通常很难在最小化欠特权和过特权方面创建有效的ABAC策略，尤其是对于大型复杂系统，因为它们的ABAC特权空间通常是巨大的。在本文中，我们采用一种规则挖掘的方法来挖掘系统的审计日志，以自动生成ABAC策略，从而最大限度地减少欠特权和过特权。我们提出了一个规则挖掘算法，用于创建带有规则的ABAC策略；一个策略评分算法，用于从最小特权角度评估ABAC策略；以及性能优化方法，用于处理大型ABAC特权空间的挑战。使用470万亚马逊Web服务(AWS)审计日志事件的大型数据集，我们证明了我们的自动化方法可以有效地生成最小特权ABAC策略，并且可以生成比基于角色的访问控制(RBAC)方法具有更少的过度特权和欠特权的策略。总的来说，我们希望我们的工作能够帮助促进ABAC模型更广泛、更快速的部署，并能够帮助释放ABAC的优势，以更好地保护大型和复杂的计算系统。
papers.title_zh: 挖掘基于属性的最小特权访问控制策略
