papers.title: MalRank: a measure of maliciousness in SIEM-based knowledge graphs
papers.authors: Pejman Najafi, Alexander Mühle, Wenzel Pünter, Feng Cheng, Christoph Meinel
papers.abstract: In this paper, we formulate threat detection in SIEM environments as a large-scale graph inference problem. We introduce a SIEM-based knowledge graph which models global associations among entities observed in proxy and DNS logs, enriched with related open source intelligence (OSINT) and cyber threat intelligence (CTI). Next, we propose MalRank, a graph-based inference algorithm designed to infer a node maliciousness score based on its associations to other entities presented in the knowledge graph, e.g., shared IP ranges or name servers. After a series of experiments on real-world data captured from a global enterprise's SIEM (spanning over 3TB of disk space), we show that MalRank maintains a high detection rate (AUC = 96%) outperforming its predecessor, Belief Propagation, both in terms of accuracy and efficiency. Furthermore, we show that this approach is effective in identifying previously unknown malicious entities such as malicious domain names and IP addresses. The system proposed in this research can be implemented in conjunction with an organization's SIEM, providing a maliciousness score for all observed entities, hence aiding SOC investigations.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们将SIEM环境中的威胁检测公式化为大规模图推理问题。我们引入了一个基于SIEM的知识图，该知识图对代理和DNS日志中观察到的实体之间的全局关联进行建模，并丰富了相关的开源情报(OSINT)和网络威胁情报(CTI)。接下来，我们提出MalRank，这是一种基于图的推理算法，用于根据节点与知识图中呈现的其他实体(例如，共享IP范围或名称服务器)的关联来推断节点恶意性得分。在对从一家全球企业的SIEM(跨越超过3TB的磁盘空间)捕获的真实世界数据进行了一系列实验后，我们表明MalRank保持了高检测率(AUC = 96%)，在准确性和效率方面都优于其前身信念传播。此外，我们表明，这种方法是有效的识别以前未知的恶意实体，如恶意域名和IP地址。本研究中提出的系统可以与组织的SIEM一起实施，为所有观察到的实体提供恶意得分，从而帮助SOC调查。
papers.title_zh: Malrank：基于SIEM的知识图中恶意性的量度

papers.title: Cubismo: decloaking server-side malware via cubist program analysis
papers.authors: Abbas Naderi-Afooshteh, Yonghwi Kwon, Anh Nguyen-Tuong, Mandana Bagheri-Marzijarani, Jack W. Davidson
papers.abstract: Malware written in dynamic languages such as PHP routinely employ anti-analysis techniques such as obfuscation schemes and evasive tricks to avoid detection. On top of that, attackers use automated malware creation tools to create numerous variants with little to no manual effort. This paper presents a system called Cubismo to solve this pressing problem. It processes potentially malicious files and decloaks their obfuscations, exposing the hidden malicious code into multiple files. The resulting files can be scanned by existing malware detection tools, leading to a much higher chance of detection. Cubismo achieves improved detection by exploring all executable statements of a suspect program counterfactually to see through complicated polymorphism, metamorphism and, obfuscation techniques and expose any malware. Our evaluation on a real-world data set collected from a commercial web hosting company shows that Cubismo is highly effective in dissecting sophisticated metamorphic malware with multiple layers of obfuscation. In particular, it enables VirusTotal to detect 53 out of 56 zero-day malware samples in the wild, which were previously undetectable.
papers.abstract_zh: 用PHP等动态语言编写的恶意软件通常采用反分析技术，如混淆方案和规避技巧来避免检测。最重要的是，攻击者使用自动化恶意软件创建工具来创建大量变种，几乎不需要手动操作。本文提出了一个名为Cubismo的系统来解决这个紧迫的问题。它处理潜在的恶意文件并解除它们的混淆，将隐藏的恶意代码暴露到多个文件中。由此产生的文件可以被现有的恶意软件检测工具扫描，导致更高的检测机会。Cubismo通过反事实地探索可疑程序的所有可执行语句来发现复杂的多态性、变质和混淆技术，并暴露任何恶意软件，从而提高检测能力。我们对从一家商业网站托管公司收集的真实数据集的评估表明，Cubismo在剖析具有多层混淆的复杂变形恶意软件方面非常有效。特别是，它使VirusTotal能够检测到56个零日恶意软件样本中的53个，这是以前无法检测到的。
papers.title_zh: Cupismo：通过立体派计划分析解剖服务器端恶意软件

papers.title: Neurlux: dynamic malware analysis without feature engineering
papers.authors: Chani Jindal, Christopher Salls, Hojjat Aghakhani, Keith Long, Christopher Kruegel, Giovanni Vigna
papers.abstract: Malware detection plays a vital role in computer security. Modern machine learning approaches have been centered around domain knowledge for extracting malicious features. However, many potential features can be used, and it is time consuming and difficult to manually identify the best features, especially given the diverse nature of malware. In this paper, we propose Neurlux, a neural network for malware detection. Neurlux does not rely on any feature engineering, rather it learns automatically from dynamic analysis reports that detail behavioral information. Our model borrows ideas from the field of document classification, using word sequences present in the reports to predict if a report is from a malicious binary or not. We investigate the learned features of our model and show which components of the reports it tends to give the highest importance. Then, we evaluate our approach on two different datasets and report formats, showing that Neurlux improves on the state of the art and can effectively learn from the dynamic analysis reports. Furthermore, we show that our approach is portable to other malware analysis environments and generalizes to different datasets.
papers.abstract_zh: 恶意软件检测在计算机安全中起着至关重要的作用。现代机器学习方法一直以提取恶意特征的领域知识为中心。然而，可以使用许多潜在的特征，并且手动识别最佳特征是耗时且困难的，尤其是考虑到恶意软件的多样性。在本文中，我们提出了Neurlux，一个用于恶意软件检测的神经网络。Neurlux不依赖任何功能工程，而是从详细描述行为信息的动态分析报告中自动学习。我们的模型借鉴了文档分类领域的思想，使用报告中出现的单词序列来预测报告是否来自恶意二进制文件。我们研究我们的模型的已知特征，并显示它倾向于给予报告的哪些部分最高的重要性。然后，我们在两个不同的数据集和报告格式上评估了我们的方法，表明Neurlux改进了现有技术，并可以有效地从动态分析报告中学习。此外，我们表明，我们的方法是可移植的其他恶意软件分析环境，并推广到不同的数据集。
papers.title_zh: Neurlux：无功能工程的动态恶意软件分析

papers.title: A game of "Cut and Mouse": bypassing antivirus by simulating user inputs
papers.authors: Ziya Alper Genç, Gabriele Lenzini, Daniele Sgandurra
papers.abstract: To protect their digital assets from malware attacks, most users and companies rely on anti-virus (AV) software. But AVs' protection is a full-time task and AVs are engaged in a cat-and-mouse game where malware, e.g., through obfuscation and polymorphism, denial of service attacks and malformed packets and parameters, try to circumvent AV defences or make them crash. On the other hand, AVs react by complementing signature-based with anomaly or behavioral detection, and by using OS protection, standard code, and binary protection techniques. Further, malware counter-act, for instance by using adversarial inputs to avoid detection, et cetera. This paper investigates two novel moves for the malware side. The first one consists in simulating mouse events to control AVs, namely to send them mouse "clicks" to deactivate their protection. We prove that many AVs can be disabled in this way, and we call this class of attacks Ghost Control. The second one consists in controlling high-integrity white-listed applications, such as Notepad, by sending them keyboard events (such as "copy-and-paste") to perform malicious operations on behalf of the malware. We prove that the anti-ransomware protection feature of some AVs can be bypassed if we use Notepad as a "puppet" to rewrite the content of protected files as a ransomware would do. Playing with the words, and recalling the cat-and-mouse game, we call this class of attacks Cut-and-Mouse.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了保护他们的数字资产免受恶意软件攻击，大多数用户和公司都依赖防病毒(AV)软件。但是，AVs的保护是一项全职任务，AVs参与了一场猫捉老鼠的游戏，恶意软件通过混淆和多态、拒绝服务攻击以及畸形的数据包和参数，试图绕过AV防御或使其崩溃。另一方面，AVs通过用异常或行为检测来补充基于签名的技术，并通过使用操作系统保护、标准代码和二进制保护技术来做出反应。此外，恶意软件反作用，例如通过使用对抗性输入来避免检测，等等。本文研究了恶意软件方面的两个新举措。第一种包括模拟鼠标事件来控制AVs，即向它们发送鼠标“点击”来解除它们的保护。我们证明了许多AVs可以通过这种方式被禁用，我们将这类攻击称为Ghost Control。第二种方法是通过向高完整性白名单应用程序(如记事本)发送键盘事件(如“复制粘贴”)来控制它们，从而代表恶意软件执行恶意操作。我们证明，如果我们使用记事本作为“傀儡”，像勒索软件一样重写受保护文件的内容，就可以绕过一些AVs的反勒索保护功能。玩玩文字游戏，回忆一下猫捉老鼠的游戏，我们把这类攻击称为猫捉老鼠。
papers.title_zh: “切割和鼠标”的游戏：通过模拟用户输入来绕过防病毒软件

papers.title: My script engines know what you did in the dark: converting engines into script API tracers
papers.authors: Toshinori Usui, Yuto Otsuki, Yuhei Kawakoya, Makoto Iwamura, Jun Miyoshi, Kanta Matsuura
papers.abstract: Malicious scripts have been crucial attack vectors in recent attacks such as malware spam (malspam) and fileless malware. Since malicious scripts are generally obfuscated, statically analyzing them is difficult due to reflections. Therefore, dynamic analysis, which is not affected by obfuscation, is used for malicious script analysis. However, despite its wide adoption, some problems remain unsolved. Current designs of script analysis tools do not fulfill the following three requirements important for malicious script analysis. (1) Universally applicable to various script languages, (2) capable of outputting analysis logs that can precisely recover the behavior of malicious scripts, and (3) applicable to proprietary script engines. In this paper, we propose a method for automatically generating script API tracer by analyzing the target script engine binaries. The method mine the knowledge of script engine internals that are required to append behavior analysis capability. This enables the addition of analysis functionalities to arbitrary script engines and generation of script API tracers that can fulfill the above requirements. Experimental results showed that we can apply this method for building malicious script analysis tools.
papers.abstract_zh: 在最近的攻击中，恶意脚本是至关重要的攻击媒介，例如恶意垃圾邮件(malspam)和无文件恶意软件。由于恶意脚本通常是模糊的，静态分析它们会因反射而变得困难。因此，不受混淆影响的动态分析用于恶意脚本分析。然而，尽管它被广泛采用，一些问题仍然没有解决。脚本分析工具的当前设计不满足恶意脚本分析的以下三个重要要求。(1)普遍适用于各种脚本语言，(2)能够输出能够精确恢复恶意脚本行为的分析日志，以及(3)适用于专有脚本引擎。本文提出了一种通过分析目标脚本引擎二进制文件自动生成脚本API tracer的方法。该方法挖掘附加行为分析能力所需的脚本引擎内部知识。这使得能够向任意脚本引擎添加分析功能，并生成能够满足上述需求的脚本API跟踪器。实验结果表明，该方法可以用于构建恶意脚本分析工具。
papers.title_zh: 我的脚本引擎知道您在黑暗中所做的事情：将引擎转换为脚本API示踪剂

papers.title: BakingTimer: privacy analysis of server-side request processing time
papers.authors: Iskander Sánchez-Rola, Davide Balzarotti, Igor Santos
papers.abstract: Cookies were originally introduced as a way to provide state awareness to websites, and are now one of the backbones of the current web. However, their use is not limited to store the login information or to save the current state of user browsing. In several cases, third-party cookies are deliberately used for web tracking, user analytics, and for online advertisement, with the subsequent privacy loss for the end users. However, cookies are not the only technique capable of retrieving the users' browsing history. In fact, history sniffing techniques are capable of tracking the users' browsing history without relying on any specific code in a third-party website, but only on code executed within the visited site. Many sniffing techniques have been proposed to date, but they usually have several limitations and they are not able to differentiate between multiple possible states within the target application. In this paper we propose BakingTimer, a new history sniffing technique based on timing the execution of server-side request processing code. This method is capable of retrieving partial or complete user browsing history, it does not require any permission, and it can be performed through both first and third-party scripts. We studied the impact of our timing side-channel attack to detect prior visits to websites, and discovered that it was capable of detecting the users state in more than half of the 10K websites analyzed, which is the largest test performed to date to test this type of techniques. We additionally performed a manual analysis to check the capabilities of the attack to differentiate between three states: never accessed, accessed and logged in. Moreover, we performed a set of stability tests, to verify that our time measurements are robust with respect to changes both in the network RTT and in the servers workload.
papers.abstract_zh: Cookies最初是作为向网站提供状态感知的一种方式引入的，现在是当前web的主干之一。但是，它们的用途并不局限于存储登录信息或保存用户浏览的当前状态。在一些情况下，第三方cookies被故意用于网络跟踪、用户分析和在线广告，最终用户的隐私随之丧失。然而，cookies并不是唯一能够检索用户浏览历史的技术。事实上，历史嗅探技术能够跟踪用户的浏览历史，而不依赖于第三方网站中的任何特定代码，而是仅依赖于在被访问的站点内执行的代码。到目前为止，已经提出了许多嗅探技术，但是它们通常有一些限制，并且它们不能区分目标应用程序中的多种可能状态。在本文中，我们提出了BakingTimer，这是一种基于对服务器端请求处理代码执行计时的新的历史嗅探技术。这种方法能够检索部分或完整的用户浏览历史，它不需要任何权限，并且可以通过第一方和第三方脚本来执行。我们研究了我们的定时旁道攻击对检测网站先前访问的影响，并发现它能够检测超过一半的10K网站的用户状态，这是迄今为止测试此类技术的最大测试。我们还执行了手动分析来检查攻击的能力，以区分三种状态:从未访问、已访问和已登录。此外，我们执行了一组稳定性测试，以验证我们的时间测量对于网络RTT和服务器工作负载的变化都是稳健的。
papers.title_zh: Bakingtimer：服务器端请求处理时间的隐私分析

papers.title: PDoT: private DNS-over-TLS with TEE support
papers.authors: Yoshimichi Nakatsuka, Andrew Paverd, Gene Tsudik
papers.abstract: Security and privacy of the Internet Domain Name System (DNS) have been longstanding concerns. Recently, there is a trend to protect DNS traffic using Transport Layer Security (TLS). However, at least two major issues remain: (1) how do clients authenticate DNS-over-TLS endpoints in a scalable and extensible manner; and (2) how can clients trust endpoints to behave as expected? In this paper, we propose a novel Private DNS-over-TLS (PDoT) architecture. PDoT includes a DNS Recursive Resolver (RecRes) that operates within a Trusted Execution Environment (TEE). Using Remote Attestation, DNS clients can authenticate, and receive strong assurance of trustworthiness of PDoT RecRes. We provide an open-source proof-of-concept implementation of PDoT and use it to experimentally demonstrate that its latency and throughput match that of the popular Unbound DNS-over-TLS resolver.
papers.abstract_zh: 互联网域名系统(DNS)的安全性和隐私性一直是人们长期关注的问题。最近，出现了使用传输层安全性(TLS)保护DNS流量的趋势。然而，至少存在两个主要问题:(1)客户端如何以可伸缩和可扩展的方式认证TLS上的DNS端点；以及(2)客户端如何信任端点按预期运行？在本文中，我们提出了一种新的私有DNS-over-TLS (PDoT)架构。PDoT包括一个在可信执行环境(TEE)中运行的DNS递归解析器(RecRes)。使用远程证明，DNS客户端可以进行身份验证，并获得PDoT RecRes可信度的有力保证。我们提供了PDoT的开源概念验证实现，并使用它来实验性地证明其延迟和吞吐量与流行的非绑定DNS-over-TLS解析器相匹配。
papers.title_zh: PDOT：带有T恤支持的私人DNS-Over-TLS

papers.title: Casino royale: a deep exploration of illegal online gambling
papers.authors: Hao Yang, Kun Du, Yubao Zhang, Shuang Hao, Zhou Li, Mingxuan Liu, Haining Wang, Hai-Xin Duan, Yazhou Shi, XiaoDong Su, Guang Liu, Zhifeng Geng, Jianping Wu
papers.abstract: The popularity of online gambling could bring negative social impact, and many countries ban or restrict online gambling. Taking China for example, online gambling violates Chinese laws and hence is illegal. However, illegal online gambling websites are still thriving despite strict restrictions, since they are able to make tremendous illicit profits by trapping and cheating online players. In this paper, we conduct the first deep analysis on illegal online gambling targeting Chinese to unveil its profit chain. After successfully identifying more than 967,954 suspicious illegal gambling websites, we inspect these illegal gambling websites from five aspects, including webpage structure similarity, SEO (Search Engine Optimization) methods, the abuse of Internet infrastructure, third-party online payment, and gambling group. Then we conduct a measurement study on the profit chain of illegal online gambling, investigating the upstream and downstream of these illegal gambling websites. We mainly focus on promotion strategies, third-party online payment, the abuse of third-party live chat services, and network infrastructures. Our findings shed the light on the ecosystem of online gambling and help the security community thwart illegal online gambling.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络赌博的流行可能带来负面的社会影响，许多国家禁止或限制网络赌博。以中国为例，网上赌博违反中国法律，因此是非法的。然而，尽管有严格的限制，非法在线赌博网站仍然蓬勃发展，因为他们能够通过诱捕和欺骗在线玩家来获取巨额非法利润。在本文中，我们首次对针对中国人的非法网络赌博进行了深入分析，以揭示其利润链。在成功识别超过967，954个可疑非法赌博网站后，我们从网页结构相似性、SEO(搜索引擎优化)方法、互联网基础设施滥用、第三方在线支付和赌博群体五个方面对这些非法赌博网站进行了检查。然后对非法网络赌博的利润链进行计量研究，调查这些非法赌博网站的上下游。我们主要关注促销策略、第三方在线支付、第三方实时聊天服务的滥用以及网络基础设施。我们的发现揭示了在线赌博的生态系统，并帮助安全社区挫败非法在线赌博。
papers.title_zh: 皇家赌场：对非法在线赌博的深入探索

papers.title: Leveraging locality of reference for certificate revocation
papers.authors: Luke Dickinson, Trevor Smith, Kent E. Seamons
papers.abstract: X.509 certificate revocation defends against man-in-the-middle attacks involving a compromised certificate. Certificate revocation strategies face scalability, effectiveness, and deployment challenges as HTTPS adoption rates have soared. We propose Certificate Revocation Table (CRT), a new revocation strategy that is competitive with or exceeds alternative state-of-the-art solutions in effectiveness, efficiency, certificate growth scalability, mass revocation event scalability, revocation timeliness, privacy, and deployment requirements. The CRT design assumes that locality of reference applies to the certificates accessed by an organization. The CRT periodically checks the revocation status of X.509 certificates recently used by the organization. Pre-checking the revocation status of certificates the clients are likely to use avoids the security problems of on-demand certificate revocation checking. To validate both the effectiveness and efficiency of our approach, we simulated a CRT using 60 days of TLS traffic logs from Brigham Young University to measure the effects of actively refreshing revocation status information for various certificate working set window lengths. A working set window size of 45 days resulted in an average of 99.86% of the TLS handshakes having revocation information cached in advance. The CRT storage requirements are small. The initial revocation status information requires downloading a 6.7 MB file, and subsequent updates require only 205.1 KB of bandwidth daily. Updates that include only revoked certificates require just 215 bytes of bandwidth per day.
papers.abstract_zh: X.509证书撤销可防御涉及受损证书的中间人攻击。随着HTTPS采用率的飙升，证书撤销策略面临着可扩展性、有效性和部署方面的挑战。我们提出了证书撤销表(CRT ),这是一种新的撤销策略，在有效性、效率、证书增长可伸缩性、大规模撤销事件可伸缩性、撤销及时性、隐私和部署要求方面可与其他最新解决方案媲美或超过后者。CRT设计假定引用位置适用于组织访问的证书。CRT定期检查组织最近使用的X.509证书的吊销状态。预先检查客户端可能使用的证书的吊销状态避免了按需证书吊销检查的安全问题。为了验证我们的方法的有效性和效率，我们使用来自Brigham Young大学的60天TLS流量日志来模拟CRT，以测量针对各种证书工作集窗口长度主动刷新撤销状态信息的效果。45天的工作集窗口大小导致平均99.86%的TLS握手预先缓存了撤销信息。CRT的存储需求很小。初始吊销状态信息需要下载一个6.7 MB的文件，后续更新每天只需要205.1 KB的带宽。仅包含已吊销证书的更新每天只需要215字节的带宽。
papers.title_zh: 利用证书撤销的参考位置

papers.title: Opening Pandora's box through ATFuzzer: dynamic analysis of AT interface for Android smartphones
papers.authors: Imtiaz Karim, Fabrizio Cicala, Syed Rafiul Hussain, Omar Chowdhury, Elisa Bertino
papers.abstract: This paper focuses on checking the correctness and robustness of the AT command interface exposed by the cellular baseband processor through Bluetooth and USB. A device's application processor uses this interface for issuing high-level commands (or, AT commands) to the baseband processor for performing cellular network operations (e.g., placing a phone call). Vulnerabilities in this interface can be leveraged by malicious Bluetooth peripherals to launch pernicious attacks including DoS and privacy attacks. To identify such vulnerabilities, we propose ATFuzzer that uses a grammar-guided evolutionary fuzzing approach which mutates production rules of the AT command grammar instead of concrete AT commands. Empirical evaluation with ATFuzzer on 10 Android smartphones from 6 vendors revealed 4 invalid AT command grammars over Bluetooth and 13 over USB with implications ranging from DoS, downgrade of cellular protocol version (e.g., from 4G to 3G/2G) to severe privacy leaks. The vulnerabilities along with the invalid AT command grammars were responsibly disclosed to affected vendors and two of the reported vulnerabilities have been already assigned CVEs (CVE-2019-16400 and CVE-2019-16401).
papers.abstract_zh: 本文重点检查蜂窝基带处理器通过蓝牙和USB公开的AT命令接口的正确性和健壮性。设备的应用处理器使用该接口向基带处理器发出高级命令(或AT命令)，以执行蜂窝网络操作(例如拨打电话)。恶意蓝牙外设可以利用该接口中的漏洞发起恶意攻击，包括DoS和隐私攻击。为了识别这样的漏洞，我们提出了atFuzzer，它使用一种语法引导的进化模糊化方法，该方法改变AT命令语法的产生式规则，而不是具体的AT命令。使用ATFuzzer对来自6家厂商的10款Android智能手机进行的实证评估显示，蓝牙上有4个无效AT命令语法，USB上有13个无效AT命令语法，其影响范围从DoS、蜂窝协议版本降级(例如，从4G到3G/2G)到严重的隐私泄露。这些漏洞以及无效的AT命令语法已被负责任地披露给受影响的供应商，其中两个报告的漏洞已经被分配了CVE(CVE-2019-16400和CVE-2019-16401)。
papers.title_zh: 通过Atfuzzer打开Pandora的盒子：Android智能手机接口的动态分析

papers.title: SRFuzzer: an automatic fuzzing framework for physical SOHO router devices to discover multi-type vulnerabilities
papers.authors: Yu Zhang, Wei Huo, Kunpeng Jian, Ji Shi, Haoliang Lu, Longquan Liu, Chen Wang, Dandan Sun, Chao Zhang, Baoxu Liu
papers.abstract: SOHO (small office/home office) routers provide services for end devices to connect to the Internet, playing an important role in the cyberspace. Unfortunately, security vulnerabilities pervasively exist in these routers, especially in the web server modules, greatly endangering end users. To discover these vulnerabilities, fuzzing web server modules of SOHO routers is the most popular solution. However, its effectiveness is limited, due to the lack of input specification, lack of routers' internal running states, and lack of testing environment recovery mechanisms. Moreover, fuzzing in general only reports memory corruption vulnerabilities, and fails to discover other vulnerabilities, e.g., web-based vulnerabilities. In this paper, we propose a solution SRFuzzer to address these issues. It is a fully automated fuzzing framework for testing physical SOHO devices. It continuously and effectively generates test cases by leveraging two input semantic models, i.e., KEY-VALUE data model and CONF-READ communication model, and automatically recovers testing environment with power management. It also coordinates diversified mutation rules with multiple monitoring mechanisms to trigger multi-type vulnerabilities. To the best of our knowledge, it is the first whole-process fully automated fuzzing framework for SOHO routers. We ran SRFuzzer on 10 popular routers across five vendors. In total, it discovered 208 unique exceptional behaviors, 97 of which have been confirmed as 0-day vulnerabilities. The experimental results show that SRFuzzer outperforms state-of-the-art solutions in terms of types and number of vulnerabilities found.
papers.abstract_zh: SOHO(小型办公室/家庭办公室)路由器为终端设备连接到互联网提供服务，在网络空间中发挥着重要作用。不幸的是，安全漏洞普遍存在于这些路由器中，尤其是在web服务器模块中，极大地危害了最终用户。为了发现这些漏洞，模糊SOHO路由器的web服务器模块是最流行的解决方案。然而，由于缺乏输入规范、路由器内部运行状态和测试环境恢复机制，其有效性是有限的。此外，模糊化通常仅报告存储器损坏漏洞，而不能发现其他漏洞，例如基于网络的漏洞。在本文中，我们提出了一个解决方案SRFuzzer来解决这些问题。这是一个完全自动化的模糊框架，用于测试物理SOHO设备。它利用两种输入语义模型，即键值数据模型和CONF读取通信模型，持续有效地生成测试用例，并通过电源管理自动恢复测试环境。它还通过多种监控机制协调多样化的变异规则，以触发多种类型的漏洞。据我们所知，这是第一个用于SOHO路由器的全过程全自动模糊化框架。我们在五家厂商的10款流行路由器上运行了SRFuzzer。总共发现了208个独特的异常行为，其中97个已被确认为0天漏洞。实验结果表明，在发现的漏洞类型和数量方面，SRFuzzer优于最先进的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: SRFUZZER：一个自动模糊框架，用于物理SOHO路由器设备，以发现多类型漏洞

papers.title: Premadoma: an operational solution for DNS registries to prevent malicious domain registrations
papers.authors: Jan Spooren, Thomas Vissers, Peter Janssen, Wouter Joosen, Lieven Desmet
papers.abstract: DNS is one of the most essential components of the Internet, mapping domain names to the IP addresses behind almost every online service. Domain names are therefore also a fundamental tool for attackers to quickly locate and relocate their malicious activities on the Internet. In this paper, we design and evaluate Premadoma, a solution for DNS registries to predict malicious intent well before a domain name becomes operational. In contrast to blacklists, which only offer protection after some harm has already been done, this system can prevent domain names from being used before they can pose any threats. We advance the state of the art by leveraging recent insights into the ecosystem of malicious domain registrations, focusing explicitly on facilitators employed for bulk registration and similarity patterns in registrant information. We thoroughly evaluate the proposed prediction model's performance and adaptability on an 11 month testing set, and address complex and domain-specific dataset challenges. Moreover, we have successfully deployed Premadoma in the production environment of the .eu ccTLD registry to detect and prevent malicious registrations, and have contributed to the take down of 58,966 registrations in 2018.
papers.abstract_zh: DNS是互联网最重要的组成部分之一，它将域名映射到几乎所有在线服务背后的IP地址。因此，域名也是攻击者在互联网上快速定位和重新定位其恶意活动的基本工具。在本文中，我们设计并评估了Premadoma，这是一种用于DNS注册管理机构的解决方案，可以在域名投入运营之前很好地预测恶意意图。与黑名单相反，黑名单只能在已经造成一些损害后提供保护，这个系统可以在域名造成任何威胁之前阻止域名被使用。我们通过利用对恶意域名注册生态系统的最新见解，明确关注用于批量注册的服务商和注册人信息中的相似性模式，推进了技术的发展。我们在11个月的测试集上彻底评估了所提出的预测模型的性能和适应性，并解决了复杂的和特定领域的数据集挑战。此外，我们已经在的生产环境中成功部署了Premadoma。欧盟ccTLD注册管理机构检测和防止恶意注册，并在2018年促成了58，966个注册的撤销。
papers.title_zh: Premadoma：DNS注册机构的操作解决方案，以防止恶意域名

papers.title: Coordinated dataflow protection for ultra-high bandwidth science networks
papers.authors: Vasudevan Nagendra, Vinod Yegneswaran, Phillip A. Porras, Samir R. Das
papers.abstract: The Science DMZ (SDMZ) is a special purpose network architecture proposed by ESnet (Energy Sciences Network) to facilitate distributed science experimentation on terabyte- (or petabyte-) scale data, exchanged over ultra-high bandwidth WAN links. Critical security challenges faced by these networks include: (i) network monitoring at high bandwidths, (ii) reconciling site-specific policies with project-level policies for conflict-free policy enforcement, (iii) dealing with geographically-distributed datasets with varying levels of sensitivity, and (iv) dynamically enforcing appropriate security rules. To address these challenges, we develop a fine-grained dataflow-based security enforcement system, called CoordiNetZ (CNZ), that provides coordinated situational awareness, i.e., the use of context-aware tagging for policy enforcement using the dynamic contextual information derived from hosts and network elements. We also developed tag and IP-based security microservices that incur minimal overheads in enforcing security to data flows exchanged across geographically-distributed SDMZ sites. We evaluate our prototype implementation across two geographically distributed SDMZ sites with SDN-based case studies, and present performance measurements that respectively highlight the utility of our framework and demonstrate efficient implementation of security policies across distributed SDMZ networks.
papers.abstract_zh: 科学隔离区(SDMZ)是由ESnet(能源科学网络)提出的一种专用网络架构，旨在促进在超高带宽WAN链路上交换的万亿(或千兆)级数据的分布式科学实验。这些网络面临的关键安全挑战包括:(I)高带宽下的网络监控，(ii)将特定于站点的策略与项目级策略相协调，以实现无冲突的策略实施，(iii)处理具有不同敏感度级别的地理分布数据集，以及(iv)动态实施适当的安全规则。为了应对这些挑战，我们开发了一种基于数据流的细粒度安全执行系统，称为CoordiNetZ (CNZ)，它提供协调的情境感知，即使用从主机和网络元素获得的动态上下文信息，将上下文感知标记用于策略执行。我们还开发了基于标签和IP的安全微服务，在地理上分散的SDMZ站点之间交换的数据流实施安全保护时，只产生最小的开销。我们通过基于SDN的案例研究评估了我们在两个地理上分散的SDMZ站点的原型实施，并提供了性能测量，这些测量分别强调了我们框架的实用性并展示了安全策略在分布式SDMZ网络中的高效实施。
papers.title_zh: 超高带宽科学网络的协调数据流保护

papers.title: Analyzing control flow integrity with LLVM-CFI
papers.authors: Paul Muntean, Matthias Neumayer, Zhiqiang Lin, Gang Tan, Jens Grossklags, Claudia Eckert
papers.abstract: Control-flow hijacking attacks are used to perform malicious computations. Current solutions for assessing the attack surface after a control flow integrity (CFI) policy was applied can measure only indirect transfer averages in the best case without providing any insights w.r.t. the absolute calltarget reduction per callsite, and gadget availability. Further, tool comparison is underdeveloped or not possible at all. CFI has proven to be one of the most promising protections against control flow hijacking attacks, thus many efforts have been made to improve CFI in various ways. However, there is a lack of systematic assessment of existing CFI protections. In this paper, we present LLVM-CFI, a static source code analysis framework for analyzing state-of-the-art static CFI protections based on the Clang/LLVM compiler framework. LLVM-CFI works by precisely modeling a CFI policy and then evaluating it within a unified approach. LLVM-CFI helps determine the level of security offered by different CFI protections, after the CFI protections were deployed, thus providing an important step towards exploit creation/prevention and stronger defenses. We have used LLVM-CFI to assess eight state-of-the-art static CFI defenses on real-world programs such as Google Chrome and Apache Httpd. LLVM-CFI provides a precise analysis of the residual attack surfaces, and accordingly ranks CFI policies against each other. LLVM-CFI also successfully paves the way towards construction of COOP-like code reuse attacks and elimination of the remaining attack surface by disclosing protected calltargets under eight restrictive CFI policies.
papers.abstract_zh: 控制流劫持攻击用于执行恶意计算。在应用控制流完整性(CFI)策略之后，用于评估攻击面的当前解决方案在最好的情况下只能测量间接传输平均值，而不能提供任何关于每个呼叫站点的绝对呼叫目标减少量和小工具可用性的见解。此外，工具比较还不发达或者根本不可能。CFI已经被证明是对抗控制流劫持攻击的最有希望的保护措施之一，因此已经做出了许多努力来以各种方式改进CFI。然而，缺乏对现有CFI保护的系统评估。在本文中，我们提出了LLVM-CFI，一个静态源代码分析框架，用于分析基于Clang/LLVM编译器框架的最先进的静态CFI保护。LLVM-CFI的工作原理是精确地建模一个CFI策略，然后在一个统一的方法中对其进行评估。LLVM-CFI有助于在部署CFI保护后，确定不同CFI保护提供的安全级别，从而向利用创建/预防和更强大的防御迈出重要一步。我们已经使用LLVM-CFI在真实世界的程序(如Google Chrome和Apache Httpd)上评估了八种最先进的静态CFI防御。LLVM-CFI提供了对剩余攻击面的精确分析，并据此对CFI策略进行排名。LLVM-CFI还通过在八个限制性CFI策略下公开受保护的调用目标，成功地为构建类似COOP的代码重用攻击和消除剩余的攻击面铺平了道路。
papers.title_zh: 用LLVM-CFI分析控制流的完整性

papers.title: Mitigating data leakage by protecting memory-resident sensitive data
papers.authors: Tapti Palit, Fabian Monrose, Michalis Polychronakis
papers.abstract: Gaining reliable arbitrary code execution through the exploitation of memory corruption vulnerabilities is becoming increasingly more difficult in the face of modern exploit mitigations. Facing this challenge, adversaries have started shifting their attention to data leakage attacks, which can lead to equally damaging outcomes, such as the disclosure of private keys or other sensitive data. In this work, we present a compiler-level defense against data leakage attacks for user-space applications. Our approach strikes a balance between the manual effort required to protect sensitive application data, and the performance overhead of achieving strong data confidentiality. To that end, we require developers to simply annotate those variables holding sensitive data, after which our framework automatically transforms only the fraction of the entire program code that is related to sensitive data operations. We implemented this approach by extending the LLVM compiler, and used it to protect memory-resident private keys in the MbedTLS server, ssh-agent, and a Libsodium-based file signing program, as well as user passwords for Lighttpd and Memcached. Our results demonstrate the feasibility and practicality of our technique: a modest runtime overhead (e.g., 13% throughput reduction for MbedTLS) that is on par with, or better than, existing state-of-the-art memory safety approaches for selective data protection.
papers.abstract_zh: 面对现代的漏洞利用缓解措施，通过利用内存损坏漏洞获得可靠的任意代码执行变得越来越困难。面对这一挑战，对手已经开始将注意力转移到数据泄露攻击上，这可能导致同样具有破坏性的结果，例如私钥或其他敏感数据的泄露。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个针对用户空间应用的数据泄漏攻击的编译器级防御。我们的方法在保护敏感应用数据所需的手动工作和实现强数据机密性的性能开销之间取得了平衡。为此，我们要求开发人员简单地注释那些保存敏感数据的变量，然后我们的框架自动地只转换整个程序代码中与敏感数据操作相关的部分。我们通过扩展LLVM编译器来实现这种方法，并使用它来保护MbedTLS服务器、ssh-agent和基于lib钠的文件签名程序中驻留在内存中的私钥，以及Lighttpd和Memcached的用户密码。我们的结果证明了我们的技术的可行性和实用性:适度的运行时开销(例如，MbedTLS的吞吐量减少了13%)，与现有的用于选择性数据保护的最先进的存储器安全方法相当或更好。
papers.title_zh: 通过保护记忆居住的敏感数据来减轻数据泄漏

papers.title: FRAMER: a tagged-pointer capability system with memory safety applications
papers.authors: Myoung Jin Nam, Periklis Akritidis, David J. Greaves
papers.abstract: Security mechanisms for systems programming languages, such as fine-grained memory protection for C/C++, authorize operations at runtime using access rights associated with objects and pointers. The cost of such fine-grained capability-based security models is dominated by metadata updates and lookups, making efficient metadata management the key for minimizing performance impact. Existing approaches reduce metadata management overheads by sacrificing precision, breaking binary compatibility by changing object memory layout, or wasting space with excessive alignment or large shadow memory spaces. We propose FRAMER, a capability framework with object granularity. Its sound and deterministic per-object metadata management mechanism enables direct access to metadata by calculating their location from a tagged pointer to the object and a compact supplementary table. This may improve the performance of memory safety, type safety, thread safety and garbage collection, or any solution that needs to map pointers to metadata. FRAMER improves over previous solutions by simultaneously (1) providing a novel encoding that derives the location of per-object metadata with low memory overhead and without any assumption of objects' alignment or size, (2) offering flexibility in metadata placement and size, (3) saving space by removing any padding or re-alignment, and (4) avoiding internal object memory layout changes. We evaluate FRAMER with a use case on memory safety.
papers.abstract_zh: 系统编程语言的安全机制，例如C/C++的细粒度内存保护，在运行时使用与对象和指针相关联的访问权限来授权操作。这种细粒度的基于功能的安全模型的成本主要由元数据更新和查找决定，这使得有效的元数据管理成为最小化性能影响的关键。现有方法通过牺牲精度、通过改变对象存储器布局破坏二进制兼容性、或者通过过度对齐或大阴影存储器空间浪费空间来减少元数据管理开销。我们提出了FRAMER，一个具有对象粒度的能力框架。其可靠的、确定性的每个对象的元数据管理机制通过从指向对象的标记指针和紧凑的补充表计算元数据的位置，实现了对元数据的直接访问。这可能会提高内存安全、类型安全、线程安全和垃圾收集的性能，或者任何需要将指针映射到元数据的解决方案的性能。FRAMER对以前的解决方案进行了改进，同时(1)提供了一种新颖的编码，该编码以较低的内存开销导出每对象元数据的位置，并且不需要任何对象对齐或大小的假设，(2)在元数据放置和大小方面提供了灵活性，(3)通过删除任何填充或重新对齐节省了空间，以及(4)避免了内部对象内存布局的改变。我们用一个关于内存安全的用例来评估FRAMER。
papers.title_zh: 制定者：带有内存安全应用程序的标记的定位功能系统

papers.title: FuzzBuilder: automated building greybox fuzzing environment for C/C++ library
papers.authors: Joonun Jang, Huy Kang Kim
papers.abstract: Fuzzing is an effective method to find bugs in software. Many security communities are interested in fuzzing as an automated approach to verify software security because most of the bugs discovered by fuzzing are related to security vulnerabilities. However, not all software can be tested by fuzzing because fuzzing requires a running environment, especially an executable. Notably, in the case of libraries, most of the libraries do not have a relevant executable in practice. Thus, state-of-the-art fuzzers have a limitation to test an arbitrary library. To overcome this problem, we propose FuzzBuilder to provide an automated fuzzing environment for libraries. FuzzBuilder generates an executable that calls library API functions to enable library fuzzing. Moreover, any executable generated by FuzzBuilder is compatible with existing fuzzers such as AFL. We evaluate the overall performance of FuzzBuilder by testing open source libraries. Consequently, we discovered unknown bugs in libraries while achieving high code coverage. We believe that FuzzBuilder helps security researchers to save both setup cost and learning cost for library fuzzing.
papers.abstract_zh: 模糊化是发现软件漏洞的有效方法。许多安全社区对fuzzing作为一种自动验证软件安全性的方法感兴趣，因为fuzzing发现的大多数错误都与安全漏洞有关。然而，并不是所有的软件都可以通过fuzzing进行测试，因为fuzzing需要一个运行环境，尤其是一个可执行文件。值得注意的是，在库的情况下，大多数库实际上都没有相关的可执行文件。因此，最先进的模糊化器在测试任意库时存在局限性。为了克服这个问题，我们提出FuzzBuilder来为库提供一个自动化的模糊化环境。FuzzBuilder生成一个调用库API函数来启用库模糊化的可执行文件。此外，FuzzBuilder生成的任何可执行文件都与现有的fuzzers(如AFL)兼容。我们通过测试开源库来评估FuzzBuilder的整体性能。因此，我们在实现高代码覆盖率的同时发现了库中未知的错误。我们相信FuzzBuilder有助于安全研究人员节省库模糊化的设置成本和学习成本。
papers.title_zh: fuzzbuilder：C/C ++库的自动化建筑Greybox模糊环境

papers.title: The chatty-sensor: a provably-covert channel in cyber physical systems
papers.authors: Amir Herzberg, Yehonatan Kfir
papers.abstract: Cyber physical systems (CPS) typically contain multiple control loops, where the controllers use actuators to trigger a physical process, based on sensor readings. Attackers typically coordinate attack with multiple corrupted devices; defenses often focus on detecting this abnormal communication. We present the first provably-covert channel from a 'covertly-transmitting sensor' to a 'covertly-receiving actuator', interacting only indirectly, via a benign threshold-based controller. The covert devices cannot be practically distinguished from benign devices. The covert traffic is encoded within the output noise of the covertly-transmitting sensor, whose distribution is indistinguishable from that of a benign sensor (with comparable specifications). We evaluated the channel, showing its applicability for signaling and coordinating attacks between the sensor and the actuator. This capability requires to re-evaluate security monitoring and preventing systems in CPS.
papers.abstract_zh: 网络物理系统(CPS)通常包含多个控制回路，其中控制器使用执行器根据传感器读数触发物理过程。攻击者通常利用多个被破坏的设备协调攻击；防御通常侧重于检测这种异常的通信。我们提出了第一个从“秘密发送传感器”到“秘密接收致动器”的可证明的隐蔽通道，通过一个良性的基于阈值的控制器，仅间接交互。隐蔽设备实际上无法与良性设备区分开。隐蔽通信被编码在隐蔽传输传感器的输出噪声中，其分布与良性传感器(具有可比较的规格)的分布不可区分。我们评估了信道，显示了它在传感器和执行器之间发送信号和协调攻击的适用性。这种能力要求重新评估CPS中的安全监控和预防系统。
papers.title_zh: Chatty-Sensor：网络物理系统中的一个可覆盖的频道

papers.title: HDMI-walk: attacking HDMI distribution networks via consumer electronic control protocol
papers.authors: Luis Puche Rondon, Leonardo Babun, Kemal Akkaya, A. Selcuk Uluagac
papers.abstract: The High Definition Multimedia Interface (HDMI) is the backbone and the de-facto standard for Audio/Video interfacing between video-enabled devices. Today, almost tens of billions of HDMI devices exist in the world and are widely used to distribute A/V signals in smart homes, offices, concert halls, and sporting events making HDMI one of the most highly deployed systems in the world. An important component in HDMI is the Consumer Electronics Control (CEC) protocol, which allows for the interaction between devices within an HDMI distribution network. Nonetheless, existing network security mechanisms only protect traditional networking components, leaving CEC outside of their scope. In this work, we identify and tap into CEC protocol vulnerabilities, using them to implement realistic proof-of-work attacks on HDMI distribution networks. We study, how current insecure CEC protocol practices and carelessly implemented HDMI distributions may grant an adversary a novel attack surface for HDMI devices otherwise thought to be unreachable through traditional means. To introduce this novel attack surface, in this paper, we present HDMI-Walk, which opens a realm of remote and local CEC attacks to HDMI devices. Specifically, with HDMI-Walk, an attacker can perform malicious analysis of devices, eavesdropping, Denial of Service attacks, targeted device attacks, and even facilitate other well-known existing attacks through HDMI. With HDMI-Walk, we prove that it is feasible for an attacker to gain arbitrary control of HDMI devices. We demonstrate the implementations of both local and remote attacks with commodity HDMI devices including Smart TVs and Media Players. Our work aims to uncover vulnerabilities in a very well deployed system like HDMI distributions. The consequences of which can largely impact HDMI users as well as other systems which depend on these distributions. Finally, we discuss security mechanisms to provide impactful and comprehensive security evaluation to these real-world systems while guaranteeing deployability and providing minimal overhead, while considering the current limitations of the CEC protocol. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first work solely investigating the security of HDMI device distribution networks.
papers.abstract_zh: 高清多媒体接口(HDMI)是支持视频的设备之间音频/视频接口的主干和事实标准。今天，世界上有近数百亿个HDMI设备，广泛用于在智能家居、办公室、音乐厅和体育赛事中分发A/V信号，使HDMI成为世界上部署最广泛的系统之一。HDMI中的一个重要组件是消费电子控制(CEC)协议，它允许HDMI分配网络中的设备之间进行交互。然而，现有的网络安全机制只保护传统的网络组件，将CEC排除在它们的范围之外。在这项工作中，我们确定并挖掘CEC协议的漏洞，利用它们来实现对HDMI分发网络的现实工作证明攻击。我们研究了当前不安全的CEC协议实践和粗心实施的HDMI发行版如何为对手提供了一个新的HDMI设备攻击面，否则这些设备将被认为无法通过传统手段获得。为了介绍这种新的攻击面，在本文中，我们提出了HDMI-Walk，它打开了对HDMI设备进行远程和本地CEC攻击的领域。具体来说，通过HDMI-Walk，攻击者可以对设备进行恶意分析，窃听，拒绝服务攻击，有针对性的设备攻击，甚至通过HDMI促进其他众所周知的现有攻击。通过HDMI-Walk，我们证明了攻击者可以获得对HDMI设备的任意控制。我们展示了利用商用HDMI设备(包括智能电视和媒体播放器)实施本地和远程攻击的情况。我们的工作旨在发现像HDMI发行版这样部署良好的系统中的漏洞。其结果会极大地影响HDMI用户以及依赖于这些发行版的其他系统。最后，我们讨论了安全机制，以提供对这些现实世界系统的有效和全面的安全评估，同时保证可部署性和提供最小的开销，同时考虑到CEC协议的当前限制。据我们所知，这是第一个单独研究HDMI设备分发网络安全性的工作。
papers.title_zh: HDMI-WALK：通过消费电子控制协议攻击HDMI分销网络

papers.title: Out of control: stealthy attacks against robotic vehicles protected by control-based techniques
papers.authors: Pritam Dash, Mehdi Karimibiuki, Karthik Pattabiraman
papers.abstract: Robotic vehicles (RVs) are cyber-physical systems that operate in the physical world under the control of software functions. They are increasing in adoption in many industrial sectors. RVs rely on sensors and actuators for system operations and navigation. Control algorithm based estimation techniques have been used in RVs to minimize the effects of noisy sensors, prevent faulty actuator output, and recently, in detecting attacks against RVs. In this paper, we propose three kinds of attacks to evade the control-based detection techniques and cause RVs to malfunction. We also propose automated algorithms for performing the attacks without requiring the attacker to expend significant effort or know specific details of the RV, making the attacks applicable to a wide range of RVs. We demonstrate these attacks on ArduPilot simulators and two real RVs (a drone and a rover) in the presence of an Intrusion Detection System (IDS) using control estimation models to monitor the runtime behavior of the system. We find that the control models are incapable of detecting our stealthy attacks, and that the attacks can have significant adverse impact on the RV's mission (e.g., cause the RV to crash or deviate from its target significantly).
papers.abstract_zh: 机器人车辆(RVs)是在软件功能的控制下在物理世界中运行的信息物理系统。它们越来越多地被许多工业部门采用。遥控潜水器依靠传感器和执行器进行系统操作和导航。基于控制算法的估计技术已经用于遥控潜水器中，以最小化噪声传感器的影响，防止错误的致动器输出，最近还用于探测对遥控潜水器的攻击。在本文中，我们提出了三种攻击来逃避基于控制的检测技术，并导致RVs发生故障。我们还提出了执行攻击的自动算法，而不需要攻击者花费大量的精力或知道RV的具体细节，从而使攻击适用于广泛的RV。我们在ArduPilot模拟器和两个真实的RVs(一个无人驾驶飞机和一个漫游车)上演示了这些攻击，在入侵检测系统(IDS)存在的情况下，使用控制估计模型来监控系统的运行时行为。我们发现，控制模型无法检测我们的隐形攻击，并且这些攻击会对RV的任务产生显著的不利影响(例如，导致RV坠毁或显著偏离其目标)。
papers.title_zh: 失控：针对受控制技术保护的机器人车辆的隐形攻击

papers.title: WooKey: designing a trusted and efficient USB device
papers.authors: Ryad Benadjila, Arnauld Michelizza, Mathieu Renard, Philippe Thierry, Philippe Trebuchet
papers.abstract: The work presented in this paper takes place in the design initiatives that have emerged to thwart BadUSB threats [59]. Though many attempts were focusing on the host side, by enhancing the operating system's USB sub-module robustness [78, 80] or by adding a proxy between the host and the device [6, 53], we have chosen to focus our efforts on the device side. More specifically, our work presents the WooKey platform, a custom highly secure USB thumb drive with mass storage capabilities, designed for user data encryption and protection, and embedding a full-fledged set of in-depth defenses. The device encloses a firmware with a secure DFU (Device Firmware Update) implementation using up-to-date cryptography as well as an external and extractable authentication token based on a secure element. The runtime software security is built upon EwoK, an innovative open source microkernel designed for microcontrollers with advanced security and performance in mind. Finally, another strength of the project is its core guiding principle: provide an open source and open hardware platform [3] using off-the-shelf components.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文介绍的工作发生在旨在阻止BadUSB威胁的设计计划中[59]。尽管许多尝试都集中在主机端，通过增强操作系统USB子模块的健壮性[78，80]或通过在主机和设备之间添加代理[6，53]，我们还是选择将我们的努力集中在设备端。更具体地说，我们的工作展示了WooKey平台，这是一个定制的高度安全的USB拇指驱动器，具有大容量存储功能，设计用于用户数据加密和保护，并嵌入了一套完整的深度防御。该设备包含具有安全DFU(设备固件更新)实现的固件，该固件使用最新的加密技术以及基于安全元素的外部可提取认证令牌。运行时软件安全性建立在EwoK的基础上，EwoK是一种创新的开源微内核，专为具有高级安全性和性能的微控制器而设计。最后，该项目的另一个优势是它的核心指导原则:使用现成的组件提供一个开源和开放的硬件平台[3]。
papers.title_zh: Wookey：设计一个值得信赖的USB设备

papers.title: EIGER: automated IOC generation for accurate and interpretable endpoint malware detection
papers.authors: Yuma Kurogome, Yuto Otsuki, Yuhei Kawakoya, Makoto Iwamura, Syogo Hayashi, Tatsuya Mori, Koushik Sen
papers.abstract: A malware signature including behavioral artifacts, namely Indicator of Compromise (IOC) plays an important role in security operations, such as endpoint detection and incident response. While building IOC enables us to detect malware efficiently and perform the incident analysis in a timely manner, it has not been fully-automated yet. To address this issue, there are two lines of promising approaches: regular expression-based signature generation and machine learning. However, each approach has a limitation in accuracy or interpretability, respectively. In this paper, we propose EIGER, a method to generate interpretable, and yet accurate IOCs from given malware traces. The key idea of EIGER is enumerate-then-optimize. That is, we enumerate representations of potential artifacts as candidates of IOCs. Then, we optimize the combination of these candidates to maximize the two essential properties, i.e., accuracy and interpretability, towards the generation of reliable IOCs. Through the experiment using 162K of malware samples collected over the five months, we evaluated the accuracy of EIGER-generated IOCs. We achieved a high True Positive Rate (TPR) of 91.98% and a very low False Positive Rate (FPR) of 0.97%. Interestingly, EIGER achieved FPR of less than 1% even when we use completely different dataset. Furthermore, we evaluated the interpretability of the IOCs generated by EIGER through a user study, in which we recruited 15 of professional security analysts working at a security operation center. The results allow us to conclude that our IOCs are as interpretable as manually-generated ones. These results demonstrate that EIGER is practical and deployable to the real-world security operations.
papers.abstract_zh: 恶意软件签名包括行为伪影，即危害指示器(IOC ),在安全操作中起着重要作用，例如端点检测和事件响应。虽然构建IOC使我们能够高效地检测恶意软件并及时执行事件分析，但它尚未完全自动化。为了解决这个问题，有两种有前途的方法:基于正则表达式的签名生成和机器学习。然而，每种方法分别在准确性或可解释性方面有限制。在本文中，我们提出了EIGER，一种从给定的恶意软件跟踪中生成可解释且准确的IOC的方法。EIGER的核心思想是枚举然后优化。也就是说，我们列举潜在工件的表示作为IOC的候选者。然后，我们优化这些候选对象的组合，以最大化两个基本属性，即准确性和可解释性，从而生成可靠的IOC。通过使用在五个月内收集的162，000个恶意软件样本的实验，我们评估了EIGER生成的IOC的准确性。我们实现了91.98%的高真阳性率(TPR)和0.97%的非常低的假阳性率(FPR)。有趣的是，即使我们使用完全不同的数据集，EIGER也实现了不到1%的FPR。此外，我们通过一项用户研究评估了EIGER生成的IOC的可解释性，在这项研究中，我们招募了15名在安全运营中心工作的专业安全分析师。结果允许我们得出结论，我们的IOC和手工生成的IOC一样可解释。这些结果表明EIGER在现实世界的安全行动中是实用的和可部署的。
papers.title_zh: Eiger：自动化的IOC生成，以准确且可解释的端点恶意软件检测

papers.title: "Your hashed IP address: Ubuntu.": perspectives on transparency tools for online advertising
papers.authors: Tobias Urban, Martin Degeling, Thorsten Holz, Norbert Pohlmann
papers.abstract: Ad personalization has been criticized in the past for invading privacy, lack of transparency, and improper controls offered to users. Recently, companies started to provide web portals and other means for users to access data collected about them. In this paper, we study these new transparency tools from multiple perspectives using a mixed-methods approach. Still practices of data sharing barely changed until recently when new legislation required all companies to grant individual access to personal data stored about them. Using a mixed-methods approach we study the benefits of the new rights for users. First, we analyze transparency tools provided by 22 companies and check whether they follow previous recommendations for usability and user expectations. Based on these insights, we conduct a survey with 490 participants to evaluate three common approaches to disclose data. To complement this user-centric view, we shed light on the design decisions and complexities of transparency in online advertising using an online survey (n = 24) and in-person interviews (n = 8) with experts from the industry. We find that newly created transparency tools present a variety of information to users, from detailed technical logs to high-level interest segment information. Our results indicate that users do not (yet) know what to learn from the data and mistrust the accuracy of the information shown to them. At the same time, new transparency requirements pose several challenges to an industry that excessively shares data that even they sometimes cannot relate to an individual.
papers.abstract_zh: 广告个性化在过去因侵犯隐私、缺乏透明度和对用户的不当控制而受到批评。最近，公司开始为用户提供门户网站和其他手段来访问收集到的关于他们的数据。在本文中，我们使用混合方法从多个角度研究了这些新的透明工具。直到最近，当新的立法要求所有公司允许个人访问存储在他们身上的个人数据时，数据共享的做法才发生了改变。使用混合方法的方法，我们研究了用户的新权利的好处。首先，我们分析了22家公司提供的透明工具，并检查它们是否遵循了之前关于可用性和用户期望的建议。基于这些认识，我们对490名参与者进行了一项调查，以评估三种常见的数据披露方法。为了补充这种以用户为中心的观点，我们通过在线调查(n = 24)和与行业专家的面对面访谈(n = 8)揭示了在线广告透明度的设计决策和复杂性。我们发现，新创建的透明度工具向用户呈现了各种信息，从详细的技术日志到高层次的兴趣细分信息。我们的结果表明，用户(还)不知道从数据中学到什么，并且不信任显示给他们的信息的准确性。与此同时，新的透明度要求给一个过度共享数据的行业带来了一些挑战，即使他们有时也无法将这些数据与个人联系起来。
papers.title_zh: “您的Hashed IP地址：Ubuntu。”：关于在线广告的透明工具的观点

papers.title: Will you trust this TLS certificate?: perceptions of people working in IT
papers.authors: Martin Ukrop, Lydia Kraus, Vashek Matyas, Heider Ahmad Mutleq Wahsheh
papers.abstract: Flawed TLS certificates are not uncommon on the Internet. While they signal a potential issue, in most cases they have benign causes (e.g., misconfiguration or even deliberate deployment). This adds fuzziness to the decision on whether to trust a connection or not. Little is known about perceptions of flawed certificates by IT professionals, even though their decisions impact high numbers of end users. Moreover, it is unclear how much does the content of error messages and documentation influence these perceptions. To shed light on these issues, we observed 75 attendees of an industrial IT conference investigating different certificate validation errors. We also analysed the influence of re-worded error messages and redesigned documentation. We find that people working in IT have very nuanced opinions with trust decisions being far from binary. The self-signed and the name constrained certificates seem to be over-trusted (the latter also being poorly understood). We show that even small changes in existing error messages can positively influence resource use, comprehension, and trust assessment. Our re-worded error messages and documentation can be directly adopted.
papers.abstract_zh: 有缺陷的TLS证书在互联网上并不少见。虽然它们预示着潜在的问题，但在大多数情况下，它们都有良性的原因(例如，配置错误，甚至是故意部署)。这增加了决定是否信任连接的模糊性。很少有人知道IT专业人员对有缺陷证书的看法，尽管他们的决定会影响大量的最终用户。此外，还不清楚错误消息和文档的内容对这些看法有多大影响。为了阐明这些问题，我们观察了一个工业IT会议的75名与会者，调查不同的证书验证错误。我们还分析了重新措辞的错误消息和重新设计的文档的影响。我们发现在IT部门工作的人对信任决策有着非常微妙的看法，而不是二元的。自签名和名称受限的证书似乎被过度信任(后者也很少被理解)。我们表明，即使现有错误消息的微小变化也能积极影响资源使用、理解和信任评估。我们重新措辞的错误信息和文档可以直接被采用。
papers.title_zh: 您会相信此TLS证书吗？：对其中的人的看法

papers.title: I know what you did last login: inconsistent messages tell existence of a target's account to insiders
papers.authors: Ayako Akiyama Hasegawa, Takuya Watanabe, Eitaro Shioji, Mitsuaki Akiyama
papers.abstract: Account security to protect user accounts against sensitive data breaches is a major mission for online service providers. Therefore, they exert tremendous effort in securing account authentication. Although threats from complete outsiders, such as account hijacking for monetization, still occur, recent studies have shed light on threats to privacy from insiders. This paper sheds light on the latter threats. Specifically, we present the first comprehensive study of an attack from insiders that identifies the existence of a target's account by using the target's email address and insecure login-related messages displayed. Such a threat may violate intimates' or acquaintances' privacy because the kinds of service accounts a user has implies his/her personal preferences or situation. We conducted surveys regarding user expectations and behaviors on online services and a measurement study of the login-related messages on online services that are considered sensitive. We found that over 80% of participants answered that there are sensitive services and that almost all services were vulnerable to our attack. Moreover, about half the participants who have sensitive services are insecurely registered on them and thus could be potential victims. Finally, we make recommendations on the basis of our findings for online service providers to improve login-related messages and for users to take appropriate defensive actions.
papers.abstract_zh: 帐户安全保护用户帐户免受敏感数据泄露是在线服务提供商的主要任务。因此，他们在确保帐户认证方面付出了巨大的努力。虽然来自完全外部的威胁，如为赚钱而劫持账户，仍然会发生，但最近的研究揭示了内部人士对隐私的威胁。本文揭示了后一种威胁。具体来说，我们首次全面研究了内部人员发起的攻击，该攻击通过使用目标的电子邮件地址和显示的不安全登录相关消息来识别目标帐户的存在。这种威胁可能侵犯密友或熟人的隐私，因为用户拥有的服务账户的种类暗示了他/她的个人偏好或情况。我们对在线服务的用户期望和行为进行了调查，并对在线服务上被视为敏感的登录相关消息进行了测量研究。我们发现，超过80%的参与者回答说存在敏感服务，并且几乎所有服务都容易受到我们的攻击。此外，拥有敏感服务的参与者中，约有一半是不安全注册的，因此可能成为潜在的受害者。最后，我们根据我们的发现为在线服务提供商提出建议，以改进与登录相关的消息，并为用户采取适当的防御措施。
papers.title_zh: 我知道您上次登录所做的：不一致的消息告诉内部人的目标帐户存在

papers.title: Speculator: a tool to analyze speculative execution attacks and mitigations
papers.authors: Andrea Mambretti, Matthias Neugschwandtner, Alessandro Sorniotti, Engin Kirda, William K. Robertson, Anil Kurmus
papers.abstract: Speculative execution attacks exploit vulnerabilities at a CPU's microarchitectural level, which, until recently, remained hidden below the instruction set architecture, largely undocumented by CPU vendors. New speculative execution attacks are released on a monthly basis, showing how aspects of the so-far unexplored microarchitectural attack surface can be exploited. In this paper, we introduce, Speculator, a new tool to investigate these new microarchitectural attacks and their mitigations, which aims to be the GDB of speculative execution. Using speculative execution markers, set of instructions that we found are observable through performance counters during CPU speculation, Speculator can study microarchitectural behavior of single snippets of code, or more complex attacker and victim scenarios (e.g. Branch Target Injection (BTI) attacks). We also present our findings on multiple CPU platforms showing the precision and the flexibility offered by Speculator and its templates.
papers.abstract_zh: 推测性执行攻击利用CPU微体系结构级别的漏洞，直到最近，这些漏洞仍然隐藏在指令集体系结构之下，很大程度上没有被CPU供应商记录在案。每月都有新的推测性执行攻击发布，展示了迄今为止尚未探索的微体系结构攻击面的各个方面是如何被利用的。在本文中，我们介绍了一种新的工具——投机者，来研究这些新的微体系结构攻击及其缓解措施，旨在成为投机执行的GDB。使用推测执行标记，我们发现在CPU推测过程中可以通过性能计数器观察到的指令集，Speculator可以研究单个代码片段的微体系结构行为，或者更复杂的攻击者和受害者场景(例如分支目标注入(BTI)攻击)。我们还在多个CPU平台上展示了我们的发现，展示了Speculator及其模板所提供的精确性和灵活性。
papers.title_zh: 投机者：分析投机执行攻击和缓解的工具

papers.title: Survivor: a fine-grained intrusion response and recovery approach for commodity operating systems
papers.authors: Ronny Chevalier, David Plaquin, Chris I. Dalton, Guillaume Hiet
papers.abstract: Despite the deployment of preventive security mechanisms to protect the assets and computing platforms of users, intrusions eventually occur. We propose a novel intrusion survivability approach to withstand ongoing intrusions. Our approach relies on an orchestration of fine-grained recovery and per-service responses (e.g., privileges removal). Such an approach may put the system into a degraded mode. This degraded mode prevents attackers to reinfect the system or to achieve their goals if they managed to reinfect it. It maintains the availability of core functions while waiting for patches to be deployed. We devised a cost-sensitive response selection process to ensure that while the service is in a degraded mode, its core functions are still operating. We built a Linux-based prototype and evaluated the effectiveness of our approach against different types of intrusions. The results show that our solution removes the effects of the intrusions, that it can select appropriate responses, and that it allows services to survive when reinfected. In terms of performance overhead, in most cases, we observed a small overhead, except in the rare case of services that write many small files asynchronously in a burst, where we observed a higher but acceptable overhead.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管部署了预防性安全机制来保护用户的资产和计算平台，但入侵最终还是会发生。我们提出了一种新的入侵生存性方法来抵御正在进行的入侵。我们的方法依赖于细粒度恢复和按服务响应(例如，特权移除)的编排。这种方法可能会使系统进入降级模式。这种降级模式可以防止攻击者再次感染系统，或者在他们设法再次感染系统的情况下实现他们的目标。它在等待部署补丁的同时维护核心功能的可用性。我们设计了一个成本敏感的响应选择过程，以确保当服务处于降级模式时，其核心功能仍在运行。我们建立了一个基于Linux的原型，并评估了我们的方法对不同类型的入侵的有效性。结果表明，我们的解决方案消除了入侵的影响，它可以选择适当的响应，并允许服务在再次感染时存活。就性能开销而言，在大多数情况下，我们观察到的开销很小，但在极少数情况下，服务会以突发方式异步写入许多小文件，在这种情况下，我们观察到的开销较高，但可以接受。
papers.title_zh: 幸存者：商品操作系统的细粒入侵反应和恢复方法

papers.title: Robust keystroke transcription from the acoustic side-channel
papers.authors: David Slater, Scott Novotney, Jessica Moore, Sean Morgan, Scott Tenaglia
papers.abstract: The acoustic emanations from keyboards provide a side-channel attack from which an attacker can recover sensitive user information, such as passwords and personally identifiable information. Previous work has shown the feasibility of these attacks given isolated key strokes, but has not demonstrated robust keystroke detection and segmentation in the presence of realistic noise and fast typing speeds. Common problems include noises like doors closing or speech as well as overlapping keystroke waveforms. Prior work has assumed that isolating the waveform of individual key strokes can be achieved with near 100% accuracy, but we show that these techniques generate a large number of misses and false positives, drastically impacting the downstream keystroke classification task. To solve this problem, we present a deep learning system, leveraging related state-of-the-art techniques from speech transcription, that performs end-to-end, audio-to-keystroke transcription with superior performance. The recurrent architecture enables it to robustly handle overlapping waveforms and adapt to local noise profiles. Furthermore, the joint approach to keystroke detection and classification enables us to both train without ground truth keystroke timings and outperform standard classification approaches even when they have ground truth timings. Due to the paucity of existing datasets, we collected a novel acoustic and keylogger dataset comprising 17 users and 86k keystrokes across various real-world typing tasks. On this dataset, we reduce the end-to-end character error rate on English text from 36.0% to 7.41% for known typists and 41.3% to 15.41% for unknown typists. The keystroke acoustic side-channel attack remains dangerously feasible.
papers.abstract_zh: 键盘发出的声音提供了一种旁道攻击，攻击者可以通过这种攻击恢复敏感的用户信息，如密码和个人身份信息。先前的工作已经显示了在给定孤立的击键的情况下这些攻击的可行性，但是还没有展示在存在真实噪声和快速打字速度的情况下鲁棒的击键检测和分割。常见的问题包括关门声或语音等噪音以及重叠的击键波形。先前的工作已经假设隔离单个击键的波形可以以接近100%的准确度实现，但是我们表明这些技术产生大量的遗漏和误报，严重影响下游击键分类任务。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一个深度学习系统，利用语音转录的相关最新技术，以优异的性能执行端到端的音频到按键转录。递归架构使其能够稳健地处理重叠波形，并适应局部噪声特性。此外，击键检测和分类的联合方法使我们能够在没有真实击键计时的情况下进行训练，并且即使在标准分类方法具有真实计时的情况下也优于标准分类方法。由于现有数据集的缺乏，我们收集了一个新的声学和键盘记录数据集，包括17个用户和各种现实世界打字任务的86k次击键。在这个数据集上，我们将英文文本上的端到端字符错误率从已知打字员的36.0%降低到7.41%，未知打字员的41.3%降低到15.41%。击键声学旁道攻击仍然是危险可行的。
papers.title_zh: 来自声学侧通道的强大击键转录

papers.title: DR.SGX: automated and adjustable side-channel protection for SGX using data location randomization
papers.authors: Ferdinand Brasser, Srdjan Capkun, Alexandra Dmitrienko, Tommaso Frassetto, Kari Kostiainen, Ahmad-Reza Sadeghi
papers.abstract: Recent research has demonstrated that Intel's SGX is vulnerable to software-based side-channel attacks. In a common attack, the adversary monitors CPU caches to infer secret-dependent data accesses patterns. Known defenses have major limitations, as they require either error-prone developer assistance, incur extremely high runtime overhead, or prevent only specific attacks. In this paper, we propose data location randomization as a novel defense against side-channel attacks that target data access patterns. Our goal is to break the link between the memory observations by the adversary and the actual data accesses by the victim. We design and implement a compiler-based tool called DR.SGX that instruments the enclave code, permuting data locations at fine granularity. To prevent correlation of repeated memory accesses we periodically re-randomize all enclave data. Our solution requires no developer assistance and strikes the balance between side-channel protection and performance based on an adjustable security parameter.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的研究表明，英特尔的SGX容易受到基于软件的旁道攻击。在常见的攻击中，对手监视CPU缓存，以推断秘密相关的数据访问模式。已知的防御措施有很大的局限性，因为它们要么需要容易出错的开发人员的帮助，导致极高的运行时开销，要么只能防止特定的攻击。在本文中，我们提出数据位置随机化作为一种新的防御针对数据访问模式的旁路攻击的方法。我们的目标是打破对手的内存观察和受害者的实际数据访问之间的联系。我们设计并实现了一个名为SGX博士的基于编译器的工具，它可以检测enclave代码，以精细的粒度置换数据位置。为了防止重复内存访问的相关性，我们定期重新随机化所有enclave数据。我们的解决方案不需要开发人员的帮助，并根据可调的安全参数在侧信道保护和性能之间取得了平衡。
papers.title_zh: SGX博士：使用数据位置随机化对SGX的自动化和可调节的侧通道保护

papers.title: n-Auth: Mobile Authentication Done Right
papers.authors: Roel Peeters, Jens Hermans, Pieter Maene, Katri Grenman, Kimmo Halunen, Juha Häikiö
papers.abstract: Weak security, excessive personal data collection for user profiling, and a poor user experience are just a few of the many problems that mobile authentication solutions suffer from. Despite being an interesting platform, mobile devices are still not being used to their full potential for authentication. n-Auth is a firm step in unlocking the full potential of mobile devices in authentication, by improving both security and usability whilst respecting the privacy of the user. Our focus is on the combined usage of several strong cryptographic techniques with secure HCI design principles to achieve a better user experience. We specified and built n-Auth, for which robust Android and iOS apps are openly available through the official stores.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全性差、为用户建档收集过多的个人数据以及用户体验差只是移动身份认证解决方案面临的众多问题中的几个。尽管移动设备是一个有趣的平台，但它仍未被充分用于身份认证。n-Auth通过在尊重用户隐私的同时提高安全性和可用性，在释放移动设备在身份认证方面的全部潜力方面迈出了坚实的一步。我们的重点是将几种强大的加密技术与安全HCI设计原则结合使用，以实现更好的用户体验。我们指定并构建了n-Auth，强大的Android和iOS应用程序可以通过官方商店公开获得。
papers.title_zh: n-auth：移动身份验证正确

papers.title: Exploitation and Mitigation of Authentication Schemes Based on Device-Public Information
papers.authors: Antonio Bianchi, Eric Gustafson, Yanick Fratantonio, Christopher Kruegel, Giovanni Vigna
papers.abstract: Today's mobile applications increasingly rely on communication with a remote backend service to perform many critical functions, including handling user-specific information. This implies that some form of authentication should be used to associate a user with their actions and data. Since schemes involving tedious account creation procedures can represent "friction" for users, many applications are moving toward alternative solutions, some of which, while increasing usability, sacrifice security. This paper focuses on a new trend of authentication schemes based on what we call "device-public" information, which consists of properties and data that any application running on a device can obtain. While these schemes are convenient to users, since they require little to no interaction, they are vulnerable by design, since all the needed information to authenticate a user is available to any app installed on the device. An attacker with a malicious app on a user's device could easily hijack the user's account, steal private information, send (and receive) messages on behalf of the user, or steal valuable virtual goods. To demonstrate how easily these vulnerabilities can be weaponized, we developed a generic exploitation technique that first mines all relevant data from a victim's phone, and then transfers and injects them into an attacker's phone to fool apps into granting access to the victim's account. Moreover, we developed a dynamic analysis detection system to automatically highlight problematic apps. Using our tool, we analyzed 1,000 popular applications and found that 41 of them, including the popular messaging apps WhatsApp and Viber, were vulnerable. Finally, our work proposes solutions to this issue, based on modifications to the Android API.
papers.abstract_zh: 今天的移动应用程序越来越依赖与远程后端服务的通信来执行许多关键功能，包括处理用户特定的信息。这意味着应该使用某种形式的身份验证来将用户与其操作和数据相关联。由于涉及繁琐的帐户创建过程的方案可能会给用户带来“摩擦”，许多应用程序正在转向替代解决方案，其中一些虽然增加了可用性，但牺牲了安全性。本文重点介绍了一种基于“设备公开”信息的身份验证方案的新趋势，这种信息由运行在设备上的任何应用程序都可以获得的属性和数据组成。虽然这些方案对用户来说很方便，因为它们几乎不需要交互，但它们在设计上是易受攻击的，因为验证用户所需的所有信息都可用于设备上安装的任何应用程序。在用户设备上安装恶意应用程序的攻击者可以轻松劫持用户的帐户，窃取私人信息，代表用户发送(和接收)消息，或者窃取有价值的虚拟商品。为了证明这些漏洞可以多么容易地被武器化，我们开发了一种通用的利用技术，首先从受害者的手机中挖掘所有相关数据，然后将它们传输并注入到攻击者的手机中，以欺骗应用程序授权访问受害者的帐户。此外，我们开发了一个动态分析检测系统，自动突出显示有问题的应用程序。使用我们的工具，我们分析了1，000个流行的应用程序，发现其中41个存在漏洞，包括流行的消息应用程序WhatsApp和Viber。最后，我们的工作基于对Android API的修改提出了这个问题的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 基于设备公共信息的剥削和缓解身份验证方案

papers.title: A Secure Mobile Authentication Alternative to Biometrics
papers.authors: Mozhgan Azimpourkivi, Umut Topkara, Bogdan Carbunar
papers.abstract: Biometrics are widely used for authentication in consumer devices and business settings as they provide sufficiently strong security instant verification and convenience for users. However, biometrics are hard to keep secret, stolen biometrics pose lifelong security risks to users as they cannot be reset and re-issued, and transactions authenticated by biometrics across different systems are linkable and traceable back to the individual identity. In addition, their cost-benefit analysis does not include personal implications to users, who are least prepared for the imminent negative outcomes, and are not often given equally convenient alternative authentication options. We introduce ai.lock, a secret image based authentication method for mobile devices which uses an imaging sensor to reliably extract authentication credentials similar to biometrics. Despite lacking the regularities of biometric image features, we show that ai.lock consistently extracts features across authentication attempts from general user captured images, to reconstruct credentials that can match and exceed the security of biometrics (EER = 0.71%). ai.lock only stores a "hash" of the object's image. We measure the security of ai.lock against brute force attacks on more than 3.5 billion authentication instances built from more than 250,000 images of real objects, and 100,000 synthetically generated images using a generative adversarial network trained on object images. We show that the ai.lock Shannon entropy is superior to a fingerprint based authentication built into popular mobile devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 生物识别广泛用于消费设备和商业环境中的身份验证，因为它们为用户提供了足够强的安全性、即时验证和便利性。然而，生物特征很难保密，被盗的生物特征给用户带来终身安全风险，因为它们无法重置和重新发布，并且跨不同系统通过生物特征认证的交易是可链接和可追溯到个人身份的。此外，他们的成本效益分析不包括对用户的个人影响，这些用户对即将到来的负面结果准备最少，并且往往没有同样方便的替代身份认证选项。我们介绍了ai.lock，这是一种基于秘密图像的移动设备认证方法，它使用图像传感器来可靠地提取类似于生物特征的认证凭证。尽管缺乏生物特征图像特征的规律性，但我们表明，ai.lock始终从一般用户捕获的图像中提取跨认证尝试的特征，以重建可以匹配并超过生物特征安全性的凭证(EER = 0.71%)。ai.lock只存储对象图像的“哈希”。我们在超过35亿个认证实例上测量ai.lock对抗暴力攻击的安全性，这些实例是从超过250，000幅真实对象的图像和100，000幅使用在对象图像上训练的生成式对抗网络合成生成的图像构建的。我们表明ai.lock香农熵优于内置于流行移动设备中的基于指纹的认证。
papers.title_zh: 生物识别技术的安全移动身份验证替代品

papers.title: Machine-Learning-Guided Typestate Analysis for Static Use-After-Free Detection
papers.authors: Hua Yan, Yulei Sui, Shiping Chen, Jingling Xue
papers.abstract: Typestate analysis relies on pointer analysis for detecting temporal memory safety errors, such as use-after-free (UAF). For large programs, scalable pointer analysis is usually imprecise in analyzing their hard "corner cases", such as infeasible paths, recursion cycles, loops, arrays, and linked lists. Due to a sound over-approximation of the points-to information, a large number of spurious aliases will be reported conservatively, causing the corresponding typestate analysis to report a large number of false alarms. Thus, the usefulness of typestate analysis for heap-intensive clients, like UAF detection, becomes rather limited, in practice. We introduce Tac, a static UAF detector that bridges the gap between typestate and pointer analyses by machine learning. Tac learns the correlations between program features and UAF-related aliases by using a Support Vector Machine (SVM) and applies this knowledge to further disambiguate the UAF-related aliases reported imprecisely by the pointer analysis so that only the ones validated by its SVM classifier are further investigated by the typestate analysis. Despite its unsoundness, Tac represents a practical typestate analysis approach for UAF detection. We have implemented Tac in LLVM-3.8.0 and evaluated it using a set of eight open-source C/C++ programs. The results show that Tac is effective (in terms of finding 5 known CVE vulnerabilities, 1 known bug, and 8 new bugs with a low false alarm rate) and scalable (in terms of analyzing a large codebase with 2,098 KLOC in just over 4 hours).
papers.abstract_zh: 类型状态分析依赖于指针分析来检测临时内存安全错误，如释放后使用(UAF)。对于大型程序，可伸缩指针分析在分析它们的硬“极限情况”时通常是不精确的，例如不可行路径、递归循环、循环、数组和链表。由于指向信息的声音过度近似，大量的虚假别名将被保守地报告，导致相应的类型状态分析报告大量的错误警报。因此，类型状态分析对于堆密集型客户端(如UAF检测)的用处在实践中变得相当有限。我们介绍了Tac，一种静态UAF检测器，它通过机器学习弥合了类型状态和指针分析之间的差距。Tac通过使用支持向量机(SVM)来学习程序特征和与UAF相关的别名之间的相关性，并应用这一知识来进一步消除指针分析不准确地报告的与UAF相关的别名的歧义，以便类型状态分析仅进一步调查由其SVM分类器验证的别名。尽管Tac不完善，但它代表了一种用于UAF探测的实用的类型状态分析方法。我们已经在LLVM-3.8.0中实现了Tac，并使用八个开源C/C++程序对其进行了评估。结果表明，Tac是有效的(在发现5个已知CVE漏洞、1个已知bug和8个低误报率的新bug方面)和可扩展的(在短短4个多小时内分析2098个KLOC的大型代码库方面)。
papers.title_zh: 机器学习引导的典型分析，用于静态使用后检测

papers.title: Breaking and Fixing Destructive Code Read Defenses
papers.authors: Jannik Pewny, Philipp Koppe, Lucas Davi, Thorsten Holz
papers.abstract: Just-in-time return-oriented programming (JIT-ROP) is a powerful memory corruption attack that bypasses various forms of code randomization. Execute-only memory (XOM) can potentially prevent these attacks, but requires source code. In contrast, destructive code reads (DCR) provide a trade-off between security and legacy compatibility. The common belief is that DCR provides strong protection if combined with a high-entropy code randomization. The contribution of this paper is twofold: first, we demonstrate that DCR can be bypassed regardless of the underlying code randomization scheme. To this end, we show novel, generic attacks that infer the code layout for highly randomized program code. Second, we present the design and implementation of BGDX (Byte-Granular DCR and XOM), a novel mitigation technique that protects legacy binaries against code inference attacks. BGDX enforces memory permissions on a byte-granular level allowing us to combine DCR and XOM for legacy, off-the-shelf binaries. Our evaluation shows that BGDX is not only effective, but highly efficient, imposing only a geometric mean performance overhead of 3.95 % on SPEC.
papers.abstract_zh: 即时面向返回编程(JIT-ROP)是一种强大的内存损坏攻击，它绕过了各种形式的代码随机化。只执行内存(XOM)可以潜在地防止这些攻击，但是需要源代码。相反，破坏性代码读取(DCR)提供了安全性和遗留兼容性之间的折衷。人们普遍认为，如果结合高熵代码随机化，DCR可以提供强大的保护。本文的贡献是双重的:首先，我们证明了不管底层的代码随机化方案如何，DCR都可以被绕过。为此，我们展示了推断高度随机化程序代码的代码布局的新颖、通用的攻击。其次，我们介绍了BGDX(字节粒度DCR和XOM)的设计和实现，这是一种保护遗留二进制文件免受代码推理攻击的新型缓解技术。BGDX在字节粒度级别上强制执行内存权限，允许我们将DCR和XOM结合起来用于遗留的现成二进制文件。我们的评估表明，BGDX不仅有效，而且非常高效，其几何平均性能开销仅为SPEC的3.95 %。
papers.title_zh: 破坏和修复破坏性代码读取防御

papers.title: QUASAR: Quantitative Attack Space Analysis and Reasoning
papers.authors: Richard Skowyra, Steven R. Gomez, David Bigelow, James Landry, Hamed Okhravi
papers.abstract: Computer security has long been an arms race between attacks and defenses. While new defenses are proposed and built to stop specific vectors of attacks, novel, sophisticated attacks are devised by attackers to bypass them. This rapid cycle of defenses and attacks has made it difficult to strategically reason about the protection offered by each defensive technique, the coverage of a set of defenses, and possible new vectors of attack for which to design future defenses. In this work, we present QUASAR, a framework that systematically analyzes attacks and defenses at the granularity of the capabilities necessary to mount the attacks. We build a model of attacks in the memory corruption domain, and represent various prominent defenses in this domain. We demonstrate that QUASAR can be used to compare defenses at a fundamental level (what they do instead of how they do it), reason about the coverage of a defensive configuration, and hypothesize about possible new attack strategies. We show that of the top five hypothesized new attack strategies, in fact, four have been published in security venues over the past two years. We investigate the fifth hypothesized vector ourselves and demonstrate that it is, in fact, a viable vector of attack.
papers.abstract_zh: 计算机安全长期以来一直是攻击和防御之间的军备竞赛。虽然提出并构建了新的防御措施来阻止特定的攻击媒介，但攻击者会设计出新颖、复杂的攻击来绕过它们。这种防御和攻击的快速循环使得人们很难从战略上对每种防御技术提供的保护、一组防御的覆盖范围以及可能的新攻击媒介进行推理，从而设计未来的防御。在这项工作中，我们提出了QUASAR，这是一个在发动攻击所必需的能力粒度上系统地分析攻击和防御的框架。我们建立了一个内存损坏领域的攻击模型，并代表了该领域中各种突出的防御措施。我们证明了QUASAR可以用来比较防御的基本水平(他们做什么，而不是他们如何做)，推理防御配置的覆盖范围，并假设可能的新攻击策略。我们表明，在五大假设的新攻击策略中，实际上有四种在过去两年中已经在安全场所发布。我们自己研究了第五个假设向量，并证明它实际上是一个可行的攻击向量。
papers.title_zh: 类星体：定量攻击空间分析和推理

papers.title: Kakute: A Precise, Unified Information Flow Analysis System for Big-data Security
papers.authors: Jianyu Jiang, Shixiong Zhao, Danish Alsayed, Yuexuan Wang, Heming Cui, Feng Liang, Zhaoquan Gu
papers.abstract: Big-data frameworks (e.g., Spark) enable computations on tremendous data records generated by third parties, causing various security and reliability problems such as information leakage and programming bugs. Existing systems for big-data security (e.g., Titian) track data transformations in a record level, so they are imprecise and too coarse-grained for these problems. For instance, when we ran Titian to drill down input records that produced a buggy output record, Titian reported 3 to 9 orders of magnitude more input records than the actual ones. Information Flow Tracking (IFT) is a conventional approach for precise information control. However, extant IFT systems are neither efficient nor complete for big-data frameworks, because theses frameworks are data-intensive, and data flowing across hosts is often ignored by IFT. This paper presents Kakute, the first precise, fine-grained information flow analysis system for big-data. Our insight on making IFT efficient is that most fields in a data record often have the same IFT tags, and we present two new efficient techniques called Reference Propagation and Tag Sharing. In addition, we design an efficient, complete cross-host information flow propagation approach. Evaluation on seven diverse big-data programs (e.g., WordCount) shows that Kakute had merely 32.3% overhead on average even when fine-grained information control was enabled. Compared with Titian, Kakute precisely drilled down the actual bug inducing input records, a huge reduction of 3 to 9 orders of magnitude. Kakute's performance overhead is comparable with Titian. Furthermore, Kakute effectively detected 13 real-world security and reliability bugs in 4 diverse problems, including information leakage, data provenance, programming and performance bugs. Kakute's source code and results are available on https://github.com/hku-systems/kakute.
papers.abstract_zh: 大数据框架(如Spark)能够对第三方生成的大量数据记录进行计算，从而导致各种安全和可靠性问题，如信息泄露和编程错误。现有的大数据安全系统(如Titian)在记录级别跟踪数据转换，因此对于这些问题来说，它们不精确且粒度太粗。例如，当我们运行Titian来挖掘产生错误输出记录的输入记录时，Titian报告的输入记录比实际记录多3到9个数量级。信息流跟踪(IFT)是精确信息控制的传统方法。然而，现存的IFT系统对于大数据框架来说既不高效也不完整，因为这些框架是数据密集型的，并且跨主机流动的数据经常被IFT忽略。本文介绍了Kakute，这是首个针对大数据的精确、细粒度信息流分析系统。我们对提高IFT效率的见解是，数据记录中的大多数字段通常具有相同的IFT标签，我们提出了两种新的高效技术，称为引用传播和标签共享。此外，我们还设计了一种高效、完整的跨主机信息流传播方法。对七个不同的大数据程序(如WordCount)的评估表明，即使启用了细粒度的信息控制，Kakute的平均开销也只有32.3%。与Titian相比，Kakute精确地钻取了实际的bug诱导输入记录，减少了3到9个数量级。卡库特的性能开销与提香不相上下。此外，Kakute有效地检测了4个不同问题中的13个真实世界的安全性和可靠性错误，包括信息泄漏、数据来源、编程和性能错误。Kakute的源代码和结果可以在https://github.com/hku-systems/kakute.上找到
papers.title_zh: Kakute：大数据安全性的精确的，统一的信息流分析系统

papers.title: Marmite: Spreading Malicious File Reputation Through Download Graphs
papers.authors: Gianluca Stringhini, Yun Shen, Yufei Han, Xiangliang Zhang
papers.abstract: Effective malware detection approaches need not only high accuracy, but also need to be robust to changes in the modus operandi of criminals. In this paper, we propose Marmite, a feature-agnostic system that aims at propagating known malicious reputation of certain files to unknown ones with the goal of detecting malware. Marmite does this by looking at a graph that encapsulates a comprehensive view of how files are downloaded (by which hosts and from which servers) on a global scale. The reputation of files is then propagated across the graph using semi-supervised label propagation with Bayesian confidence. We show that Marmite is able to reach high accuracy (0.94 G-mean on average) over a 10-day dataset of 200 million download events. We also demonstrate that Marmite's detection capabilities do not significantly degrade over time, by testing our system on a 30-day dataset of 660 million download events collected six months after the system was tuned and validated. Marmite still maintains a similar accuracy after this period of time.
papers.abstract_zh: 有效的恶意软件检测方法不仅需要高准确性，还需要对犯罪分子作案手法的变化具有鲁棒性。在本文中，我们提出了Marmite，这是一个功能不可知的系统，旨在将某些文件的已知恶意信誉传播到未知文件，以检测恶意软件。Marmite通过查看一个图表来做到这一点，该图表概括了全球范围内文件下载方式(由哪些主机和从哪些服务器下载)的综合视图。然后，使用具有贝叶斯置信度的半监督标签传播，在图中传播文件的信誉。我们表明，Marmite能够在10天2亿次下载事件的数据集上达到高精度(平均0.94G-均值)。我们还证明了Marmite的检测能力不会随着时间的推移而显著下降，方法是在系统调优和验证后六个月收集的30天6.6亿次下载事件数据集上测试我们的系统。在这段时间之后，Marmite仍然保持类似的精度。
papers.title_zh: Marmite：通过下载图传播恶意文件声誉

papers.title: TTPDrill: Automatic and Accurate Extraction of Threat Actions from Unstructured Text of CTI Sources
papers.authors: Ghaith Husari, Ehab Al-Shaer, Mohiuddin Ahmed, Bill Chu, Xi Niu
papers.abstract: With the rapid growth of the cyber attacks, sharing of cyber threat intelligence (CTI) becomes essential to identify and respond to cyber attack in timely and cost-effective manner. However, with the lack of standard languages and automated analytics of cyber threat information, analyzing complex and unstructured text of CTI reports is extremely time- and labor-consuming. Without addressing this challenge, CTI sharing will be highly impractical, and attack uncertainty and time-to-defend will continue to increase. Considering the high volume and speed of CTI sharing, our aim in this paper is to develop automated and context-aware analytics of cyber threat intelligence to accurately learn attack pattern (TTPs) from commonly available CTI sources in order to timely implement cyber defense actions. Our paper has three key contributions. First, it presents a novel threat-action ontology that is sufficiently rich to understand the specifications and context of malicious actions. Second, we developed a novel text mining approach that combines enhanced techniques of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Information retrieval (IR) to extract threat actions based on semantic (rather than syntactic) relationship. Third, our CTI analysis can construct a complete attack pattern by mapping each threat action to the appropriate techniques, tactics and kill chain phases, and translating it any threat sharing standards, such as STIX 2.1. Our CTI analytic techniques were implemented in a tool, called TTPDrill, and evaluated using a randomly selected set of Symantec Threat Reports. Our evaluation tests show that TTPDrill achieves more than 82% of precision and recall in a variety of measures, very reasonable for this problem domain.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着网络攻击的快速增长，共享网络威胁情报(CTI)对于及时、经济高效地识别和应对网络攻击变得至关重要。然而，由于缺乏标准语言和网络威胁信息的自动化分析，分析复杂和非结构化的CTI报告文本极其耗时耗力。如果不解决这一挑战，CTI共享将非常不切实际，攻击的不确定性和防御时间将继续增加。考虑到CTI共享的高容量和高速度，我们在本文中的目标是开发网络威胁情报的自动化和上下文感知分析，以从常见的CTI源中准确地学习攻击模式，从而及时实施网络防御行动。我们的论文有三个主要贡献。首先，它提出了一个新的威胁行为本体，它足够丰富，可以理解恶意行为的规范和上下文。其次，我们开发了一种新的文本挖掘方法，该方法结合了自然语言处理(NLP)和信息检索(IR)的增强技术，以基于语义(而不是句法)关系提取威胁行为。第三，我们的CTI分析可以通过将每个威胁行为映射到适当的技术、战术和杀伤链阶段，并将其转化为任何威胁共享标准，如STIX 2.1，来构建完整的攻击模式。我们的CTI分析技术在名为TTPDrill的工具中实施，并使用随机选择的一组赛门铁克威胁报告进行评估。我们的评估测试表明，TTPDrill在各种指标上都达到了82%以上的准确率和召回率，对于这个问题领域来说是非常合理的。
papers.title_zh: TTPDRILL：从CTI来源的非结构化文本中自动且准确地提取威胁动作

papers.title: Supplementing Modern Software Defenses with Stack-Pointer Sanity
papers.authors: Anh Quach, Matthew Cole, Aravind Prakash
papers.abstract: The perpetual cat-and-mouse game between attackers and software defenders has highlighted the need for strong and robust security. With performance as a key concern, most modern defenses focus on control-flow integrity (CFI), a program property that requires runtime execution of a program to adhere to a statically determined control-flow graph (CFG). Despite its success in preventing traditional return-oriented programming (ROP), CFI is known to be ineffective against modern attacks that adhere to a statically recovered CFG (e.g., COOP). This paper introduces stack-pointer integrity (SPI) as a means to supplement CFI and other modern defense techniques. Due to its ability to influence indirect control targets, stack pointer is a key artifact in attacks. We define SPI as a property comprising of two key sub-properties - Stack Localization and Stack Conservation - and implement a LLVM-based compiler prototype codenamed SPIglass that enforces SPI. We demonstrate a low implementation overhead and incremental deployability, two of the most desirable features for practical deployment. Our performance experiments show that the overhead of our defense is low in practice. We opensource SPIglass for the benefit of the community.
